original: dang po mchod pa'i rig ma gsungs pa /
analyzed: dang po mchod pa'i rig ma gsungs pa /
translated: First, the knowledge consort for the offering is stated:

original: bu mo zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bu mo zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “A young girl,” and so on.

original: bu mo gzhon nu ni lang tsho ma nyams pa'o //
analyzed: bu mo gzhon nu ni lang tsho ma nyams pa'o //
translated: A young girl is one whose youth is unimpaired.

original: mig bzang bsal zhes pa ni phra la ring ba rtog pa med par blta'o //
analyzed: mig bzang bsal zhes pa ni phra la ring ba rtog pa med par blta'o //
translated: “ With beautiful eyes” means that she looks without conceptualization with eyes that are slender and long.

original: gzugs bzang ba dang gzhan pa nyid brgyan te des brgyan pa ni zhes so //
analyzed: gzugs bzang ba dang gzhan pa nyid brgyan te des brgyan pa ni zhes so //
translated: “ Adorned with ornaments” means that she is adorned with ornaments other than her own body.

original: nyi shu rtsa lnga lon pa zhes pa ni lha'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa lnga lon pa zhes pa ni lha'i rang bzhin no //
translated: “ Twenty-five years old” means that she is of divine nature.

original: byol song las brtag ces ni mar byol zhing yang song ba ste mya ngan sog le ltar yod kyi rab tu gzung ngo zhes so //
analyzed: byol song las brtag ces ni mar byol zhing yang song ba ste mya ngan sog le ltar yod kyi rab tu gzung ngo zhes so //
translated: “ Examine her animal nature” means that she is to be thoroughly examined, as if she were a cow, going here and there, with a goad.

original: da ni gnas phyi'i tshul du dag par bya ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni gnas phyi'i tshul du dag par bya ba gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the purification of the external site is stated:

original: sa phyogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sa phyogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: “A pure place,” and so on.

original: sa phyogs gtsang ba ni yid gtsang ba'o //
analyzed: sa phyogs gtsang ba ni yid gtsang ba'o //
translated: A pure place is a pure mind.

original: skye bo 'dus pa spangs pa ni rnam par dben pa'o //
analyzed: skye bo 'dus pa spangs pa ni rnam par dben pa'o //
translated: “ Free of crowds” means solitary.

original: rgyal ba'i bdag skyed ces pa ni rgyal ba skyes pa'i sa'o //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i bdag skyed ces pa ni rgyal ba skyes pa'i sa'o //
translated: “ The place where the Victor was born” is the place where the Victor was born.

original: zhi ba'i gnas ni nyan thos kyi gnas so //
analyzed: zhi ba'i gnas ni nyan thos kyi gnas so //
translated: The peaceful state is the state of the śrāvakas.

original: gnas der stegs bu gru bzhi pa la chu 'am bshad gci la sogs pa byugs shing byi dor @33b byas nas rgyal ba mchod par bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: gnas der stegs bu gru bzhi pa la chu 'am bshad gci la sogs pa byugs shing byi dor @33b byas nas rgyal ba mchod par bya'o zhes so //
translated: In that state, having anointed a square platform with water or excrement, etc., and having cleaned it, one should worship the Victor.

original: da ni bar ma'i 'bras bu bzhis dag pa'i rig ma rigs lnga dang ldan par bya ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni bar ma'i 'bras bu bzhis dag pa'i rig ma rigs lnga dang ldan par bya ba gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the four intermediate results are stated to be endowed with the pure knowledge-woman possessing the five families.

original: nu ma'i bar zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: nu ma'i bar zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa'o //
translated: The statement “between the breasts” and so forth is stated.

original: nu ma'i bar zhes pa ni snying ga ste /
analyzed: nu ma'i bar zhes pa ni snying ga ste /
translated: “Between the breasts” is the heart.

original: der h'um dang rdo rje las gyur pa'i mi bskyod pa dgod pa'o //
analyzed: der h'um dang rdo rje las gyur pa'i mi bskyod pa dgod pa'o //
translated: There one should place Akṣobhya arisen from the hūṃ and vajra.

original: klad pa rgyas kyi bar zhes pa ni mgo dbus te /
analyzed: klad pa rgyas kyi bar zhes pa ni mgo dbus te /
translated: “Between the expanded brain” is the center of the head.

original: aom dang 'khor lo las gyur pa'i rtag pa dgod pa'o //
analyzed: aom dang 'khor lo las gyur pa'i rtag pa dgod pa'o //
translated: There one should place Amoghasiddhi arisen from the hūṃ and sword.

original: cho ga shes pas zhis bya ba ni 'bring po'i bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi shes pa'o //
analyzed: cho ga shes pas zhis bya ba ni 'bring po'i bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi shes pa'o //
translated: “The one who knows the rite” is the one who knows the four branches of approach and accomplishment of the intermediate [sādhana].

original: rkang pa zhes pa ni brla gnyis te /
analyzed: rkang pa zhes pa ni brla gnyis te /
translated: “The legs” are the two thighs.🔽There one should place Amitābha arisen from the oṃ and lotus.

original: ha dang ral gri las grub pa'i don yod grub pa dgod pa'o //
analyzed: ha dang ral gri las grub pa'i don yod grub pa dgod pa'o //
translated: “The secret” is the secret place.🔽There one should place Vairocana arisen from the aṃ and bhagavān.

original: lte ba rked pa zhes pa lte ba nas dkris pa ste /
analyzed: lte ba rked pa zhes pa lte ba nas dkris pa ste /
translated: The navel is the waist.

original: der sb'a dang rin po che las byung ba'i dkon mchog dpal dgod pa'o //
analyzed: der sb'a dang rin po che las byung ba'i dkon mchog dpal dgod pa'o //
translated: There one should place Akṣobhya, who is born from the syllable hūṃ and the jewel.🔽The secret is the place of the vajra jewel.

original: gsang ba zhes pa ni der a'a:dang padma las byung ba'i 'od dpag med dgod do //
analyzed: gsang ba zhes pa ni der a'a:dang padma las byung ba'i 'od dpag med dgod do //
translated: There one should place Amitābha, who is born from the syllable āḥ and the lotus.

original: rgyal ba'i sras zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba dang de'i sras ni rgyal ba'i sras te lhag par mos pas gnyis pa yang dgod pa'o //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i sras zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba dang de'i sras ni rgyal ba'i sras te lhag par mos pas gnyis pa yang dgod pa'o //
translated: The son of the Victor is the second one, who is born from the syllable oṃ and the wheel.

original: de bas na bar zhes pas ma bshad pa rnams bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na bar zhes pas ma bshad pa rnams bsdus pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the word “and” includes those not mentioned.

original: rigs lnga rnams ni zhes pa ni rigs lnga 'am cha shas dgod par bya'o zhes so //🔽bar ma'i lha mo la yang ye shes sems ma bsgom par gsungs pa /
analyzed: rigs lnga rnams ni zhes pa ni rigs lnga 'am cha shas dgod par bya'o zhes so // bar ma'i lha mo la yang ye shes sems ma bsgom par gsungs pa /
translated: The five clans are the five clans or parts.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is said that one should meditate on the gnosis being in the case of the secondary goddesses.🔽The space element is the place of the vajra jewel.

original: ye shes rgya mtsho zhes pa ni byin gyis brlabs pa'i shes rab po //
analyzed: ye shes rgya mtsho zhes pa ni byin gyis brlabs pa'i shes rab po //
translated: The ocean of gnosis is the wisdom of consecration.

original: bdag nyid ces pa ni bdag nyid dang 'dra bas so //
analyzed: bdag nyid ces pa ni bdag nyid dang 'dra bas so //
translated: One’s own is like one’s own self.

original: zla ba'i steng du shes rab ma'i snying gar bsgom par bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: zla ba'i steng du shes rab ma'i snying gar bsgom par bya'o zhes so //
translated: One should meditate on the wisdom-being at the heart of the moon.

original: rang gi rig ma dang tha mi dad pas na de skad de /
analyzed: rang gi rig ma dang tha mi dad pas na de skad de /
translated: Since one is not different from one's knowledge-woman, it is so stated.

original: gzhan rnams la de ltar ma yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan rnams la de ltar ma yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that it is not so for others.

original: da ni rdo rje dang padma dag par byas pa'i de ma thag tu rang gi lha mo las bsdu ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni rdo rje dang padma dag par byas pa'i de ma thag tu rang gi lha mo las bsdu ba gsungs pa /
translated: Now, immediately after the purification of the vajra and lotus, the gathering from one's goddess is stated:

original: zhi ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhi ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The peaceful vajra-holder, etc.

original: zhi ba rdo rje 'dzin pa ni rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: zhi ba rdo rje 'dzin pa ni rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: The peaceful vajra-holder is the yogi.

original: de 'dod pa ni sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: de 'dod pa ni sbyor ba'o //
translated: His desire is the union.

original: bsdu ba dag kyang rab tu bya //
analyzed: bsdu ba dag kyang rab tu bya //
translated: One should also perform the gathering.

original: zhes pa ni phyi rol du gnas pa bde ba'i rgyu ma yin pas na rang gi rig ma la bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni phyi rol du gnas pa bde ba'i rgyu ma yin pas na rang gi rig ma la bsdu ba'o //
translated: Since the external abode is not the cause of bliss, there is the gathering in one's knowledge-woman.

original: de nyid kyi khyad par gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi khyad par gsungs pa /
translated: The special quality of that is stated:

original: rin chen zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rin chen zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The jewel, etc.

original: rin chen sna bzhi aindra n'i la dang lnga'o //
analyzed: rin chen sna bzhi aindra n'i la dang lnga'o //
translated: The four jewels are the five, including sapphire.

original: mchod rten ni de las grub pa'i gzhal yas khang 'od zer 'phro bas brgyan pa bsams na zhes so //
analyzed: mchod rten ni de las grub pa'i gzhal yas khang 'od zer 'phro bas brgyan pa bsams na zhes so //
translated: The stupa is the celestial mansion made of those, imagined to be adorned with radiating light-rays.

original: ji skad @34a * //🔽du ; mchod rten sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
analyzed: ji skad @34a * // du ; mchod rten sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
translated: As it is said:🔽The stupa is explained as the palace

original: bzhugs gnas pho brang yin par bshad //
analyzed: bzhugs gnas pho brang yin par bshad //
translated: in which all the buddhas reside.

original: ces so // der yi shes rgya mtsho dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang sems can gyi gnas de ji skad du gsungs pa'i rim pas bsam bar bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: ces so // der yi shes rgya mtsho dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang sems can gyi gnas de ji skad du gsungs pa'i rim pas bsam bar bya'o zhes so //
translated: There, one should contemplate the ocean of gnosis, the abode of the buddhas and sentient beings of the three times, in the sequence as it is taught.

original: de dag thams cad kyang 'di nyid las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag thams cad kyang 'di nyid las shes par bya'o //
translated: All of that should be understood from this very [tantra].

original: da ni chen po'i 'bras bu bzhi dag pa'i de ma thag tu gsang ba'i mchod pas mnyes par bya ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni chen po'i 'bras bu bzhi dag pa'i de ma thag tu gsang ba'i mchod pas mnyes par bya ba gsungs pa /
translated: Now, immediately after the four results of the great [stage], it is said that one should please [the guru] with secret offerings:

original: bdag gi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bdag gi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: My and so forth.

original: bdag ces pa ni rang gi lha mo'o //
analyzed: bdag ces pa ni rang gi lha mo'o //
translated: My is one's own goddess.

original: de'i ba spu'i bu ga las spro zhes so //
analyzed: de'i ba spu'i bu ga las spro zhes so //
translated: From the pores of her body, one should emanate.

original: mkhas pas zhes bya ba ni sa bon la sogs pa'i rim pa shes pa'o //
analyzed: mkhas pas zhes bya ba ni sa bon la sogs pa'i rim pa shes pa'o //
translated: The wise is one who knows the sequence of the seed and so forth.

original: autpala dag pa zhes pa ni gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: autpala dag pa zhes pa ni gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs pa'o //
translated: The pure utpala is Rūpavajrā and so forth.

original: padma lnga ni gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs pa lnga ste de'i yongs su rdzogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: padma lnga ni gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs pa lnga ste de'i yongs su rdzogs pa gsungs so //
translated: The five lotuses are the five beginning with Rūpavajrā.

original: dz'a ti rnam gsum ni skye gnas gsum la khyab pa'i chos kyi rdo rje ma'o ;
analyzed: dz'a ti rnam gsum ni skye gnas gsum la khyab pa'i chos kyi rdo rje ma'o ;
translated: The three jātis are the pervading dharmas of the three wombs.

original: karni ka ni spyan ma'o //🔽malli ka ni m'a ma k'i'o //
analyzed: karni ka ni spyan ma'o // malli ka ni m'a ma k'i'o //
translated: Karṇikā is Locanā.🔽Mallikā is Māmakī.

original: y'u thi kam ni gos dkar mo'o //
analyzed: y'u thi kam ni gos dkar mo'o //
translated: Yūthikā is Pāṇḍaravāsinī.

original: ka ra b'i ra ni sgrol ma'o //
analyzed: ka ra b'i ra ni sgrol ma'o //
translated: Karavīra is Tārā.

original: de'i mchod pa'i sprin spro bar bsam pa ni nang du tshud pa'i shugs kyis gsang ba'i mchod pa kun gyis rab tu mchod ces so //
analyzed: de'i mchod pa'i sprin spro bar bsam pa ni nang du tshud pa'i shugs kyis gsang ba'i mchod pa kun gyis rab tu mchod ces so //
translated: The thought of emanating the cloud of worship of those is the inner force, and the worship with all the secret offerings is the worship.

original: ji lta ba bzhin du bzung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du bzung ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not taken literally.

original: ji skad du /🔽'di la me tog ces brjod pa /
analyzed: ji skad du / 'di la me tog ces brjod pa /
translated: As it is said:🔽Here, the sky-element of a young woman

original: bud med gzhon nu'i nam mkha'i khams //
analyzed: bud med gzhon nu'i nam mkha'i khams //
translated: is called a flower.

original: zhes so // des gang la mchod ce na /
analyzed: zhes so // des gang la mchod ce na /
translated: By what is it worshipped?

original: dpag tshad ces pa la sogs pas rten dang brten can gyi 'khor lo gsungs pa /
analyzed: dpag tshad ces pa la sogs pas rten dang brten can gyi 'khor lo gsungs pa /
translated: The wheel of the support and the supported is stated by “yojana” and so forth.

original: ngos re zhing yang dpag tshad brgya'i khyon tsam du 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad las byung ba'o //
analyzed: ngos re zhing yang dpag tshad brgya'i khyon tsam du 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad las byung ba'o //
translated: In each direction, the mandala of the wheel is the size of one hundred leagues, arisen from Vairocana.

original: rnam par mkhas pa ni sa bon la sogs pa'i rim bas brtag par byas la /
analyzed: rnam par mkhas pa ni sa bon la sogs pa'i rim bas brtag par byas la /
translated: The expert should imagine it by the stages of the seed and so forth.

original: der rigs rnams zhes bya ba ni lha rnams kyis rab tu dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: der rigs rnams zhes bya ba ni lha rnams kyis rab tu dgod par bya'o //
translated: There, the clans, that is, the deities, should be well-placed.

original: lha rnams kyang ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: lha rnams kyang ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: And what are the deities?

original: padma zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: padma zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The lotus and so forth.

original: de rnams kyi mtshan ma bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi mtshan ma bsgom pa'o //
translated: One should meditate on their signs.

original: 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyad par yang gsungs pa /🔽dpag tshad ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyad par yang gsungs pa / dpag tshad ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The special features of the mandala of the wheel are also stated:🔽The mandala of the wheel is one hundred leagues in size,

original: blo'i khyad par gyis tshad dpag tu med par bsgom pa'i phyir ngos re re la dpag tshad bye ba tsam la dbyibs gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi la sogs pa ni shin tu mdzes @34b pa'i mchod rten rin po che sna bzhi dang aindra n'i la la sogs las
analyzed: blo'i khyad par gyis tshad dpag tu med par bsgom pa'i phyir ngos re re la dpag tshad bye ba tsam la dbyibs gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi la sogs pa ni shin tu mdzes @34b pa'i mchod rten rin po che sna bzhi dang aindra n'i la la sogs las
translated: and one should meditate on it as immeasurable by the difference of the intellect. Therefore, in each direction, the shape is one hundred thousand leagues, with four gates and so forth, a very beautiful stupa made of the four precious substances, sapphire and so forth,

original: grub pa shel sgong lta bur gsal zhing dri ma med pa /
analyzed: grub pa shel sgong lta bur gsal zhing dri ma med pa /
translated: Accomplishment is clear like a crystal globe and stainless.

original: rigs lnga la sogs pa'i lha rnams mchod pa'i gnas su bsgom pa la mchod ces so //
analyzed: rigs lnga la sogs pa'i lha rnams mchod pa'i gnas su bsgom pa la mchod ces so //
translated: Meditate on the deities of the five families and so forth as the objects of worship.

original: phyi'i mchod pas kyang mnyes par bya ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: phyi'i mchod pas kyang mnyes par bya ba gsungs pa /
translated: It is said that one should please them with outer worship as well.

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The five qualities of desire and so forth.

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga zhes pa ni phyi rol gyi gzugs sdug pa la sogs pa dang / pi wang la sogs pa dkrol ba'i rdzas dang / aa ka ru la sogs pa'i spos dang / tshod ma sna tshogs pa'i zas dang / dar la sogs pa gos kyi khyad par rnams kyis zhes so //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga zhes pa ni phyi rol gyi gzugs sdug pa la sogs pa dang / pi wang la sogs pa dkrol ba'i rdzas dang / aa ka ru la sogs pa'i spos dang / tshod ma sna tshogs pa'i zas dang / dar la sogs pa gos kyi khyad par rnams kyis zhes so //
translated: The five qualities of desire are the external beautiful forms and so forth, the substances that are played by the lute and so forth, the incense of aloeswood and so forth, the food of various vegetables, and the special clothes of silk and so forth.

original: de la zhes pa ni 'khor lo de la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes pa ni 'khor lo de la'o //
translated: In that, in that wheel.

original: reg bya'i khyad par dang gzugs kyi khyad par la sogs pa ni rin chen na bza' ste dar la sogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i gos sam /
analyzed: reg bya'i khyad par dang gzugs kyi khyad par la sogs pa ni rin chen na bza' ste dar la sogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i gos sam /
translated: The special tactile sensations and special forms and so forth are the precious clothes, the clothes of silk and so forth adorned with various jewels,

original: sogs kyi sgras bsdus pa gser gyi gdu bu 'phra can nam /
analyzed: sogs kyi sgras bsdus pa gser gyi gdu bu 'phra can nam /
translated: or the thin golden bracelets and so forth included by the word and so forth.

original: gser gyi gdu bu mu tig gi 'bras bu can nam /
analyzed: gser gyi gdu bu mu tig gi 'bras bu can nam /
translated: or a golden bracelet with pearl beads,

original: gser gyi dbu rgyan rdo rje'i rtse bran can nam /
analyzed: gser gyi dbu rgyan rdo rje'i rtse bran can nam /
translated: or a golden diadem with a vajra crest,

original: gdugs gser gyi yu ba can la sogs pas byang chub 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas rtag tu mchod ces so //
analyzed: gdugs gser gyi yu ba can la sogs pas byang chub 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas rtag tu mchod ces so //
translated: or a golden parasol with a handle, and so on.

original: mchod pa rnam lnga zhes pa ni me tog dang / mar me dang / dri chab dang / bdug spos dang / lha bshos so //
analyzed: mchod pa rnam lnga zhes pa ni me tog dang / mar me dang / dri chab dang / bdug spos dang / lha bshos so //
translated: The five offerings are flowers, lamps, perfume, incense, and food.

original: de nyid ye shes sems dpa' las byung ba'i phyir 'jig rten pa dang thun mong ma yin bas na mchog go //
analyzed: de nyid ye shes sems dpa' las byung ba'i phyir 'jig rten pa dang thun mong ma yin bas na mchog go //
translated: Since they arise from the gnosis being, they are supreme, not shared with the mundane.

original: des rtag tu ni dus bzhir ro //
analyzed: des rtag tu ni dus bzhir ro //
translated: With them, always means at the four times.

original: lha rnams mnyes par bya zhes so //
analyzed: lha rnams mnyes par bya zhes so //
translated: Please the deities.

original: da ni bum pa'i dbang thob pa'i slob mas gsang ba'i dbang gi rig ma bla mal dbul ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni bum pa'i dbang thob pa'i slob mas gsang ba'i dbang gi rig ma bla mal dbul ba gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the disciple who has obtained the vase empowerment should offer the secret empowerment knowledge-woman to the guru.

original: rin chen zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rin chen zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: That is taught by “jewel,” and so on.

original: de la rin chen zhes pa ni thabs kyis ster ba'i man ngag go //
analyzed: de la rin chen zhes pa ni thabs kyis ster ba'i man ngag go //
translated: There, “jewel” is the intimate instruction of the bestowal of the method.

original: de'i 'byung gnas ni na chung ste bu mo mchog go //
analyzed: de'i 'byung gnas ni na chung ste bu mo mchog go //
translated: The “source” of that is the young girl, the supreme maiden.

original: de la rin chen sna tshogs kyis brgyan nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur bsgrub pa'i tshe snang ba rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir bla ma la yon rin chen rnams dang bcas pa phul la zhes so //
analyzed: de la rin chen sna tshogs kyis brgyan nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur bsgrub pa'i tshe snang ba rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir bla ma la yon rin chen rnams dang bcas pa phul la zhes so //
translated: When one is practicing the bestowal of the secret initiation, having adorned it with various jewels, one should offer to the guru the jewels and so forth, in order to achieve the appearance.

original: rin chen rnams kyang gang zhe na zhing 'di zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rin chen rnams kyang gang zhe na zhing 'di zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: What are the jewels?

original: zhing 'di zhes pa ni nam mkha'i gtos so //
analyzed: zhing 'di zhes pa ni nam mkha'i gtos so //
translated: This field is the expanse of the sky.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par bsgom //
translated: meditate on all the buddhas.

original: zhes so // de nas ser sna'i yo byad mi mkho ba rnams kyang 'dzin pa yi dags kyi 'gro ba las bzlog pa'i phyir rin chen kun gyi ste /
analyzed: zhes so // de nas ser sna'i yo byad mi mkho ba rnams kyang 'dzin pa yi dags kyi 'gro ba las bzlog pa'i phyir rin chen kun gyi ste /
translated: Then, in order to turn away from the ghost realm of those who cling to useless wealth, [there is] “all jewels,”

original: padma r'a ga la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: padma r'a ga la sogs pa'o //
translated: padma rāga, and so on.

original: de'i sbyor ba ste ting nge 'dzin gyis so //
analyzed: de'i sbyor ba ste ting nge 'dzin gyis so //
translated: By the yoga of that samādhi,

original: rdo rje gzugs zhes pa ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i gzugs su rab tu brtags la /
analyzed: rdo rje gzugs zhes pa ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i gzugs su rab tu brtags la /
translated: the vajra form is the form of the buddhas and so on, thoroughly imagined.

original: des ser sna can gyi nor thams cad phrog par bsgom mo //
analyzed: des ser sna can gyi nor thams cad phrog par bsgom mo //
translated: By that, meditate on the appropriation of all the wealth of the miser.

original: gang gis she na /
analyzed: gang gis she na /
translated: By what?

original: rdo rje gsum du rnam bsgom na //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum du rnam bsgom na //
translated: Meditating on the three vajras,

original: zhes te rang gi sa bon las 'phros pa'i rdo rje gsum gyis nor phrogs nas sems can la sbyin zhing bde bar gshegs pa rnams la dbul bar bsams pas rang dang gzhan dag par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: zhes te rang gi sa bon las 'phros pa'i rdo rje gsum gyis nor phrogs nas sems can la sbyin zhing bde bar gshegs pa rnams la dbul bar bsams pas rang dang gzhan dag par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Thus, having stolen the wealth with the three vajras that emanate from one's seed, one should imagine giving it to sentient beings and offering it to the Sugatas. In this way, oneself and others will be purified.

original: nor gyi rgya mtsho zhes pa la sogs pa ni de'i phan yon gsungs so //
analyzed: nor gyi rgya mtsho zhes pa la sogs pa ni de'i phan yon gsungs so //
translated: The ocean of wealth and so forth state its benefits.

original: nor gyi rgya mtshos gang ba ni nor phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: nor gyi rgya mtshos gang ba ni nor phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Being filled with an ocean of wealth means being endowed with an abundance of wealth.

original: de nyid kyis na /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na /
translated: And by that very fact,

original: yid bzhin nor bu 'dra bar 'gyur //
analyzed: yid bzhin nor bu 'dra bar 'gyur //
translated: one becomes like a wish-fulfilling gem.

original: zhes te sbyin ba gtong zhing bde bar gshegs pa mchod kyang zad pa med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes te sbyin ba gtong zhing bde bar gshegs pa mchod kyang zad pa med pa'o //
translated: Even though one gives gifts and makes offerings to the Sugatas, they are inexhaustible.

original: rgyu des phyis sangs rgyas kun gyi sras te byang chub sems dpa' 'am /
analyzed: rgyu des phyis sangs rgyas kun gyi sras te byang chub sems dpa' 'am /
translated: By that cause, later on, one becomes the child of all the Buddhas, that is, a Bodhisattva,

original: thub pa skyes bu mchog ste sangs rgyas rnams su 'gyur ro zhes so //
analyzed: thub pa skyes bu mchog ste sangs rgyas rnams su 'gyur ro zhes so //
translated: or a Sage, the best of beings, that is, a Buddha.

original: ji skad du /🔽byang chub sems dpa'i kun du rtog / dge 'am gal te mi dge ba //
analyzed: ji skad du / byang chub sems dpa'i kun du rtog / dge 'am gal te mi dge ba //
translated: As it is said,🔽The Bodhisattva's imagination, whether virtuous or nonvirtuous,

original: gang phyir sems kyi dbang gyur pas //
analyzed: gang phyir sems kyi dbang gyur pas //
translated: is the cause of the Bodhisattva's accumulation of merit and knowledge,

original: de yi bkra shis sems de 'gyur//🔽@37a * // zhes so //
analyzed: de yi bkra shis sems de 'gyur// @37a * // zhes so //
translated: That is the auspicious mind.🔽This is the pledge of the family of anger, and so forth.

original: 'di ni rigs kyi rgya mtsho thams cad ces pa ni zhe sdang la sogs pa'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas bya ba mi 'gal bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rigs kyi rgya mtsho thams cad ces pa ni zhe sdang la sogs pa'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas bya ba mi 'gal bar shes par bya'o //
translated: The yogin should understand the practice without contradiction.

original: khyad par du shes pa ni gti mug gi rigs kyi dam tshig yang dag pa nyid du shes par bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: khyad par du shes pa ni gti mug gi rigs kyi dam tshig yang dag pa nyid du shes par bya'o zhes so //
translated: In particular, the knowledge is the pledge of the family of delusion, which should be understood as reality.

original: log par g-yem pa'i rnam par dag pa gsungs pa /🔽de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: log par g-yem pa'i rnam par dag pa gsungs pa / de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The purity of sexual misconduct is stated🔽beginning with “Then, Vajrapāṇi, having bowed to all the Buddhas, said to the Blessed One: ‘Blessed One, how should one understand the purity of sexual misconduct? ’”

original: 'dod chags nyid dag na lam dag par 'gyur bas na 'dod chags thar par bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags nyid dag na lam dag par 'gyur bas na 'dod chags thar par bsgrub pa'o //
translated: Since desire itself is pure, the path is pure. Therefore, desire is established as liberation.

original: thun mong du ma gyur pas na gsang ba dag pa'o //
analyzed: thun mong du ma gyur pas na gsang ba dag pa'o //
translated: Since it is not common, it is the purity of the secret.

original: gzung 'dzin dang bral bas na dmigs pa med pa ste /
analyzed: gzung 'dzin dang bral bas na dmigs pa med pa ste /
translated: Since it is free from subject and object, it is without objective support.

original: de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor bka' stsal to zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor bka' stsal to zhes pa'o //
translated: Such a maṇḍala is taught.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa ni gong ma ltar ro //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa ni gong ma ltar ro //
translated: Situated in the middle of the realm of space, as above.

original: der don thams cad 'byung ba'i phyir na rin chen dkyil 'khor te /🔽gzhal yas khad bsgom par bya ba'o //
analyzed: der don thams cad 'byung ba'i phyir na rin chen dkyil 'khor te / gzhal yas khad bsgom par bya ba'o //
translated: Since all things arise from it, it is the precious mandala.

original: dpag med tshe ni rab bsgoms te //
analyzed: dpag med tshe ni rab bsgoms te //
translated: One should meditate on the immeasurable life,

original: zhes pa ni gong ma'i rim pas so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni gong ma'i rim pas so //
translated: in the sequence of the above.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyis kun du sbyar //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyis kun du sbyar //
translated: The buddhas are everywhere engaged,

original: zhes pa ni ting nge 'dzin gnyis pas 'khor lo bsgom pa'o //🔽de yang chags pa can bsngos pa'am gzhan yang rung ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni ting nge 'dzin gnyis pas 'khor lo bsgom pa'o // de yang chags pa can bsngos pa'am gzhan yang rung ste /
translated: in the meditation of the wheel by the second meditative concentration.

original: rang gi lha mo lta bur bsgoms pa ni bud med lta bur sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi lha mo lta bur bsgoms pa ni bud med lta bur sbyor ba'o //
translated: Moreover, one should meditate on the consort as one's own goddess, or on any other, as the union with a woman.

original: de yang phyag rgya bzhi 'am bsnyen sgrub bzhir sbyor bas na dam tshig bzhi'i sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: de yang phyag rgya bzhi 'am bsnyen sgrub bzhir sbyor bas na dam tshig bzhi'i sbyor ba'o //
translated: And since one is engaged in the four seals or the four branches of approach and attainment, it is the engagement of the four commitments.

original: de bas na khams gsum na gnas pa thams cad bud med kyi rang bzhin dam tshig de ru bsgom pa de ni rdo rje'i tshul mchog ste rdo rje bsgrub pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: de bas na khams gsum na gnas pa thams cad bud med kyi rang bzhin dam tshig de ru bsgom pa de ni rdo rje'i tshul mchog ste rdo rje bsgrub pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: Therefore, the meditation on all those abiding in the three realms as having the nature of women is the supreme vajra way, the cause of attaining the vajra.

original: gang gis she na /
analyzed: gang gis she na /
translated: By what?

original: dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyar bas //
analyzed: dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyar bas //
translated: By the complete engagement of the two organs.

original: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas mnyes pa'i bsam pa dang / de nyid brtags pa la sogs pa'i bud med de dag nye bar spyad ces pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas mnyes pa'i bsam pa dang / de nyid brtags pa la sogs pa'i bud med de dag nye bar spyad ces pas so //
translated: This is the intention to please the Buddhas, and those women who are examined, etc. are the enjoyments.

original: de bas na 'di ni rang dang gzhan dag pa'i rgyu yin pas na tshangs par spyod pa dang mi 'gal ba ste de'i phyir /🔽'di ni gsang sngags thams cad kyi //
analyzed: de bas na 'di ni rang dang gzhan dag pa'i rgyu yin pas na tshangs par spyod pa dang mi 'gal ba ste de'i phyir / 'di ni gsang sngags thams cad kyi //
translated: Therefore, this is the cause of one's own and others' purity, and so is not in conflict with pure conduct.

original: mi phyed sku gsum bsgom pa'o ;🔽/ zhes so //
analyzed: mi phyed sku gsum bsgom pa'o ; / zhes so //
translated: This is the meditation on the indivisible three bodies of all the secret spells.

original: 'di ni 'dod chags kyi dam tshig yang dag pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni 'dod chags kyi dam tshig yang dag pa ste /
translated: This is the true commitment of passion.

original: sngags pa gzhan gyis kyang bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: sngags pa gzhan gyis kyang bsgom par bya'o //
translated: It should be meditated upon by other spell-holders as well.

original: brdzun du smra ba'i rnam par dag pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: brdzun du smra ba'i rnam par dag pa gsungs pa /
translated: The purification of lying is stated

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: beginning with Then the Lord, etc.

original: phyin ci log gi brdzun las dgar ba'i las kyis dag pas @37b na ;
analyzed: phyin ci log gi brdzun las dgar ba'i las kyis dag pas @37b na ;
translated: Since it is purified by the action of separating from the lie of error,

original: rdo rje sngags kyi don sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sngags kyi don sgrub pa'o //
translated: it is the accomplishment of the meaning of the vajra spell.

original: brdzun de yang dmigs pa dang bral bas na bdag med ye shes las byung ba'o //
analyzed: brdzun de yang dmigs pa dang bral bas na bdag med ye shes las byung ba'o //
translated: And that lie is free from objectification, and so arises from the wisdom of selflessness.🔽He said this:

original: des gsungs 'di skad bka' stsal to //
analyzed: des gsungs 'di skad bka' stsal to //
translated: So it was said.

original: zhes so // nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
analyzed: zhes so // nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
translated: In the middle of the realm of space

original: zhes pa yang gong ma bzhin no //🔽der sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ni gzhal yas khang bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa yang gong ma bzhin no // der sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ni gzhal yas khang bsgom pa'o //
translated: is as before.

original: don yod rdo rje rab bsgoms te //
analyzed: don yod rdo rje rab bsgoms te //
translated: There, the mandala of the Buddhas is the meditation on the celestial mansion.🔽Meditating on Amoghavajra

original: zhes pa ni gong ma ltar dang po'i mgon po las bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni gong ma ltar dang po'i mgon po las bskyed pa'o //
translated: is as before, generated from the Lord of the First.

original: sbyor ba gnyis pas sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya zhes pa ni gong ma bzhin no //🔽des / brdzun tshig rdo rje stabs gnas pas //
analyzed: sbyor ba gnyis pas sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya zhes pa ni gong ma bzhin no // des / brdzun tshig rdo rje stabs gnas pas //
translated: By the second union, one should meditate on all the Buddhas, as before.🔽By that,

original: zhes pa ni rdo rje tshig gis brdzun smra ba'i lha'i 'khor lo'i gzugs rnams thams cad bsgom par bya zhes so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdo rje tshig gis brdzun smra ba'i lha'i 'khor lo'i gzugs rnams thams cad bsgom par bya zhes so //
translated: one should meditate on all the forms of the retinue of the deity of false speech, abiding in the manner of Vajra Speech.

original: rgyal ba thams cad ces pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
analyzed: rgyal ba thams cad ces pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
translated: All the Victorious Ones are the Tathagatas.

original: de brdzun tshig sgyu ma lta bus bslu bar bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: de brdzun tshig sgyu ma lta bus bslu bar bya'o zhes so //
translated: One should deceive them with false speech, which is like an illusion.

original: gzhan gyi tshig dag par byed pa la'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi tshig dag par byed pa la'o //
translated: It is for the sake of purifying the speech of others.

original: de ltar bsams pa de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ste sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'brel ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar bsams pa de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ste sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'brel ba'o //
translated: That thought is the thought of all the Buddhas, that is, it is connected with all the Buddhas.

original: nam mkha'i gsung dri ma med pa zhes pa ni tshig de nyid kyang dmigs pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro zhes so //
analyzed: nam mkha'i gsung dri ma med pa zhes pa ni tshig de nyid kyang dmigs pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro zhes so //
translated: The immaculate speech of space is because that very word is free from objectification.

original: de ye shes blo can te sangs rgyas rnams so //
analyzed: de ye shes blo can te sangs rgyas rnams so //
translated: That is the knowledge-mind, that is, the Buddhas.

original: de'i thun mong ma yin pas na gsang ba'o //
analyzed: de'i thun mong ma yin pas na gsang ba'o //
translated: Since it is not common to that, it is secret.

original: sngags kyi dngos grub gnyis thob par byed par bshad ces so //
analyzed: sngags kyi dngos grub gnyis thob par byed par bshad ces so //
translated: It is explained that it causes the attainment of the two kinds of mantra powers.

original: 'di ni dam tshig 'gugs pa ni don yod grub pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni dam tshig 'gugs pa ni don yod grub pa'o //
translated: This is the pledge-summoning, which is Amoghasiddhi.

original: de'i rigs kyi dam tshig yang dag pa ste sngags pa gzhan gyis kyang bsgom par bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: de'i rigs kyi dam tshig yang dag pa ste sngags pa gzhan gyis kyang bsgom par bya'o zhes so //
translated: The pledge of that lineage is the real thing, and it should be cultivated by other mantra practitioners as well.

original: don ji lta ba bzhin du spro bar bya'o zhes pa ni /
analyzed: don ji lta ba bzhin du spro bar bya'o zhes pa ni /
translated: One should expand it according to the meaning,

original: bdag gi bla ma la sogs pa'i don du 'gyur na spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gi bla ma la sogs pa'i don du 'gyur na spro bar bya'o //
translated: which means that if it is for the sake of one’s guru and so on, one should expand it.

original: tshig rtsub mo la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: tshig rtsub mo la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa gsungs pa /
translated: The purification of harsh words and so on is stated

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: beginning with “Then…”

original: rdo rje mi phyed gsum rgyal ni rdo rje gsum gyi ngo bo'i bde bar gshegs pa rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje mi phyed gsum rgyal ni rdo rje gsum gyi ngo bo'i bde bar gshegs pa rnams so //
translated: The victors of the three indestructible vajras are the sugatas who are the essence of the three vajras.

original: de'i gzhi ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: de'i gzhi ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: Their ground is Great Vajradhara.

original: des tshig rtsub rmo la sogs pa yang lam du ston pas na /
analyzed: des tshig rtsub rmo la sogs pa yang lam du ston pas na /
translated: Since he teaches even harsh words, etc., as the path,

original: rdo rje dngos grub rab ston pas //
analyzed: rdo rje dngos grub rab ston pas //
translated: he is the one who teaches the supreme vajra attainment.

original: zhes so // bka' stsal to zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: zhes so // bka' stsal to zhes sbyar ro //
translated: The words “he said” are connected to this.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
translated: In the center of the realm of space,

original: zhes pa ni chos 'byung ba la'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni chos 'byung ba la'o //
translated: in the center of the source of phenomena.

original: dam tshig dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni mi 'da' bas na gzhal yas khang par @38a * //
analyzed: dam tshig dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni mi 'da' bas na gzhal yas khang par @38a * //
translated: The pledge maṇḍala is the celestial mansion, since it is not transgressed.

original: bsgom par bya'o zhes so //🔽dkon mchog dpal ni rab bsgom ste //
analyzed: bsgom par bya'o zhes so // dkon mchog dpal ni rab bsgom ste //
translated: It should be meditated upon.🔽The glorious jewel is fully meditated upon.

original: zhes pa ni dkon mchog dpal gtso bor gyur pa'i 'khor lo bsgoms te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni dkon mchog dpal gtso bor gyur pa'i 'khor lo bsgoms te /
translated: The wheel that is the principal glorious jewel is meditated upon.

original: de'i 'khor lo'i gzugs kun gyi 'od dag 'phro bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i 'khor lo'i gzugs kun gyi 'od dag 'phro bar bya'o //
translated: The light of all the forms of that wheel should radiate.

original: des 'dul ba'i skye bo rnams la phan pa'i don du rtsub ba'i ngag ces brtse ba med pa'i ngag go //
analyzed: des 'dul ba'i skye bo rnams la phan pa'i don du rtsub ba'i ngag ces brtse ba med pa'i ngag go //
translated: Harsh words are words without affection for the beings to be tamed.

original: sogs kyi sgras bsdus pa phra ma dang ngag 'khyal bas kyang phan btags pa'i bsam pas bsnyen na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes so //
analyzed: sogs kyi sgras bsdus pa phra ma dang ngag 'khyal bas kyang phan btags pa'i bsam pas bsnyen na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes so //
translated: And so on means that if one serves them with the intention of benefiting, one will obtain power, even through slander and idle speech.

original: 'di rnams kyang sngags pa re re dang ldan pas las kyi rgyal mchog la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyang sngags pa re re dang ldan pas las kyi rgyal mchog la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: And these should be applied to the supreme royal action by each mantra practitioner.

original: rang gi lha'i yan lag tu shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi lha'i yan lag tu shes par bya'o //
translated: They should be known as the limbs of one's deity.

original: rdo rje bkod pa zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsdus pas na bkod pa ste rdo rje 'chang ngo //
analyzed: rdo rje bkod pa zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsdus pas na bkod pa ste rdo rje 'chang ngo //
translated: The array of vajras is Vajradhara, because he includes the five Tathagatas.

original: de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes so //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes so //
translated: Thus he spoke.

original: sems ni bdag nyid kho nas so //
analyzed: sems ni bdag nyid kho nas so //
translated: The mind is by its very nature.

original: lus dang ngag ni sems dag pas so //
analyzed: lus dang ngag ni sems dag pas so //
translated: The body and speech are by the purity of the mind.

original: de ni de dang de las gsungs so //
analyzed: de ni de dang de las gsungs so //
translated: That is taught in this and that tantra.

original: phyin ci log gis gzung ba'i sems can rnams 'bras bu mi 'dod pa 'byung ba'i thad kar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu skyed pa ste /
analyzed: phyin ci log gis gzung ba'i sems can rnams 'bras bu mi 'dod pa 'byung ba'i thad kar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu skyed pa ste /
translated: Sentient beings who are grasped by error are directly produced with the desired result, even though they do not desire it.

original: chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes pa'i blo dang bas rang dang gzhan rnam pa'i dbye ba med pa'i mos pa can gyi rnal 'byor pas /
analyzed: chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes pa'i blo dang bas rang dang gzhan rnam pa'i dbye ba med pa'i mos pa can gyi rnal 'byor pas /
translated: The yogi/nī who is endowed with the mind that knows all phenomena to be like illusions, and who is devoted to the conviction that there is no distinction between self and others,

original: rang gi dam bca' ba'i lam bsgrub pa'i phyir rnal 'byor pa ste /
analyzed: rang gi dam bca' ba'i lam bsgrub pa'i phyir rnal 'byor pa ste /
translated: is a yogi/nī for the sake of accomplishing the path of one’s commitment.

original: ba lang dang zhing la sogs pa'i phyir ma yin pas nag por mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ba lang dang zhing la sogs pa'i phyir ma yin pas nag por mi 'gyur te /
translated: Since it is not for the sake of cattle, fields, and so on, it is not black.

original: bdag tu 'dzin na gzhan gyi 'du shes 'byung //
analyzed: bdag tu 'dzin na gzhan gyi 'du shes 'byung //
translated: If one grasps at self, the notion of other arises.

original: bdag dang gzhan gyi rnam pa'i cha gnyis kyis //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan gyi rnam pa'i cha gnyis kyis //
translated: By the two aspects of self and other,

original: nyes pa thams cad rab tu skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: nyes pa thams cad rab tu skye bar 'gyur //
translated: all faults arise.

original: zhes pa'o // sgyu ma mkhan gyis sems can mang po kun bsad par byas kyang de kun bsad pa med ces pa'i lung las kyang rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'o // sgyu ma mkhan gyis sems can mang po kun bsad par byas kyang de kun bsad pa med ces pa'i lung las kyang rtogs par bya'o //
translated: One should understand this also from the scripture that says, “Even though the magician kills many sentient beings, he does not kill anyone.”

original: de bas na dang po nas rnam par sbyong ba ste /
analyzed: de bas na dang po nas rnam par sbyong ba ste /
translated: Therefore, it is purified from the beginning.

original: phyis ni de'i 'bras bu'i phan yon la spyod pas na dam tshig ces par ming btags so //
analyzed: phyis ni de'i 'bras bu'i phan yon la spyod pas na dam tshig ces par ming btags so //
translated: Later, since one enjoys the benefit of the fruit of that, it is designated as “commitment.”

original: de bas na kha na ma tho ba las grol na byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ltar yang mi 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: de bas na kha na ma tho ba las grol na byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ltar yang mi 'gal ba'o //
translated: Therefore, if one is free from wrongdoing, it is not contradictory to act like a bodhisattva.

original: rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa spyod pa'i rgyud las kyang /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa spyod pa'i rgyud las kyang /
translated: The Vairocanābhisambodhi Tantra also says:

original: 'di na byang chub sems dpa' thams cad nas thams cad du srog gcod pa spang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di na byang chub sems dpa' thams cad nas thams cad du srog gcod pa spang bar bya'o //
translated: Here, a bodhisattva should completely abandon killing.🔽Otherwise, if one sees someone harming the Three Jewels, one should kill him.

original: gzhan du na dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa mthong phan cad do zhes @38b ba la sogs pa bslab pa'i bye brag mang por yang gsungs so //
analyzed: gzhan du na dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa mthong phan cad do zhes @38b ba la sogs pa bslab pa'i bye brag mang por yang gsungs so //
translated: Thus, it also teaches many specific trainings.

original: de bas na thabs dang bcas pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi las byed pa ni 'gal ba'i las su 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na thabs dang bcas pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi las byed pa ni 'gal ba'i las su 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, one who performs suchness karma with skillful means does not perform contradictory actions.

original: de bas na thabs thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la smad par bya ba 'ga' yang med do zhes mdo las kyang gsungs so //
analyzed: de bas na thabs thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la smad par bya ba 'ga' yang med do zhes mdo las kyang gsungs so //
translated: Thus, a sūtra also says, “There is nothing at all to criticize in a bodhisattva who knows all the skillful means.”

original: de bas na gzhan las kyang /
analyzed: de bas na gzhan las kyang /
translated: Therefore, another text also says:

original: gang dang gang gis bcings gyur pa //
analyzed: gang dang gang gis bcings gyur pa //
translated: Whatever binds someone

original: drag po'i las ni de dag kun //
analyzed: drag po'i las ni de dag kun //
translated: All of these are the fierce actions.

original: thabs dang bcas pa'i de nyid kyis //
analyzed: thabs dang bcas pa'i de nyid kyis //
translated: By the reality of the method,

original: srid pa'i 'ching las rnam par grol //
analyzed: srid pa'i 'ching las rnam par grol //
translated: one is liberated from the bonds of existence.

original: zhes so // de bas na le'u 'di'i bshad ba yang ji skad du /
analyzed: zhes so // de bas na le'u 'di'i bshad ba yang ji skad du /
translated: Therefore, the explanation of this chapter is also as follows.

original: rnam bcas dang ni rnam pa med //
analyzed: rnam bcas dang ni rnam pa med //
translated: With and without aspects,🔽the three minds of all the branches,🔽the action, the taking away,

original: yan lag thams cad yid gsum bdag / bya ba dang ni dbrog pa dang // nyid kyis bzlas shing spro bar bya //
analyzed: yan lag thams cad yid gsum bdag / bya ba dang ni dbrog pa dang // nyid kyis bzlas shing spro bar bya //
translated: the recitation, and the emanation.🔽Thus, hatred and delusion

original: de ltar zhe sdang gti mug dag / sa gsum du ni bskyed bya zhing //🔽gsang ba dag pas rgyas btab pa'i //
analyzed: de ltar zhe sdang gti mug dag / sa gsum du ni bskyed bya zhing // gsang ba dag pas rgyas btab pa'i //
translated: are generated in the three realms.🔽The one with the vajra, sealed by the pure secret,

original: rdo rje can gyis don byed do//
analyzed: rdo rje can gyis don byed do//
translated: performs the benefit.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa'i phan yon dang bcas pa rgyas par le'u bco brgyad pa las gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa'i phan yon dang bcas pa rgyas par le'u bco brgyad pa las gsungs so //
translated: Thus, along with the benefits, such as these, the eighteenth chapter explains extensively.

original: da ni rdo rje'i tshig rnams ma 'ongs pa'i skye bos shes par bya ba'i phyir gar gyi tshul du ngo mtshar che ba la sogs pa'i klan ka spang ba yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni rdo rje'i tshig rnams ma 'ongs pa'i skye bos shes par bya ba'i phyir gar gyi tshul du ngo mtshar che ba la sogs pa'i klan ka spang ba yang gsungs pa /
translated: Now, in order that future generations might understand the vajra words, he also taught the rejection of objections, such as the one concerning the wonder, in the manner of a dance.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then, etc.

original: de la dam tshig rdo rje zhes ba ni don yod par grub pa'o //
analyzed: de la dam tshig rdo rje zhes ba ni don yod par grub pa'o //
translated: There, the pledge-vajra is Amoghasiddhi.

original: de'i dpal ni sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'o //
analyzed: de'i dpal ni sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'o //
translated: His glory is Nivaranavishkambhin.

original: de la sogs pa byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen po rnams zhes so //
analyzed: de la sogs pa byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen po rnams zhes so //
translated: The bodhisattvas, the great beings, headed by those, etc.

original: ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni dam tshig bzhi la'o //
analyzed: ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni dam tshig bzhi la'o //
translated: The wonder is in the four pledges.

original: des rdo rje 'chang ba'i go 'phang thob par rmad du gyur nas zhes so //
analyzed: des rdo rje 'chang ba'i go 'phang thob par rmad du gyur nas zhes so //
translated: Having become amazed at the attainment of the state of Vajradhara, etc.

original: rdo rjes smras pa'i tshig ni rdo rje'i tshig ste smras so zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rjes smras pa'i tshig ni rdo rje'i tshig ste smras so zhes pa'o //
translated: The vajra-speech is the vajra-words.

original: de yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: de yang gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The Bhagavat, etc.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po zhes pa ni ngo mtshar gyi tshig mi gsungs zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po zhes pa ni ngo mtshar gyi tshig mi gsungs zhes pa'o //
translated: The lord of all tathagatas is the one who does not speak the words of wonder.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na khams gsum las 'das shing zhes te 'dod pa la sogs pa'i khams gsum gyi nyon mongs pa rnam par spangs pa zhes so //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na khams gsum las 'das shing zhes te 'dod pa la sogs pa'i khams gsum gyi nyon mongs pa rnam par spangs pa zhes so //
translated: Why is that? Because he has transcended the three realms, i.e., because he has abandoned the afflictions of the three realms of desire, etc.

original: gos dmar can lta bu'i lta ba ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gos dmar can lta bu'i lta ba ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach that it is not a view like that of the Red Robed🔽Ones,

original: 'jig rten thams cad las 'das pa zhes pa ni /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad las 'das pa zhes pa ni /
translated: it says, “beyond all worlds.”

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi khams gsum @39a * //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi khams gsum @39a * //
translated: All worlds are the three realms of all world systems.🔽The phrase “having abandoned the afflictions” is a reversal of the

original: gyi nyon mongs pa spangs pa'o zhes tshig de nyid log tu yang rnam par bsgyur ba ste /
analyzed: gyi nyon mongs pa spangs pa'o zhes tshig de nyid log tu yang rnam par bsgyur ba ste /
translated: words.

original: gang la yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang la yin zhe na /
translated: To whom?🔽“In the midst of the retinue of all tathāgatas and all bodhisattvas.”

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'khor gyi nang zhes te de rnams dang 'gal ba'i tshig gsung ba'i gnas ma yin par bstan to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'khor gyi nang zhes te de rnams dang 'gal ba'i tshig gsung ba'i gnas ma yin par bstan to //
translated: It is taught that it is not a place to speak words that contradict them.

original: 'di lta bu'i ngo mtshar gyi tshig lam zhes pa ni /
analyzed: 'di lta bu'i ngo mtshar gyi tshig lam zhes pa ni /
translated: The phrase “such a path of wondrous words”🔽means that one purifies one’s own and others’ continuums with the

original: srog gcod pa la sogs pa bdun gyis rang dang gzhan gyi rgyud rnam par dag par byed pa zhes so //
analyzed: srog gcod pa la sogs pa bdun gyis rang dang gzhan gyi rgyud rnam par dag par byed pa zhes so //
translated: seven, such as killing.

original: mi phyed pas na rdo rje'i tshig ste /
analyzed: mi phyed pas na rdo rje'i tshig ste /
translated: Since they are indivisible, they are vajra words.

original: ci'i slad du gsung zhes bcom ldan 'das la brgal ba'o //
analyzed: ci'i slad du gsung zhes bcom ldan 'das la brgal ba'o //
translated: “Why do you say that?” is a challenge to the Bhagavān.

original: dam tshig la 'gal bar mthong ba'i gang zag dmyal bar 'gro bar mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis brgal ba'i lan gsungs pa /
analyzed: dam tshig la 'gal bar mthong ba'i gang zag dmyal bar 'gro bar mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis brgal ba'i lan gsungs pa /
translated: Having seen that a person who is seen to violate the commitments goes to hell, the Tathagatas give the answer to the objection.

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then, etc.

original: rigs kyi bu zhes pa ni bod pa'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu zhes pa ni bod pa'o //
translated: Son of good family is the Tibetan for child.

original: 'du shes ngan pa zhes pa ni dam tshig las som nyi za bar 'du shes ngan pa'o //
analyzed: 'du shes ngan pa zhes pa ni dam tshig las som nyi za bar 'du shes ngan pa'o //
translated: Bad ideas are bad ideas of doubt about the commitments.

original: de nyid chos ma yin par rtogs pa ni dman pa'i 'du shes te de ma skyed cig pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid chos ma yin par rtogs pa ni dman pa'i 'du shes te de ma skyed cig pa'o //
translated: That itself is the idea of inferiority, which is the realization that it is not the Dharma. Do not generate that.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes slar brgal ba dang / lan gsungs pa sngags kyi spyod pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes slar brgal ba dang / lan gsungs pa sngags kyi spyod pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Why is that? is the objection, and the answer is the mantra conduct, etc.

original: de la shes pa dang skyob par ldan pa'i spyod pa ni sngags kyi spyod pa'o //
analyzed: de la shes pa dang skyob par ldan pa'i spyod pa ni sngags kyi spyod pa'o //
translated: Therein, the conduct endowed with knowledge and protection is the mantra conduct.

original: de ji lta bu zhe na spyod pa mchog go zhes te nyan thos la sogs pa'i spyod pa la ltos nas /
analyzed: de ji lta bu zhe na spyod pa mchog go zhes te nyan thos la sogs pa'i spyod pa la ltos nas /
translated: What is that like? Supreme conduct is in comparison with the conduct of the Sravakas, etc.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni mchog ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni mchog ste /
translated: The conduct of the Bodhisattvas is supreme.

original: de la gang gi don du 'gyur na 'gal yang rung ste spyod pa'o //
analyzed: de la gang gi don du 'gyur na 'gal yang rung ste spyod pa'o //
translated: If it is asked for whose sake, it is for the sake of engaging in conduct, even if it is contradictory.

original: de bas kyang mchog tu gyur pa ni sngags kyi spyod pa ste 'gal bar mi mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes so //
analyzed: de bas kyang mchog tu gyur pa ni sngags kyi spyod pa ste 'gal bar mi mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes so //
translated: Even more supreme than that is the conduct of mantra, because it is not seen as contradictory.

original: 'o na de gang gi spyod pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na de gang gi spyod pa yin zhe na /
translated: If it is asked, “Whose conduct is that?”

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa'i zhes smras so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa'i zhes smras so //
translated: it is said to be the conduct of the tathāgatas.

original: 'gal bar mi mthong ba'i rgyu gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'gal bar mi mthong ba'i rgyu gsungs pa /
translated: The cause of not seeing contradiction is stated:

original: rigs kyi bu zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Son of a good family,” and so on.

original: dper na zhes pa ni don nyid dper byas pa'o //
analyzed: dper na zhes pa ni don nyid dper byas pa'o //
translated: “For example” means that the meaning itself is used as an example.

original: nam mkha' ni thams cad rjes su song ba ste zhes pa ni de bzhin nyid kyi chos thams cad la khyab par bstan to //🔽nam mkha'i khongs su gtogs so zhes pa ni /
analyzed: nam mkha' ni thams cad rjes su song ba ste zhes pa ni de bzhin nyid kyi chos thams cad la khyab par bstan to // nam mkha'i khongs su gtogs so zhes pa ni /
translated: “Space is the universal pervasion” indicates that suchness pervades all phenomena.

original: phung po la sogs pa yang chos nyid las gzhan ma yin par bstan to //
analyzed: phung po la sogs pa yang chos nyid las gzhan ma yin par bstan to //
translated: “Space is included” indicates that the aggregates and so on are not different than dharmatā.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las kyang /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las kyang /
translated: Also, in the Perfection of Wisdom,

original: gzugs las stong pa nyid gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs las stong pa nyid gzhan ma yin no //
translated: “emptiness is not different than form.”

original: stod pa nyid las kyang @39b gzugs gzhan ma yin no zhes pa la sogs pa rgyas par gsungs so //
analyzed: stod pa nyid las kyang @39b gzugs gzhan ma yin no zhes pa la sogs pa rgyas par gsungs so //
translated: “Form is not other than emptiness.”

original: chos nyid kyis dag pa'i chos de gang na yang mi gnas pas mnyam pa nyid du gsungs pa /
analyzed: chos nyid kyis dag pa'i chos de gang na yang mi gnas pas mnyam pa nyid du gsungs pa /
translated: The Dharma that is pure by nature does not abide anywhere, so it is said to be sameness.

original: chos de dag kyang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: chos de dag kyang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: As for the statement “Those dharmas also . . . ,”

original: khams gsum ma lus mi gnas pas na bcud la mi gnas par bstan to //
analyzed: khams gsum ma lus mi gnas pas na bcud la mi gnas par bstan to //
translated: Since the three realms do not remain, it is taught that they do not remain in the world of beings.

original: 'byung ba chen po bzhi la mi gnas so zhes pa ni rten 'brel gyi stobs kyis rlung skye ba la sogs pas snod kyi 'jig rten grub ste /
analyzed: 'byung ba chen po bzhi la mi gnas so zhes pa ni rten 'brel gyi stobs kyis rlung skye ba la sogs pas snod kyi 'jig rten grub ste /
translated: The statement “They do not remain in the four great elements” means that the world of the environment is formed by the power of interdependence, with the arising of wind and so forth.

original: de la yang mi gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de la yang mi gnas pa'o //
translated: They do not remain in that either.

original: ci'i phyir na de bzhin nyid ni nyi tshe ba ma yin pas so //
analyzed: ci'i phyir na de bzhin nyid ni nyi tshe ba ma yin pas so //
translated: Why is that? Because suchness is not limited.

original: chos thams cad kyang de ltar rjes su rig par bya'o zhes pa ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyang de ltar rjes su rig par bya'o zhes pa ni /
translated: “All dharmas should be known in the same way” means

original: rang bzhin med par rig par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rang bzhin med par rig par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: that they should be known to be without intrinsic nature.

original: don gyi dbang de lta bu mkhyen cing zhes pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyis thams cad la khyab pa ste /
analyzed: don gyi dbang de lta bu mkhyen cing zhes pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyis thams cad la khyab pa ste /
translated: The line “knowing such a reality” refers to the all-pervasiveness of equality.

original: de la ni 'gal ba dang mi 'gal ba gnyis su snang ba mi rigs te /
analyzed: de la ni 'gal ba dang mi 'gal ba gnyis su snang ba mi rigs te /
translated: In that, it is not reasonable to see any contradiction or non-contradiction.

original: mnyam pa nyid med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it would follow that there would be no equality.

original: de lta bu la dgongs pa dang / de rnams la dga' ba'i sems can gyi bsam pa yang mkhyen nas gdod chos 'chad do zhes so //
analyzed: de lta bu la dgongs pa dang / de rnams la dga' ba'i sems can gyi bsam pa yang mkhyen nas gdod chos 'chad do zhes so //
translated: Having understood the intention in that way, and also the thought of sentient beings who delight in those, then one should teach the Dharma.

original: de bzhin nyid kyis dag par brjod pas na nam mkha'i tshig nges par brjod pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyis dag par brjod pas na nam mkha'i tshig nges par brjod pa'o //
translated: Since it is expressed as pure by suchness, it is the expression of the words of space.

original: de bas na dam tshig de dag kyang nam mkha'i rjes su rig par bya'o zhes te /
analyzed: de bas na dam tshig de dag kyang nam mkha'i rjes su rig par bya'o zhes te /
translated: Therefore, those commitments should also be known as the aftermath of space.

original: nam mkha' ltar rnam par dag par mos par bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: nam mkha' ltar rnam par dag par mos par bya'o zhes so //
translated: One should believe that they are pure like space.

original: de ltar de bzhin nyid kyis dag par bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin nyid kyis dag par bstan nas /
translated: Having taught purity in that way by suchness,

original: da ni so sor mi dmigs kyang rten 'brel las 'byung bar gsungs pa rigs kyi bu zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: da ni so sor mi dmigs kyang rten 'brel las 'byung bar gsungs pa rigs kyi bu zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: now, although not individually observed, it is said to arise from dependent origination.

original: gtsub shing dang zhes pa ni smyig ma la sogs pa'o ;
analyzed: gtsub shing dang zhes pa ni smyig ma la sogs pa'o ;
translated: The “kindling stick” is bamboo, etc.

original: / gtsub stan ni 'og gi shing ngo //
analyzed: / gtsub stan ni 'og gi shing ngo //
translated: The “support” is the wood below.

original: mi'i lag pa ni gtsub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: mi'i lag pa ni gtsub par byed pa'o //
translated: The “human hand” is the rubbing.

original: de skyed pa'i rkyen gyis dang por drod las du ba 'byung zhing /
analyzed: de skyed pa'i rkyen gyis dang por drod las du ba 'byung zhing /
translated: By the condition of its production, first smoke arises from heat,🔽and after that, from the small fire, a great flame arises.

original: de'i rjes la me chung ngu las me lce chen po 'byung bar 'gyur mod kyi zhes pa ni tshogs pa las zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de'i rjes la me chung ngu las me lce chen po 'byung bar 'gyur mod kyi zhes pa ni tshogs pa las zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “from the collection” is this.

original: me de gsum char la mi gnas pa ni so sor mi dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: me de gsum char la mi gnas pa ni so sor mi dmigs pa ste /
translated: The fire does not abide in any of the three, because it is not perceived individually.

original: rang bzhin gyis rnam par gnas pas na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i stobs kyis skye'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis rnam par gnas pas na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i stobs kyis skye'o //
translated: Since it abides by nature, it arises by the power of dependent origination.

original: nye bar 'gro ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: nye bar 'gro ba gsungs pa /
translated: The approach is stated:

original: rigs kyi bu zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Son of noble family,” etc.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces @40a * //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces @40a * //
translated: The “commitment of all the transcendent lords”

original: pa ni rnam pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: pa ni rnam pa bzhi'o //
translated: is fourfold.

original: de ltar rjes su rig par bya'o zhes pa ni nyam nga ba'i las kyis mi bzad par ltung ba'i las can gyi bsgrub bya de las bzlog par 'dod pa'i snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas /🔽gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyis zin pa'i cho ga'i thabs kyi bye brag ji ltar gsungs pas rgyas btab pas rjes su rig pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar rjes su rig par bya'o zhes pa ni nyam nga ba'i las kyis mi bzad par ltung ba'i las can gyi bsgrub bya de las bzlog par 'dod pa'i snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas / gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyis zin pa'i cho ga'i thabs kyi bye brag ji ltar gsungs pas rgyas btab pas rjes su rig pa ste /
translated: Thus, one should know means that the yogi/nī who is endowed with great compassion, who wishes to turn away the disciple who has the karma of falling into the unbearable [realms] due to the karma of being in a difficult situation,

original: rang dang gzhan rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rang dang gzhan rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: by the method of the rite that is conjoined with nondual gnosis, seals [the disciple] with the various [means] that are taught, and thus one should know that [the disciple] will be purified, both self and other.

original: de yang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i tshul gyis te /
analyzed: de yang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i tshul gyis te /
translated: Moreover, that is by the way of dependent origination,

original: gzhan du na de rnams kyang rnam par bcings pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na de rnams kyang rnam par bcings pa'i phyir ro //
translated: otherwise, they would be bound.

original: da ni 'gal bas las dag pa'i don rig pa las ngo mtshar pa'i tshig gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni 'gal bas las dag pa'i don rig pa las ngo mtshar pa'i tshig gsungs pa /
translated: Now, in order to teach the meaning of purifying karma through contradiction, [the Bhagavān] declares the words of amazement from the perspective of awareness:

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then, the Bhagavān,🔽Amazing!🔽Amazing!🔽The purity of suchness!

original: ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni de bzhin nyid kyis dag pa la'o //
analyzed: ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni de bzhin nyid kyis dag pa la'o //
translated: Marvelous!

original: rmad du gyur pa ni rten cing 'brel ba las 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: rmad du gyur pa ni rten cing 'brel ba las 'byung ba'o //
translated: The dependent origination!

original: thabs che zhing skyon med par shes pas dga' ba'i rtags su ngam zhing mig sngon legs par dpyad pa'i sa padma'i 'dab ma rangs pa lta bu gdangs te 'di skad ces smras so zhes so //
analyzed: thabs che zhing skyon med par shes pas dga' ba'i rtags su ngam zhing mig sngon legs par dpyad pa'i sa padma'i 'dab ma rangs pa lta bu gdangs te 'di skad ces smras so zhes so //
translated: Having understood that the method is great and faultless, he is delighted, and his eyes open wide like the petals of a lotus flower that has been well examined.

original: ngo mtshar rmad du gyur pa'i chos zhes pa ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: ngo mtshar rmad du gyur pa'i chos zhes pa ni bshad zin to //
translated: The Dharma that is wondrous and marvelous has been explained.

original: de nyid kyang dmigs pa med pa'i ye shes tsam du gnas pa na nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyang dmigs pa med pa'i ye shes tsam du gnas pa na nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa'o //
translated: Moreover, when it abides as mere non-apprehending gnosis, it is equal to space.

original: rnam par mi rtog dag pa zhes pa ni rtog ge ba rnams kyis brtag par mi nus shing mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas na don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog dag pa zhes pa ni rtog ge ba rnams kyis brtag par mi nus shing mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas na don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
translated: The pure non-conceptuality is the ultimate truth, which cannot be investigated by logicians and is free from all signs.

original: las shes pa ni lnga ba'i don du blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: las shes pa ni lnga ba'i don du blta bar bya'o //
translated: The knowledge of action should be seen as the meaning of the fifth.

original: don dam pa'i bden pa de la sgrib pa'i phyir kun rdzob ste dam tshig bzhi'o //
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pa de la sgrib pa'i phyir kun rdzob ste dam tshig bzhi'o //
translated: The conventional is so called because it obscures that ultimate truth, and it is the four commitments.

original: de yang mtshan ma med pa'i las so so'i rtsal sgyu ma tsam du 'byung ba'i kun rdzob kyis sbyong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang mtshan ma med pa'i las so so'i rtsal sgyu ma tsam du 'byung ba'i kun rdzob kyis sbyong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Moreover, it is because the conventional reality of the mere magical display of the individual powers of the karma of signlessness is purified.

original: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes yin yang gzung ba la sogs pas spros pa ni 'khrul pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes yin yang gzung ba la sogs pas spros pa ni 'khrul pa'o //
translated: Although it is nondual wisdom, the proliferation of apprehended objects and so on is delusion.

original: ji skad du /🔽bdag dang chos su nyer 'dogs pa //
analyzed: ji skad du / bdag dang chos su nyer 'dogs pa //
translated: As it is said:🔽The various designations

original: sna tshogs dag ni gang 'byung ba //
analyzed: sna tshogs dag ni gang 'byung ba //
translated: that occur as self and phenomena

original: de ni rnam par shes par 'gyur //🔽zhes pa bzhin no //
analyzed: de ni rnam par shes par 'gyur // zhes pa bzhin no //
translated: are consciousness.

original: don dam pa'i de kho na nyid ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: don dam pa'i de kho na nyid ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
translated: The reality of the ultimate is the ultimate truth.

original: des dag pa'i dam tshig ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa dag pa'o //
analyzed: des dag pa'i dam tshig ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa dag pa'o //
translated: The pure samaya of that is the purity of killing and so on.

original: de ston par byed pa'i gzhung ni le'u ste dgu pa'o //
analyzed: de ston par byed pa'i gzhung ni le'u ste dgu pa'o //
translated: The text that reveals that is the ninth chapter.

original: le'u dgu pa'i 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: le'u dgu pa'i 'grel pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary on the ninth chapter of The Profound Inner Principles, a teaching on the path of the perfection of wisdom.

original: // / rim pa gnyis la gzhol zhing phun sum tshogs pa ma tshang ba med pa'i rnal @40b 'byor bas /
analyzed: // / rim pa gnyis la gzhol zhing phun sum tshogs pa ma tshang ba med pa'i rnal @40b 'byor bas /
translated: The yogi/nī who is intent on the two stages and who is not lacking in the perfection of all the qualities

original: dbye ba'i sgo nas nyams 'og tu ma chud pa dang rang gi lha'i snying bo bskul ba'i phyir de'i thabs zhus pa /
analyzed: dbye ba'i sgo nas nyams 'og tu ma chud pa dang rang gi lha'i snying bo bskul ba'i phyir de'i thabs zhus pa /
translated: In order to bring into one's experience the division of the mantra, and in order to invoke the essence of one's deity, one asks for the method of that.

original: de rnams bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Those are the actions, etc.

original: yang 'dus te zhes ba ni le'u dang po la sogs pa'i rim pas so //
analyzed: yang 'dus te zhes ba ni le'u dang po la sogs pa'i rim pas so //
translated: Again, gathered together means in the order of the first chapter, etc.

original: gzhan ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: gzhan ni bshad zin to //
translated: The rest has been explained.

original: sngags kyi snying pos kun du 'dus pa zhes pa ni ;
analyzed: sngags kyi snying pos kun du 'dus pa zhes pa ni ;
translated: The mantra essence is the gathering of all.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni sngags te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni sngags te /
translated: The Tathagatas are the mantras.

original: de'i snying po ni 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'i phyir yi ge gsum mo //
analyzed: de'i snying po ni 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'i phyir yi ge gsum mo //
translated: Their essence is the three syllables, because they produce the desired result.

original: de nyid du thams cad bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid du thams cad bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of that, all is gathered.

original: de gang zhe na sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang ba bsgrags zhes so //
analyzed: de gang zhe na sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang ba bsgrags zhes so //
translated: What is that? The secret of body, speech, and mind is proclaimed.

original: de gang la dgos she na /
analyzed: de gang la dgos she na /
translated: For what purpose is that?🔽 The great power is the yogin who has mastered the true intuition, because he has the power born from the seal.🔽

original: dngos grub chen po zhes te yang dag pa'i ye shes dbang du gyur pa'i rnal 'byor ba ni phyag rgya las skyes pa'i dngos grub pas na chen po'o //
analyzed: dngos grub chen po zhes te yang dag pa'i ye shes dbang du gyur pa'i rnal 'byor ba ni phyag rgya las skyes pa'i dngos grub pas na chen po'o //
translated: The great power is the yogin who has mastered the true intuition, because he has the power born from the seal.

original: de'i tshul ni thabs te de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bskul ba'o //
analyzed: de'i tshul ni thabs te de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bskul ba'o //
translated: The way of that is the method, the invocation of the essence of the Tathagata.

original: gzhan las khyad par du 'grub pa'i phyir na mchog go //
analyzed: gzhan las khyad par du 'grub pa'i phyir na mchog go //
translated: It is supreme because it is accomplished as superior to others.

original: mi 'gyur ba'i de nyid rnyed pa las mi g-yo bas na de nyid de bshad du gsol zhes pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'gyur ba'i de nyid rnyed pa las mi g-yo bas na de nyid de bshad du gsol zhes pa'o //
translated: Since it is immovable from the attainment of unchanging reality, it is reality.

original: de'i lan bstan pa'i phyir de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i lan bstan pa'i phyir de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: In order to teach the answer to that, [the Bhagavān] declares, “Then the Bhagavān extended his golden arm, etc.”

original: nyon mongs kun gyi rgya mtsho zhes pa ni rang bzhin gyis nyon mongs pa ste /
analyzed: nyon mongs kun gyi rgya mtsho zhes pa ni rang bzhin gyis nyon mongs pa ste /
translated: The ocean of all afflictions is naturally afflicted.

original: srid pa gsum mo //
analyzed: srid pa gsum mo //
translated: It is the three existences.

original: de nyid 'dod chags la sogs pa'i chu srin dang / las la sogs pa'i rba rlabs dang / skye ba la sogs pa'i klong 'khyil ba dang ldan pas na rgya mtsho'o //
analyzed: de nyid 'dod chags la sogs pa'i chu srin dang / las la sogs pa'i rba rlabs dang / skye ba la sogs pa'i klong 'khyil ba dang ldan pas na rgya mtsho'o //
translated: Since it has crocodiles of passion, etc., waves of karma, etc., and whirlpools of birth, etc., it is an ocean.

original: der bying ba'i 'gro ba la chos ston pa'i phyag brkyang nas 'don pas na gtso bo'o //
analyzed: der bying ba'i 'gro ba la chos ston pa'i phyag brkyang nas 'don pas na gtso bo'o //
translated: Since he extends his hand to teach the Dharma to transmigrators who are drowning in that, he is the chief.

original: nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya'i 'od dang ldan pa'i ; lcags kyu 'phro bas 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya'i 'od dang ldan pa'i ; lcags kyu 'phro bas 'bar ba'o //
translated: He is blazing with the light of a hundred million suns, with the radiance of a hook.

original: khro bo'i cha lugs 'chang bas spyan rnam par bgrang ba'i phyir drag po rgyas pa'i spyan zhes bya ste /
analyzed: khro bo'i cha lugs 'chang bas spyan rnam par bgrang ba'i phyir drag po rgyas pa'i spyan zhes bya ste /
translated: Since he wears the attire of a wrathful one, he is called “wrathful one with eyes of expansion.”🔽

original: drag shul gyi gnas skabs su thams cad khro bor bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: drag shul gyi gnas skabs su thams cad khro bor bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since he wears the attire of a wrathful one, he is called “the eye of the expansion of Rudra,” because he displays all wrathful ones in the occasion of wrath.

original: lus dang ngag dang sems rnams ni //
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang sems rnams ni //
translated: The body, speech, and mind

original: zhes pa ni cung zad dag pa'i sku can gyi rnal 'byor ba'i'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni cung zad dag pa'i sku can gyi rnal 'byor ba'i'o //
translated: are the yoga of one who has a slightly pure body.

original: de ci zhe na /
analyzed: de ci zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjer bsgom zhes so //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjer bsgom zhes so //
translated: It is the meditation on the vajra body, speech, and mind.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: rnam par mi rtog ces te tha mal pa'i gzugs la sogs par ro //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog ces te tha mal pa'i gzugs la sogs par ro //
translated: It is nonconceptual, that is, it is not the ordinary form, and so on.

original: de la dmigs pa la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pas mi dmigs pa ste gzung 'dzin dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pas mi dmigs pa ste gzung 'dzin dang bral ba'o //
translated: It is not observed by consciousness that observes that, and so on, because it is free from subject and object.

original: de bas na /🔽gang la mi gnas mnyam pa nyid //🔽ces te / mnyam pa nyid ni nyi tshe ba ma yin te /🔽rten dang brten pa po @41a * //
analyzed: de bas na / gang la mi gnas mnyam pa nyid // ces te / mnyam pa nyid ni nyi tshe ba ma yin te / rten dang brten pa po @41a * //
translated: Therefore,🔽it is the equality that does not abide in anything.

original: la mnyam pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
