analyzed: la mnyam pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Equality is not limited, because there is no equality of the support and the supported.

original: de ltar sku gsung thugs bsgom pa dang ldan pas snying po bskul par bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar sku gsung thugs bsgom pa dang ldan pas snying po bskul par bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the evocation of the essence by means of the meditation on body, speech, and mind,

original: da ni snying po bskul ba'i rgyu ston pas gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni snying po bskul ba'i rgyu ston pas gsungs pa /
translated: now, in order to teach the cause of the evocation of the essence, he says:

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then, etc.

original: rang bzhin gyis dag pa zhes pa ni gdod nas ma skyes pa ste gnyen po skyes nas ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis dag pa zhes pa ni gdod nas ma skyes pa ste gnyen po skyes nas ma yin pa'o //
translated: The pure nature is the primordial non-arising, not the arising of the antidote.

original: de nyid pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: That itself is the perfection,

original: rang bzhin gyi shes rab po //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi shes rab po //
translated: the natural wisdom.

original: de nyid sngags kyi tshul te mi phyed pa'i phyir na rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de nyid sngags kyi tshul te mi phyed pa'i phyir na rdo rje'o //
translated: That itself is the mantra method, and because it is indivisible, it is the vajra.

original: de la rdo rje 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis snyoms par zhugs nas zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de la rdo rje 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis snyoms par zhugs nas zhes pa'o //
translated: Having entered into union by means of the method of the vajra-holder, he says:

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bod pa'o ;
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bod pa'o ;
translated: The Blessed One, all the Tathagatas, etc.

original: / mi bskyod pa la sogs pa zhes pa ni rang rang gi khams rnam par gnas pa rnams so //
analyzed: / mi bskyod pa la sogs pa zhes pa ni rang rang gi khams rnam par gnas pa rnams so //
translated: The Akshobhya, etc., are the individual elements that are present.

original: de nyid kyang rig pa zhes te zhi ba la sogs pa'i sgo nas bskul bas de dang de'i byed pa'i phyir na rig pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyang rig pa zhes te zhi ba la sogs pa'i sgo nas bskul bas de dang de'i byed pa'i phyir na rig pa'o //
translated: That is also called “awareness,” because it is called “awareness” because it is urged on by means of the peace, etc., and it does this and that.

original: de bas na de bskul bar byed pa la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na de bskul bar byed pa la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called that because it urges on that.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: so so zhi ba sogs bskul bas //
analyzed: so so zhi ba sogs bskul bas //
translated: Urged on by the peace, etc., of each,

original: las byed pa ni rigs par gsungs //
analyzed: las byed pa ni rigs par gsungs //
translated: It is said that the action is awareness.

original: zhes 'jig rten sgron ma las bshad do //
analyzed: zhes 'jig rten sgron ma las bshad do //
translated: This is explained in the Lokapradipika.

original: de lta bu'i 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang zhes so //
analyzed: de lta bu'i 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang zhes so //
translated: “With such a retinue of many hundreds of thousands of millions of billions” and so on.

original: ci byed ce na sems can gyi don byed pa'i rol pa rab tu ston pa yod de zhes te /
analyzed: ci byed ce na sems can gyi don byed pa'i rol pa rab tu ston pa yod de zhes te /
translated: What does it do? “It shows the play of working for the welfare of sentient beings.”

original: sems can rnams smin pa dang grol ba la brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yod kyang zhes so //
analyzed: sems can rnams smin pa dang grol ba la brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yod kyang zhes so //
translated: “Even though it is diligent in ripening and liberating sentient beings” and so on.

original: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na gang zag 'di lta bu la mi gzigs zhes pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na gang zag 'di lta bu la mi gzigs zhes pa'o //
translated: “In the worlds of the ten directions, it does not see such a person.”

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag gis rol dgyes pa yongs su spyod pa yod kyang zhes te /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag gis rol dgyes pa yongs su spyod pa yod kyang zhes te /
translated: “Even though it enjoys and indulges in the five sense objects” and so on.

original: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa lha mo'i gzugs la sogs pa la zla ba drug la sogs pa'i rim pa dang rab tu spyod pa yod pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa lha mo'i gzugs la sogs pa la zla ba drug la sogs pa'i rim pa dang rab tu spyod pa yod pa'o //
translated: The yogi who is obstructed by one birth, etc. , has the practice of the form of the goddess, etc. , for six months, etc.

original: de la mi gzigs pa'i rgyu gsungs pa /
analyzed: de la mi gzigs pa'i rgyu gsungs pa /
translated: The reason for not seeing that is stated:

original: kye ma zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: kye ma zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Alas, alas!”

original: kye ma zhes pa ni ma mgu ba'o //
analyzed: kye ma zhes pa ni ma mgu ba'o //
translated: “Alas” is dissatisfaction.

original: 'di dag ni zhes pa ni sgrub pa po de'o //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid sngags te /
analyzed: 'di dag ni zhes pa ni sgrub pa po de'o // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid sngags te /
translated: “These” are the adepts.🔽The mantra of all the Tathāgatas is the seven, the maṇḍala, etc.

original: de'i spyod pa ni dkyil 'khor la sogs pa bdun la 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: de'i spyod pa ni dkyil 'khor la sogs pa bdun la 'jug pa'o //
translated: Its conduct is the engagement in the maṇḍala, etc.

original: de nyid la tshul zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid la tshul zhes bya'o //
translated: That itself is called the “method.”

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'dzin pa'i phyir na chos so //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'dzin pa'i phyir na chos so //
translated: It is the Dharma because it holds the illusion-like samādhi.

original: de rdzogs par gyur to snyam pa ni dgongs pa ste /
analyzed: de rdzogs par gyur to snyam pa ni dgongs pa ste /
translated: It is thought that it is perfected.

original: gang gi tshe rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa'o //
translated: When one practices with concepts.

original: de'i @41b tshe rnal 'byor pa dag par mi 'gyur te rnam par rtog pa'i rba rlabs ma 'phros pas gzhan la thugs yengs pa ltar mi dgongs na spyan ras kyis mi 'tsho ste zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i @41b tshe rnal 'byor pa dag par mi 'gyur te rnam par rtog pa'i rba rlabs ma 'phros pas gzhan la thugs yengs pa ltar mi dgongs na spyan ras kyis mi 'tsho ste zhes pa'o //
translated: At that time, the yogi does not become pure, because the waves of discursive thought do not arise. If he does not think like someone else whose mind is distracted, he does not live by the grace of the vision.

original: de la rdo rje 'chang chen po spyan ras kyis 'tsho ba'i thabs kyi snying po gsungs pa /
analyzed: de la rdo rje 'chang chen po spyan ras kyis 'tsho ba'i thabs kyi snying po gsungs pa /
translated: To that, Great Vajradhara taught the essence of the method of living by the grace of the vision:

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then, etc.

original: sngags thams cad ces pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
analyzed: sngags thams cad ces pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
translated: All mantras are the Tathagatas.

original: de rnams kyi snying po ni thugs te de sgrub pa po la dgongs par bya ba'i phyir kun du skul bar byed pa ni snying po'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi snying po ni thugs te de sgrub pa po la dgongs par bya ba'i phyir kun du skul bar byed pa ni snying po'o //
translated: Their essence is the mind, and in order to make that the object of the practitioner's thought, it is the essence that stimulates.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: de rnams kyi rnam par dag pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de rnams kyi rnam par dag pa gsungs pa /
translated: He taught their purity:🔽The Tathagata, etc.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes pa la sogs pas ni sku'i sgo nas dag pa'i aom gsungs te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes pa la sogs pas ni sku'i sgo nas dag pa'i aom gsungs te /
translated: By the body, he taught the pure Om.

original: sku dang mi 'bral ba nyid kyi phyir na gnyis kyang gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: sku dang mi 'bral ba nyid kyi phyir na gnyis kyang gsungs pa'o //
translated: Because it is inseparable from the body, it is also taught as two.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes pa la sogs pas ni thugs kyi sgo nas dag pa'i h'um gsungs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes pa la sogs pas ni thugs kyi sgo nas dag pa'i h'um gsungs so //
translated: Likewise, “vajra-holder” and so on, with the mind, he utters the pure hūṃ.

original: chos 'dzin pa zhes pa la sogs pa ni gsung gi sgo nas dag pa'i a'a:gsungs so ;
analyzed: chos 'dzin pa zhes pa la sogs pa ni gsung gi sgo nas dag pa'i a'a:gsungs so ;
translated: “ Dharma-holder” and so on, with speech, he utters the pure āḥ.

original: / nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang ba las rnam par bsgyur ba'i dbye bas go rims bzhin du phyung ba'o //
analyzed: / nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang ba las rnam par bsgyur ba'i dbye bas go rims bzhin du phyung ba'o //
translated: “ From his own body, speech, and mind vajras” means that, by the division of the transformation of the vajra-holder, they are respectively emitted.

original: tshig gi lam nges par brjod pas zhes pa ni tshig gi brjod pa med pa'i ngo bo la rnam par 'gyur ba'i dbye bas bcom ldan 'das ma gnas su zhugs pas sngags bsdus pa ste /
analyzed: tshig gi lam nges par brjod pas zhes pa ni tshig gi brjod pa med pa'i ngo bo la rnam par 'gyur ba'i dbye bas bcom ldan 'das ma gnas su zhugs pas sngags bsdus pa ste /
translated: “ By the expression of the path of words” means that, by the division of the transformation of the nature of the inexpressible expression of words, the Bhagavatī enters the place, and the mantra is collected.

original: yi ge lnga'i ngo bo gsungs so zhes pa'o //
analyzed: yi ge lnga'i ngo bo gsungs so zhes pa'o //
translated: He utters the nature of the five syllables.

original: de'i  gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i  gsungs pa /
translated: He says that:

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then, and so on.

original: sangs rgyas ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The buddhas are Akṣobhya and so on.

original: sras ni de'i rigs las skyes pa ste /
analyzed: sras ni de'i rigs las skyes pa ste /
translated: The sons are born from their families.

original: rab tu 'dar zhing brgyal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rab tu 'dar zhing brgyal bar 'gyur //
translated: They tremble and faint.

original: zhes pa ni sgrub pa po la mi gzigs pa sngags des dam tshig las bsnyengs pa'i 'jigs pa yod pas na di ltar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni sgrub pa po la mi gzigs pa sngags des dam tshig las bsnyengs pa'i 'jigs pa yod pas na di ltar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: This is the case because the practitioner is afraid of transgressing the pledge due to the fear of the consequence of the mantra.

original: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran nas dngos grub stsol bar 'gyur ro zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran nas dngos grub stsol bar 'gyur ro zhes sbyar ro //
translated: Then, recollecting Vajrasattva, he will grant spiritual powers.

original: de bas na gong gi sngags de'i lha'i rnal 'byor du gnas pas de 'dra ba'i mthu dang ldan pa'i bar du 'gyur ro zhes ji snyed pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na gong gi sngags de'i lha'i rnal 'byor du gnas pas de 'dra ba'i mthu dang ldan pa'i bar du 'gyur ro zhes ji snyed pa'o //
translated: Therefore, by abiding in the deity yoga of the above mantra, one will become endowed with such power.

original: de nas zla ba gnyis gcig tu gyur pa'i de ma thag tu h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje h'um dang ldan pas chog gnyis pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nas zla ba gnyis gcig tu gyur pa'i de ma thag tu h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje h'um dang ldan pas chog gnyis pa gsungs pa /
translated: Then, immediately after the two moons become one, from the syllable hūṃ arises a vajra marked with hūṃ, which is the second permission.

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then, Vajrapāṇi, etc.

original: phyag na rdo rje zhes pa ni rdo rje las gyur cing de phyag na gnas pa ste rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje zhes pa ni rdo rje las gyur cing de phyag na gnas pa ste rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: Vajrapāṇi is born from the vajra and resides in his hand, that is, Mahāvajradhara.

original: mi 'da' bas na dam @42a * //
analyzed: mi 'da' bas na dam @42a * //
translated: Since he does not transgress, he is a pledge.

original: tshig go // nam mkha'i dbyings zhes pa ni chos 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: tshig go // nam mkha'i dbyings zhes pa ni chos 'byung ba'o //
translated: The realm of space is the source of phenomena.

original: de'i dbus la gnas par zhes so //
analyzed: de'i dbus la gnas par zhes so //
translated: In its center, one should visualize the syllable hūṃ.

original: bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad bkod pa'i ngo bo rtag pa las byung ba'i gzhal yas khang pa bsgom par bya zhes so //
analyzed: bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad bkod pa'i ngo bo rtag pa las byung ba'i gzhal yas khang pa bsgom par bya zhes so //
translated: The maṇḍala array is the nature of the array of all buddhas, and one should visualize the celestial mansion arisen from the essence of permanence.

original: de'i dbus na gnas pa'i yi ge h'um zhes pa ni de'i dbus kyi gdan la zla ba gcig pa 'od zer 'phro zhing 'du ba'i sbyor ba las h'um dkar por gyur pa ste cho ga gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dbus na gnas pa'i yi ge h'um zhes pa ni de'i dbus kyi gdan la zla ba gcig pa 'od zer 'phro zhing 'du ba'i sbyor ba las h'um dkar por gyur pa ste cho ga gnyis pa'o //
translated: In its center, the syllable hūṃ is the moon in the center of the seat, which becomes a white hūṃ through the yoga of the emission and gathering of light rays. This is the second rite.🔽One should imagine one’s own form.

original: rang gi gzugs su rab tu brtag / ces pa ni de nyid 'od zer 'phro zhing 'du bas rang las 'byung ba'i gzugs su brtag pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi gzugs su rab tu brtag / ces pa ni de nyid 'od zer 'phro zhing 'du bas rang las 'byung ba'i gzugs su brtag pa'o //
translated: One should imagine one’s own form arisen from the emission and gathering of light rays.

original: de gang zhe na /
analyzed: de gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: rdo rje 'od zer rab tu 'bar //
analyzed: rdo rje 'od zer rab tu 'bar //
translated: The vajra is blazing with light rays.

original: zhes te me shel lta bu bum pa dmar skya ba gzugs la sogs pa dang / rtag pa la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'og dang gong gi tshul rtse lnga dang ldan pa /
analyzed: zhes te me shel lta bu bum pa dmar skya ba gzugs la sogs pa dang / rtag pa la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'og dang gong gi tshul rtse lnga dang ldan pa /
translated: Like a fire crystal, the vase is reddish-white, and because it is purified of the aspects of form, etc., and permanence, etc., it has five points above and below.

original: bum pa la yang h'um dang ldan pa /
analyzed: bum pa la yang h'um dang ldan pa /
translated: The vase also has a hūṃ.

original: phyogs kun nas thub pa'i dbang po'i sku'i 'od zer 'phro ba rnam par bsam pa ni cho ga gsung pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs kun nas thub pa'i dbang po'i sku'i 'od zer 'phro ba rnam par bsam pa ni cho ga gsung pa'o //
translated: The light rays emanating from the body of the Lord of Sages on all sides is the rite of visualization.

original: des so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes kyang bstan pa'o //
analyzed: des so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes kyang bstan pa'o //
translated: By that, the discernment intuition is also taught.

original: le'u bcu gsum pa'i nga rgyal bya ba'i de ma thag tu /
analyzed: le'u bcu gsum pa'i nga rgyal bya ba'i de ma thag tu /
translated: Immediately after the pride in the thirteenth chapter,

original: le'u dang po gsang ba las byung ba bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: le'u dang po gsang ba las byung ba bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: in order to teach the first chapter, the origin of the secret, it is said “buddha” and so on.🔽There,

original: de la / sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs //
analyzed: de la / sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs //
translated: the body, speech, and mind of all buddhas

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: is said.

original: sa bon gyi 'od kyis reg pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i skur byas pa ni rdo rje gsum las mi 'da' ba'i phyir na de skad de rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'o //
analyzed: sa bon gyi 'od kyis reg pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i skur byas pa ni rdo rje gsum las mi 'da' ba'i phyir na de skad de rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'o //
translated: The buddhas touched by the light rays of the seed syllable, made into the body of the vajra holder, are not beyond the three vajras, and therefore it is said that they originate from Vajrasattva.

original: ji ltar byung zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar byung zhe na /
translated: How do they originate?

original: bsdus te de yis rnam bsgoms na //
analyzed: bsdus te de yis rnam bsgoms na //
translated: Having gathered them, he should visualize them.

original: zhes te 'od zer gyi lcags kyus de rnams bkug ste /
analyzed: zhes te 'od zer gyi lcags kyus de rnams bkug ste /
translated: The hooks of the light rays draw them in,

original: sa bon la bcug pa ni bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: sa bon la bcug pa ni bsgom pa'o //
translated: and their entry into the seed syllable is the visualization.

original: de ma thag tu zhes pa ni zhugs ma thag tu'o //
analyzed: de ma thag tu zhes pa ni zhugs ma thag tu'o //
translated: “Immediately” means as soon as one has entered.

original: de gyur pa zhes pa ni h'um dang ldan pa'i rdo rje gnas gyur pa zhes so //
analyzed: de gyur pa zhes pa ni h'um dang ldan pa'i rdo rje gnas gyur pa zhes so //
translated: “That” refers to the transformation of the vajra endowed with the syllable hūṃ.

original: de cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bu rdo rje sems dpa' zhes te rdo rje'i ngo bo dang ldan pa mdzes par byed pas na rgyal po che'o //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bu rdo rje sems dpa' zhes te rdo rje'i ngo bo dang ldan pa mdzes par byed pas na rgyal po che'o //
translated: “Vajrasattva” is like the vajra-holder of body, speech, and mind, and is the “great king” because it is beautiful with the nature of the vajra.

original: lha thams cad kyi snang bar byed pa'i rkyen du gyur pas na kun gyi gtso bo'o //
analyzed: lha thams cad kyi snang bar byed pa'i rkyen du gyur pas na kun gyi gtso bo'o //
translated: It is the “chief of all” because it is the condition for the illumination of all deities.

original: thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pas na dbang phyug mchog ste le'u dang po las gsungs pa ltar bsgom par bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pas na dbang phyug mchog ste le'u dang po las gsungs pa ltar bsgom par bya'o zhes so //
translated: It is the “supreme lord” because it is the master of all. One should meditate on it as described in the first chapter.

original: da ni zla bar zhu pa'i cho ga rdzogs @42b pa'i de ma thag tu rang gi sa bon las rang gi 'khor lo bskyed pa cho ga gnyis pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni zla bar zhu pa'i cho ga rdzogs @42b pa'i de ma thag tu rang gi sa bon las rang gi 'khor lo bskyed pa cho ga gnyis pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, immediately after the completion of the rite of the moon, the second rite is taught, the generation of one’s own wheel from one’s own seed syllable.

original: rang gi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: [The Bhagavān] declares this, beginning with “one’s own,” and so on.

original: rang gi 'khor zhes pa ni rang gi lha'i 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: rang gi 'khor zhes pa ni rang gi lha'i 'khor lo'o //
translated: “One’s own wheel” is one’s own deity wheel.

original: rang sngags kyi zhes pa ni gtso bo'i snying po kho na bskyed pa ste rang rang gi sa bon gyis ma yin no //
analyzed: rang sngags kyi zhes pa ni gtso bo'i snying po kho na bskyed pa ste rang rang gi sa bon gyis ma yin no //
translated: One's own mantra means that only the essence of the principal is generated, not by one's own seed.

original: chos kyi dbyings las mi 'byung ba'i phyir dang / sngags gcig bzlas pas thams cad ma bzlas pa'i skyon yin pas na dbye ba nye bar blangs pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings las mi 'byung ba'i phyir dang / sngags gcig bzlas pas thams cad ma bzlas pa'i skyon yin pas na dbye ba nye bar blangs pa'o //
translated: Since it does not arise from the dharmadhātu, and since it is the fault of not having recited all [mantras] by reciting one mantra, the division is taken up.

original: sngags rnams ni lha thams cad kyi snying po bsdus pa yin zhes te /
analyzed: sngags rnams ni lha thams cad kyi snying po bsdus pa yin zhes te /
translated: The mantras are the essence of all the deities.

original: gtso bo las byung ba bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtso bo las byung ba bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because they are taught to arise from the principal.

original: da ni gong du gsungs pa'i bskul ba'i sngags dang 'brel pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bskul ba'i thabs gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni gong du gsungs pa'i bskul ba'i sngags dang 'brel pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bskul ba'i thabs gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the method of invoking the essence of the tathāgatas in connection with the previously mentioned invocation mantra is taught.

original: rang sngags zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rang sngags zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: [It begins] with one's own mantra and so forth.

original: rang gi sngags las skyes pa'i skyes bu ni lha rnams te /
analyzed: rang gi sngags las skyes pa'i skyes bu ni lha rnams te /
translated: The beings born from one's own mantra are the deities.

original: ji bzhin pa'i cho gas bsgoms nas su zhes so //
analyzed: ji bzhin pa'i cho gas bsgoms nas su zhes so //
translated: Having meditated on them with the proper ritual,

original: de rnams kyi gnas bzhi rnams su zhes te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi gnas bzhi rnams su zhes te /
translated: in their four places,

original: mgo dang mgrin pa dang nu ma'i bar dang thugs ka rnams su'o //
analyzed: mgo dang mgrin pa dang nu ma'i bar dang thugs ka rnams su'o //
translated: The three places are the head, throat, and the space between the breasts and the heart.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How?🔽The form of the body, that is, the form of passion, etc.

original: gzugs kyi tshul te 'dod chags la sogs pa'i gzugs te de yang /
analyzed: gzugs kyi tshul te 'dod chags la sogs pa'i gzugs te de yang /
translated: That is,

original: zhal gsum tshul du sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: zhal gsum tshul du sbyor ba yis //
translated: through the application of the three faces.

original: zhes te rig ma dang ldan bar dkar po la sogs pa'i kha dog gsum du bsgom mo zhes so //
analyzed: zhes te rig ma dang ldan bar dkar po la sogs pa'i kha dog gsum du bsgom mo zhes so //
translated: That is, one should meditate on the three colors, white, etc., in union with the knowledge woman.

original: de rnams kyis ni lha rnams kyi phyag rgya bzhi gsungs so //
analyzed: de rnams kyis ni lha rnams kyi phyag rgya bzhi gsungs so //
translated: These verses explain the four seals of the deities.

original: rdo rje gsum dang ye shes sems dpa' ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pas na rdo rje'i dam tshig go //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum dang ye shes sems dpa' ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pas na rdo rje'i dam tshig go //
translated: The three vajras and the gnosis being are not to be transgressed, and so they are the vajra commitments.

original: mdor bsdus pa de rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: mdor bsdus pa de rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to understand that in brief,

original: de la 'di ni zhes pa rgyas par gsungs pa /
analyzed: de la 'di ni zhes pa rgyas par gsungs pa /
translated: it is said,

original: rdo rje mchog ni rdo rje gsum mo //
analyzed: rdo rje mchog ni rdo rje gsum mo //
translated: The supreme vajra is the three vajras.

original: de'i gsang ba ni de bskyed pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: de'i gsang ba ni de bskyed pa'i cho ga'o //
translated: Its secret is the rite of generating that.

original: ji ltar zhe na /🔽snying ga'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na / snying ga'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: How?🔽The heart, etc.

original: de la snying ga'i zhes pa ni mtshon pa tsam ste gzhan yang bsdu'o //
analyzed: de la snying ga'i zhes pa ni mtshon pa tsam ste gzhan yang bsdu'o //
translated: There, the heart is merely an illustration, and the others are included.

original: de rnams su sa bon las byung ba'i mtshan ma'i dbus su zhes so //
analyzed: de rnams su sa bon las byung ba'i mtshan ma'i dbus su zhes so //
translated: In those, in the middle of the sign arisen from the seed syllable.

original: phra mo'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni phyag rgya bzhi ste ;
analyzed: phra mo'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni phyag rgya bzhi ste ;
translated: The subtle maṇḍala is the four mudras,

original: sa bon dang mtshan ma phra mo las bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sa bon dang mtshan ma phra mo las bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are generated from the subtle seed syllable and sign.

original: de bsams la yi ge mchog tu gyur pa'i tshig ni rang rang gi sa bon no //
analyzed: de bsams la yi ge mchog tu gyur pa'i tshig ni rang rang gi sa bon no //
translated: The supreme syllable is the individual seed syllable.

original: de'i dbus su zhes pa ni de rnams kyi thugs kar zla ba'i dbus su rang gi sa bon bsam par bya zhes so //
analyzed: de'i dbus su zhes pa ni de rnams kyi thugs kar zla ba'i dbus su rang gi sa bon bsam par bya zhes so //
translated: In the middle of that means that one should imagine the individual seed syllable in the middle of the moon in the heart of those.

original: de las cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de las cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What happens from that?

original: rdo rje chen po rtse lnga @43a * //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po rtse lnga @43a * //
translated: The great five-tined vajra.

original: pa zhes te h'um las skyes pa'i rdo rje tha mal pa ma yin pas rdo rje chen po rtse lnga par bsams la /
analyzed: pa zhes te h'um las skyes pa'i rdo rje tha mal pa ma yin pas rdo rje chen po rtse lnga par bsams la /
translated: Since the vajra arisen from hūṃ is not ordinary, it is the great five-tined vajra.

original: de'i dbus su yang h'um gis mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dbus su yang h'um gis mtshan pa'o //
translated: In the middle of that, it is also marked with hūṃ.

original: de ni zhes pa ni nyin mtshan du'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes pa ni nyin mtshan du'o //
translated: That means day and night.

original: sbyor ba ni ting nge 'dzin gsum gyis sbyor bas bsgom par bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: sbyor ba ni ting nge 'dzin gsum gyis sbyor bas bsgom par bya'o zhes so //
translated: The yoga is the union with the three meditative absorptions.

original: de ltar skul byed kyi gzhi rnam par bkod nas skul byed kyi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar skul byed kyi gzhi rnam par bkod nas skul byed kyi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Having thus set forth the basis of the urging, in order to demonstrate the special features of the urging,

original: rdo rje kyo ba'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje kyo ba'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: the vajra hook and so forth.

original: de la h'um las 'phros pa'i thugs kyi rdo rje rlung gi shing rta la gnas pa'i lcags kyu thogs pa ni rdo rje kyo ba'o //
analyzed: de la h'um las 'phros pa'i thugs kyi rdo rje rlung gi shing rta la gnas pa'i lcags kyu thogs pa ni rdo rje kyo ba'o //
translated: Therein, the vajra hook is the mental vajra which emanates from the syllable hūṃ, and is endowed with a hook, mounted on a chariot of wind.

original: de la gzhan yang 'phro ba'i phyir na /
analyzed: de la gzhan yang 'phro ba'i phyir na /
translated: Since it emanates from that,

original: rdo rje gsum rnams bsam par bya //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum rnams bsam par bya //
translated: one should imagine the three vajras.

original: zhes so // des ci byed ce na /
analyzed: zhes so // des ci byed ce na /
translated: What does it do?

original: de yi snying gar btab byas te //
analyzed: de yi snying gar btab byas te //
translated: It strikes at the heart,

original: zhes pa ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings na bzhugs pa'i bde bar gshegs pa sgrub pa po la btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams kyi thugs la brdeg pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings na bzhugs pa'i bde bar gshegs pa sgrub pa po la btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams kyi thugs la brdeg pa ste /
translated: striking at the heart of the Sugatas who abide in the realm of non-abiding nirvana, and who are indifferent to the practitioner.

original: des yongs su dag pa'i lha rnams gong ma ltar gyur nas rab tu bskul bar bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: des yongs su dag pa'i lha rnams gong ma ltar gyur nas rab tu bskul bar bya'o zhes so //
translated: By that, the completely pure deities become as before, and one should urge them.

original: 'di las gang la dgongs she na /
analyzed: 'di las gang la dgongs she na /
translated: What is the intention of this?

original: 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi //
analyzed: 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi //
translated: This is the vajra of all vajras,

original: sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa'o //
translated: and the enlightenment of the Buddhas.

original: zhes so // thugs kyi rdo rje bstan nas sku dang gsung gi rdo rje yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhes so // thugs kyi rdo rje bstan nas sku dang gsung gi rdo rje yang gsungs pa /
translated: Having taught the mind-vajra, he also taught the body and speech vajras:

original: 'khor lo zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The wheel, etc.

original: gong ltar rang rang gi sa bon las skyes pa'i mtshan ma sa bon gyis mtshan pa las 'phros pa'i rlung gi shing rta la gnas pa'i sku'i rdo rje lcags kyus mtshan pa ni 'khor lo kyo ba'o //
analyzed: gong ltar rang rang gi sa bon las skyes pa'i mtshan ma sa bon gyis mtshan pa las 'phros pa'i rlung gi shing rta la gnas pa'i sku'i rdo rje lcags kyus mtshan pa ni 'khor lo kyo ba'o //
translated: As before, the sign born from one's own seed-syllable, marked with the seed-syllable, is the hook of the wheel, marked with the hook of the body-vajra, standing on the chariot of wind that radiates forth.

original: gsung gi rdo rje ni padma'i rigs kyi kyo ba'o //
analyzed: gsung gi rdo rje ni padma'i rigs kyi kyo ba'o //
translated: The speech-vajra is the hook of the lotus family.

original: rang gi lha'i rnam pa lta bu ni sogs kyi sgras bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi lha'i rnam pa lta bu ni sogs kyi sgras bsdus pa'o //
translated: The form like one's own deity is included by the word etc.

original: de bas na rdo rje gsum gyi kyo ba rnam par bsgom zhing lha rnams kyi snying la dgug pa'i don du bskul bar bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: de bas na rdo rje gsum gyi kyo ba rnam par bsgom zhing lha rnams kyi snying la dgug pa'i don du bskul bar bya'o zhes so //
translated: Therefore, one should visualize the hooks of the three vajras and summon the deities for the purpose of drawing them into one's heart.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa dpag med kyis gar mkhan bzang po ltar 'gro ba'i don byed pa ni rol mo ste thabs de las byung ba'i phyir na 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa dpag med kyis gar mkhan bzang po ltar 'gro ba'i don byed pa ni rol mo ste thabs de las byung ba'i phyir na 'byung ba'o //
translated: The emanations of body, speech, and mind, which are beyond measure, perform the welfare of beings like a good dancer. This is the play, and since it arises from that method, it is the arising.

original: rdo rje ni zhes pa la sogs pas thabs kyi che ba bstan pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni zhes pa la sogs pas thabs kyi che ba bstan pa'o //
translated: The verse beginning with “vajra” teaches the greatness of the method.

original: de las rdo rje thob par byed pa'i thabs kyi gtso bo rdo rje ni tshul mchog go //
analyzed: de las rdo rje thob par byed pa'i thabs kyi gtso bo rdo rje ni tshul mchog go //
translated: The chief method for attaining the vajra is the supreme method.

original: dus ni zhag bdun par du zhes so //
analyzed: dus ni zhag bdun par du zhes so //
translated: The time is for seven days.

original: tha mal ba'i 'bras bu ni ye shes rdo rje can ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: tha mal ba'i 'bras bu ni ye shes rdo rje can ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
translated: The ordinary result is the one who possesses the vajra of gnosis, the tathāgata.

original: de'i gsang ba ni sku dang gsung dang thugs te sku gsum mo //
analyzed: de'i gsang ba ni sku dang gsung dang thugs te sku gsum mo //
translated: His secret is the body, speech, and mind, the three bodies.

original: de sbyor ba @43b 'dis 'grub par 'gyur zhes so //
analyzed: de sbyor ba @43b 'dis 'grub par 'gyur zhes so //
translated: That is accomplished by this yoga.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan ras kyis de'i gong du 'tsho ba'i phyir na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan ras kyis de'i gong du 'tsho ba'i phyir na /
translated: Since the tathāgatas watch over him with compassion,

original: mchog stsol bas ni rnam par gzigs //
analyzed: mchog stsol bas ni rnam par gzigs //
translated: he is seen by the bestowal of the supreme.

original: zhes so // rang gi bya ba chad pas bshig par dogs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes so // rang gi bya ba chad pas bshig par dogs pa'i phyir /
translated: Since he fears that his own actions will be destroyed,

original: yid ni 'jigs shing skrag gyur nas //
analyzed: yid ni 'jigs shing skrag gyur nas //
translated: The mind becomes frightened and terrified.

original: zhes bya'o// dam pa'i lung dang mthun par sgrub pa la dgyes pas na /
analyzed: zhes bya'o// dam pa'i lung dang mthun par sgrub pa la dgyes pas na /
translated: Since he is pleased with the practice in accordance with the scriptures of the sublime ones,

original: yid la mgu zhing dga' 'gyur pa'i //
analyzed: yid la mgu zhing dga' 'gyur pa'i //
translated: he is delighted and joyful in the mind.

original: zhes so // de nas gong ma ltar dngos grub rgya chen te phyag rgya chen po ster bar 'gyur ba ni byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes so // de nas gong ma ltar dngos grub rgya chen te phyag rgya chen po ster bar 'gyur ba ni byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
translated: Then, as above, the bestowal of the great spiritual powers, the great seal, is the consecration.🔽The buddhas, bodhisattvas,

original: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // zhes pa ni bskul bar bya ba'i bde bar gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // zhes pa ni bskul bar bya ba'i bde bar gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa'o //
translated: are the sugatas with their sons who are to be invoked.

original: sngags kyis spyod pa'i don 'grub pa //
analyzed: sngags kyis spyod pa'i don 'grub pa //
translated: The one who accomplishes the purpose of mantra practice

original: zhes pa ni gong ma lta bu'i sgrub pa po'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni gong ma lta bu'i sgrub pa po'o //
translated: is the practitioner as above.

original: rmongs pas 'gal bar byas na ni //
analyzed: rmongs pas 'gal bar byas na ni //
translated: If one is confused and acts contrary,

original: zhes pa ni bskul ba'i sa las bzhengs pa rnams gal te sgrub pa pos rnam par ma bskul na rmongs pa ste 'gal bar byas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni bskul ba'i sa las bzhengs pa rnams gal te sgrub pa pos rnam par ma bskul na rmongs pa ste 'gal bar byas pa'o //
translated: if the invoked ones do not rise up, the practitioner is confused and acts contrary.

original: gal te bskul bas dngos grub chen po ma ster na rmongs pa ste 'gal bar byas pa'o //
analyzed: gal te bskul bas dngos grub chen po ma ster na rmongs pa ste 'gal bar byas pa'o //
translated: If, by being invoked, the great spiritual powers are not bestowed, one is confused and acts contrary.

original: de yi srog ni der zad 'gyur //
analyzed: de yi srog ni der zad 'gyur //
translated: His life force is exhausted there.

original: zhes pa ni de'i srog gi dbang po 'gags pa ste bar ma dor 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de'i srog gi dbang po 'gags pa ste bar ma dor 'gro ba'o //
translated: This is the cessation of his life faculty, which is an intermediate existence.

original: snying po bskul ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snying po bskul ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he is devoid of the stimulation of the essence.

original: theg pa'i che ba bstan pa'i phyir gzhan la yang de skad du'o //
analyzed: theg pa'i che ba bstan pa'i phyir gzhan la yang de skad du'o //
translated: In order to demonstrate the greatness of the vehicle, it is said in other scriptures as well.

original: de kho na yang phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub sgrub pa la sbyar ba bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de kho na yang phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub sgrub pa la sbyar ba bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that reality is applied to the accomplishment of the spiritual attainment of the Great Seal,

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: it is said, “Then, ” and so forth.

original: sngags kyi skyes bu ji snyed pa //
analyzed: sngags kyi skyes bu ji snyed pa //
translated: As many as are the beings of mantra,

original: zhes pa ni gong ma ltar dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni gong ma ltar dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams so //
translated: as above, the deities of the maṇḍala.

original: de rnams kyi gnas rnams su rdo rje gsum ni sku gsum thugs gsum mo //
analyzed: de rnams kyi gnas rnams su rdo rje gsum ni sku gsum thugs gsum mo //
translated: In their places, the three vajras are the three bodies and the three minds.

original: ye shes ni ye shes sems dpa'o //
analyzed: ye shes ni ye shes sems dpa'o //
translated: The gnosis is the gnosis being.

original: des gang ba zhes so //
analyzed: des gang ba zhes so //
translated: It is said to be filled with that.

original: dbang po gnyis kyi sbyong ba yis //
analyzed: dbang po gnyis kyi sbyong ba yis //
translated: By the practice of the two organs,

original: zhes pa ni rdo rje dang padma sbyor ba thams cad kyi gtso bo ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdo rje dang padma sbyor ba thams cad kyi gtso bo ste /
translated: the union of the vajra and lotus is the principal of all.

original: sa la sogs pa'i rim pa ji snyed pa des sbyor bar byed pas na der thams cad brtag par bya zhes so //
analyzed: sa la sogs pa'i rim pa ji snyed pa des sbyor bar byed pas na der thams cad brtag par bya zhes so //
translated: Since it is applied by the extent of the stages of the earth, etc., it is said, “all of that should be examined there.”

original: sngags pa rnams kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pas na /
analyzed: sngags pa rnams kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pas na /
translated: Since it is not to be transgressed by the mantrins,

original: sngags kyi dam tshig bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi dam tshig bsgom pa'o //
translated: it is the meditation on the mantra vow.

original: zhes so // dbang po gnyis gang dang sbyar zhe na ma rig pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes so // dbang po gnyis gang dang sbyar zhe na ma rig pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: If it is asked with what is the union of the two organs, [the reply is] “ignorance,” etc.

original: rig ma ni rang gi rig ma'o //🔽bdag po dang 'dra ba'i phyir @44a * //
analyzed: rig ma ni rang gi rig ma'o // bdag po dang 'dra ba'i phyir @44a * //
translated: The knowledge consort is one’s own knowledge consort.

original: dbang phyug go //
analyzed: dbang phyug go //
translated: Since she is like a lord, she is Īśvara.

original: de'i gzugs brnyan ni legs par slob pa'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de'i gzugs brnyan ni legs par slob pa'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: Her reflection is the mudra who is well trained.

original: la zhes pa ni cho ga mad ba'i phyir na tshig mang ba'o //
analyzed: la zhes pa ni cho ga mad ba'i phyir na tshig mang ba'o //
translated: The word “also” is used because of the many words of the rite.

original: rdo rje ni gsang ba'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni gsang ba'i rdo rje'o //
translated: The vajra is the secret vajra.

original: de dang sbyor ba ni gsang ba'i padma'o //🔽chags la chags pas blta bar bya //
analyzed: de dang sbyor ba ni gsang ba'i padma'o // chags la chags pas blta bar bya //
translated: The union with that is the secret lotus.

original: zhes pa ni shes rab la thabs kyis blta ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni shes rab la thabs kyis blta ba'o //
translated: “One should see with passion and attachment” means that method should see the wisdom consort.

original: gzhan du rang bzhin gyi 'dod chags chen po la mi slu ba'i 'dod chags kyis rnam par bltas te /
analyzed: gzhan du rang bzhin gyi 'dod chags chen po la mi slu ba'i 'dod chags kyis rnam par bltas te /
translated: Otherwise, the great natural passion is the passion that is not deceived, and is seen.

original: des ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa las mi 'da' bas na dam tshig dkyil 'khor ro zhes so //
analyzed: des ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa las mi 'da' bas na dam tshig dkyil 'khor ro zhes so //
translated: Since it does not go beyond the way things are, it is the commitment mandala.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub ni phyag rgya las skye bas na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub ni phyag rgya las skye bas na /
translated: The Bhagavat has said that enlightenment arises from the seal,

original: 'dzem pa med pa'i rnal 'byor pas de dang lhan cig tu sgrub pa po zhes thun mong du gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dzem pa med pa'i rnal 'byor pas de dang lhan cig tu sgrub pa po zhes thun mong du gsungs so //
translated: and that the fearless yogin is the adept together with her.

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then, etc.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes bsdus pa las skyes pas na de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sras so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes bsdus pa las skyes pas na de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sras so //
translated: Since it arises from the collection of the wisdom of all the Tathagatas, it is the son of all the Tathagatas.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis chos kyi dbang phyug tu gnas par bya ba'i phyir na thams cad dbang bskur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis chos kyi dbang phyug tu gnas par bya ba'i phyir na thams cad dbang bskur ro //
translated: Since it is established as the lord of Dharma by all the Buddhas, it is consecrated by all.

original: de nyid kyis na sangs rgyas gtso //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na sangs rgyas gtso //
translated: For that very reason, it is the chief of the Buddhas.

original: zhes so // 'jig rten khams ni thams cad ni //
analyzed: zhes so // 'jig rten khams ni thams cad ni //
translated: All the worlds, etc.

original: zhes pa ni thun mong gi lung ngo //
analyzed: zhes pa ni thun mong gi lung ngo //
translated: is the common scriptural passage.

original: khyad par gyi lung ni /
analyzed: khyad par gyi lung ni /
translated: The special scriptural passage is:

original: bud med ji snyed yod pa kun //
analyzed: bud med ji snyed yod pa kun //
translated: All women whatsoever🔽In whatever world-realms they are,

original: zhes te gang na de yong pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de gnas pa rnams phyag rgya chen po zhes pa ni lha mo'i skur bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes te gang na de yong pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de gnas pa rnams phyag rgya chen po zhes pa ni lha mo'i skur bskyed pa'o //
translated: they are generated in the form of goddesses.

original: sogs kyi sgras bsdus pa nye bar sgrub pa la sogs pa ji srid yan lag gnyis dag par bya ba la thug pa'i par du sbyar nas /
analyzed: sogs kyi sgras bsdus pa nye bar sgrub pa la sogs pa ji srid yan lag gnyis dag par bya ba la thug pa'i par du sbyar nas /
translated: The words “and so forth” include the near-accomplishment and so forth, up to the purification of the two branches.

original: de dag thams cad nye bar spyod //
analyzed: de dag thams cad nye bar spyod //
translated: All of them are enjoyed.

original: ces so // de'i de ma thag tu rang gi sa bon gyi 'od kyis bkug pa'i bde bar gshegs pa zhal du zhugs pa las byung ba'i byang chub sems spro bar gsungs pa /
analyzed: ces so // de'i de ma thag tu rang gi sa bon gyi 'od kyis bkug pa'i bde bar gshegs pa zhal du zhugs pa las byung ba'i byang chub sems spro bar gsungs pa /
translated: Immediately after that, it is said that the Bodhisattva emanates the bliss-gone ones who are summoned by the light of his seed syllable, who enter into his mouth, and who arise as the bodhicitta.

original: dbye ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dbye ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The division of that is stated by “division” and so forth.

original: der spro bya zhes pa ni gsang ba'i gnas su byang chub kyi sems su spros nas le'u bdun pa ltar snang ba ni cho ga dang po'i de nyid byang chub las mi 'da' bas na byang chub kyi dam tshig go //
analyzed: der spro bya zhes pa ni gsang ba'i gnas su byang chub kyi sems su spros nas le'u bdun pa ltar snang ba ni cho ga dang po'i de nyid byang chub las mi 'da' bas na byang chub kyi dam tshig go //
translated: The expansion there is the expansion into the bodhicitta in the secret place, and the appearance according to the seventh chapter is the pledge of enlightenment, because it does not pass beyond the reality of the first rite.

original: de'i yon tan gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i yon tan gsungs pa /
translated: The qualities of that are stated:

original: rdo rje gsum po ni spyi'i mtshan nyid yin pas na nam mkha' 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum po ni spyi'i mtshan nyid yin pas na nam mkha' 'dra ba'o //
translated: The three vajras are the general characteristics, and so are like space.

original: de lta bu'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: One attains that kind of enlightenment.

original: byang chub sems ni rgya mtsho zhes pa ni de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni rgya mtsho zhes pa ni de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The ocean of bodhicitta is thusness.

original: de rtogs @44b pa las 'khor ba ji srid kyi bar du gnas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe des thob ces so //
analyzed: de rtogs @44b pa las 'khor ba ji srid kyi bar du gnas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe des thob ces so //
translated: The life of Vajrasattva is the abiding for as long as cyclic existence lasts, attained from the realization of that.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po kun du skul bar byed pa ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po kun du skul bar byed pa ni bshad zin to //
translated: The encourager of the essence of the transcendent lords has been explained.🔽This is the tenth chapter explaining that.

original: de ston par byed pa'i gzhung gi le'u ste bcu pa'o //🔽le'u bcu pa'i 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: de ston par byed pa'i gzhung gi le'u ste bcu pa'o //🔽le'u bcu pa'i 'grel pa'o /
translated: Chapter eleven

original: // / da ni de nas zhes pa la sogs pas le'u bcu gcig pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: // / da ni de nas zhes pa la sogs pas le'u bcu gcig pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, from “Then” and so on, the eleventh chapter is taught.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje zhes pa ni yi ge gsum mo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje zhes pa ni yi ge gsum mo //
translated: “Vajra of all the Tathagatas” is the three syllables.

original: de las skyes pa'i rang gi lha ni skyes bu mchog ces bya ste /
analyzed: de las skyes pa'i rang gi lha ni skyes bu mchog ces bya ste /
translated: The deity born from that is called “supreme person.”

original: de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rnam par snyoms par zhugs te zhes so //
analyzed: de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rnam par snyoms par zhugs te zhes so //
translated: Thus, he entered into the meditative concentration called “Vajra Holder,” and so on.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje ni rdo rje gsum mo //
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje ni rdo rje gsum mo //
translated: Similarly, “vajra” is the three vajras.

original: de'i sngags ni aom a'a:h'um ngo //
analyzed: de'i sngags ni aom a'a:h'um ngo //
translated: Its mantra is OṂ ĀḤ HŪṂ.

original: rig ma dang ldan pa'i skyes bu ni rig pa'i skyes bu ste /
analyzed: rig ma dang ldan pa'i skyes bu ni rig pa'i skyes bu ste /
translated: The person endowed with the knowledge woman is the knowledge person.

original: de grub bar byed pa'i gzhung ni le'u bcu gcig pa 'di gsungs so zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de grub bar byed pa'i gzhung ni le'u bcu gcig pa 'di gsungs so zhes bya'o //
translated: The treatise that accomplishes that is called “the eleventh chapter.”

original: de nyid gsungs pa rdo rje gsum zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa rdo rje gsum zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: That itself is taught: “Vajra of the three” and so on.

original: rdo rje gsum zhes pa ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin pas na mchog go //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum zhes pa ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin pas na mchog go //
translated: “Vajra of the three” is supreme because of being the nature of the vajra body and so on.

original: mi 'gyur bas na yi ge'o //
analyzed: mi 'gyur bas na yi ge'o //
translated: It is the syllable because it is unchanging.

original: shes pa dang skyob par ldan pas na sngags te nam mkha'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: shes pa dang skyob par ldan pas na sngags te nam mkha'i yi ge'o //
translated: Mantras are the space-letters, because they are endowed with knowledge and protection.

original: de nyid kyi phyag rgya chen po zhes pa ni mngon par 'dod ba'i lha'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyag rgya chen po zhes pa ni mngon par 'dod ba'i lha'o //
translated: That itself is the great seal, the deity as desired.

original: de rnam par bsgom pa ni zhal du zhugs pa la sogs pas so //
analyzed: de rnam par bsgom pa ni zhal du zhugs pa la sogs pas so //
translated: Its meditation is by means of entry into the mouth, etc.

original: byang chub thams cad ces pa ni bems po dang rtag chad sel ba dang ldan pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: byang chub thams cad ces pa ni bems po dang rtag chad sel ba dang ldan pa'i sku'o //
translated: All enlightenments are the body endowed with the removal of the inert and eternalistic and nihilistic views.

original: de thob pa'i phyir zhes so //🔽ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya //
analyzed: de thob pa'i phyir zhes so // ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya //
translated: It is for the sake of attaining that.

original: zhes pa ni gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor gyis so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor gyis so //
translated: It is done by the vajra of intuition, by the yoga of nonduality.

original: de yang zla bar zhu ba dang glu yis bskul pa la sogs pa gzhan du //
analyzed: de yang zla bar zhu ba dang glu yis bskul pa la sogs pa gzhan du //
translated: That is also stated elsewhere as melting into the moon, encouraging with songs, etc.

original: rgyas par gsungs pa kun 'di sbyar bar bya'o zhes spyir bstan pa'o //🔽sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i de ma thag tu rang dang gzhan gyi lus ngag yid gsum kun rdzob kyi tshul gsungs pa /
analyzed: rgyas par gsungs pa kun 'di sbyar bar bya'o zhes spyir bstan pa'o // sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i de ma thag tu rang dang gzhan gyi lus ngag yid gsum kun rdzob kyi tshul gsungs pa /
translated: All of that is to be applied here, is the general teaching.

original: aom ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: aom ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Immediately after the consecration by the mantra, the conventional method of all the body, speech, and mind of oneself and others is stated by Om is the body, etc.🔽Om is the body, Ah is the speech, Hum is the mind, is the statement of the conventional method of the three, body, speech, and mind.

original: aom ni zhes pa ni lus ma grub pa'i mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: aom ni zhes pa ni lus ma grub pa'i mtshan ma'o //
translated: Oṃ is the sign of the non-accomplishment of the body.

original: de'i ye shes lnga'i ngo bo yin pas na ye shes snying po'o //
analyzed: de'i ye shes lnga'i ngo bo yin pas na ye shes snying po'o //
translated: Since it is the nature of the five gnoses, it is the essence of gnosis.

original: phyis kyi 'bras bu mchog tu gyur pa las mi slu bas na /
analyzed: phyis kyi 'bras bu mchog tu gyur pa las mi slu bas na /
translated: Since it is non-deceptive with respect to the later supreme result,

original: rdo rje sku ni thob byed pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sku ni thob byed pa'o //
translated: it is the cause of attaining the vajra body.

original: zhes so // a'a: ni zhes pa ni dag ma grub pa'i mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: zhes so // a'a: ni zhes pa ni dag ma grub pa'i mtshan ma'o //
translated: Āḥ is the sign of the non-accomplishment of speech.

original: de skye ba med par ston pa'i gtso bo bas na byang chub bdag med pa'o zhes @45a * //
analyzed: de skye ba med par ston pa'i gtso bo bas na byang chub bdag med pa'o zhes @45a * //
translated: Since it is the principal one for teaching non-arising, it is enlightenment, selflessness.

original: so ; / h'um ni zhes pa ni yid ma grub pa'i mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: so ; / h'um ni zhes pa ni yid ma grub pa'i mtshan ma'o //
translated: Hum is the sign of the non-accomplishment of mind.

original: thugs kyi rdo rje ni spyi'i mtshan nyid yin pas na sku dang gsung thugs yin te zhes so //
analyzed: thugs kyi rdo rje ni spyi'i mtshan nyid yin pas na sku dang gsung thugs yin te zhes so //
translated: Since the vajra of mind is the general characteristic, it is the body, speech, and mind.

original: sems kyi rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs na thams cad cig car du dag par byed pas na rdo rje mi phyed gsum thob pa'o //
analyzed: sems kyi rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs na thams cad cig car du dag par byed pas na rdo rje mi phyed gsum thob pa'o //
translated: Since it causes the purification of everything simultaneously when the nature of the mind is realized just as it is, it is the attainment of the indivisible three vajras.

original: zhes so ; / gzhan ni gong ltar bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes so ; / gzhan ni gong ltar bshad par bya'o //
translated: The others should be explained as above.

original: da ni sna tshogs rdo rje'i bum par gzhal yas khang gi sa bon gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni sna tshogs rdo rje'i bum par gzhal yas khang gi sa bon gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the seed of the celestial palace in the jeweled victory vase is taught:

original: rdo rje dkyil 'khor zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dkyil 'khor zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The vajra mandala, and so on.

original: dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni gzhal yas khang pa'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni gzhal yas khang pa'o //
translated: The mandala is the celestial palace.

original: rdo rje kun las skyes zhes pa ni rtse gsum pa kha bzhi pa ;
analyzed: rdo rje kun las skyes zhes pa ni rtse gsum pa kha bzhi pa ;
translated: The vajra is the three-pointed four-sided [syllable].

original: kha dog sna tshegs pa'i rdo rje rgya gram sna tshogs padma la gnas pa las skyes pa'o //
analyzed: kha dog sna tshegs pa'i rdo rje rgya gram sna tshogs padma la gnas pa las skyes pa'o //
translated: The born from all vajras is born from the multicolored vajra cross on a multicolored lotus.

original: de gang du bsam zhe na /
analyzed: de gang du bsam zhe na /
translated: Where is that imagined?

original: nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam //
analyzed: nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam //
translated: In the middle of the vajra space,

original: zhes te chos kyi 'byung bar ro //
analyzed: zhes te chos kyi 'byung bar ro //
translated: in the source of phenomena.

original: rdo rje sprin ni kun skyes pa //
analyzed: rdo rje sprin ni kun skyes pa //
translated: The vajra cloud is born from all.

original: zhes pa ni rdo rje lta bu'i 'od zer sna tshogs pa de las byung ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdo rje lta bu'i 'od zer sna tshogs pa de las byung ba'o //
translated: That is, it arises from the multicolored vajra-like light rays.

original: de ru zhes pa ni de'i bum par zla pa la zhes so //
analyzed: de ru zhes pa ni de'i bum par zla pa la zhes so //
translated: The there is in its vase, on a moon, and so on.

original: bhr'um bsam mo zhes pa ni dkar po'o //
analyzed: bhr'um bsam mo zhes pa ni dkar po'o //
translated: The bhrūṃ is imagined as white.

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: That is taught:

original: de la 'di ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de la 'di ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The that and so on.

original: da ni bzlas brjod kyi cho ga dang 'brel pa yi ge gsum gyi rten gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni bzlas brjod kyi cho ga dang 'brel pa yi ge gsum gyi rten gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the three syllables related to the rite of recitation are taught.

original: rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The vajra, etc.

original: rdo rje dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni sku'i dkyil 'khor te de dbyer mi phyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni sku'i dkyil 'khor te de dbyer mi phyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The vajra mandala is the body mandala, because it is indivisible.

original: de'i dbus gnas pa ni thugs kar mtshan ma la zla ba'i steng du yi ge aom ni rab tu bsgoms la bzlas brjod bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: de'i dbus gnas pa ni thugs kar mtshan ma la zla ba'i steng du yi ge aom ni rab tu bsgoms la bzlas brjod bya'o zhes so //
translated: Dwelling in its center, on the sign at the heart, on top of a moon, one should meditate on the syllable OṀ and do the recitation.

original: de bzhin du gsung gi rdo rje yang bems po ma yin pas na gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du gsung gi rdo rje yang bems po ma yin pas na gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Likewise, the vajra of speech is not inanimate, so it is the mandala of clarity.

original: thugs kyi rdo rje yang chos bdag med pa'i rang bzhin yin pas na chos kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: thugs kyi rdo rje yang chos bdag med pa'i rang bzhin yin pas na chos kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The vajra of mind is also the mandala of phenomena, because it is the nature of the objective selflessness of phenomena.

original: de rnams kyi thugs kar gong ma ltar yi ge bkod nas le'u bcu gsum par gsungs pa ltar bzlas brjod bya'o zhes te ngag gi bzlas pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi thugs kar gong ma ltar yi ge bkod nas le'u bcu gsum par gsungs pa ltar bzlas brjod bya'o zhes te ngag gi bzlas pa'o //
translated: Having arranged the syllables in the hearts of those, as above, one should do the recitation, as taught in chapter thirteen. This is the recitation of speech.

original: gzhan du na rdo rje dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor te sred med kyi bus kyang mi shigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na rdo rje dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor te sred med kyi bus kyang mi shigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, the vajra maṇḍala is the wind maṇḍala, because it is not destroyed even by Nārāyaṇa.

original: de'i dbus gnas par zhes te sku'i rdo rje'i thugs kar mtshan mal gnas pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du zla ba la aom zhes bya ba rab tu bsgoms nas 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim pas nyis brgya nyi shu rtsa lngar @45b rnam par bzlas pa'o
analyzed: de'i dbus gnas par zhes te sku'i rdo rje'i thugs kar mtshan mal gnas pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du zla ba la aom zhes bya ba rab tu bsgoms nas 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim pas nyis brgya nyi shu rtsa lngar @45b rnam par bzlas pa'o
translated: In the middle of that, abiding in the heart of the vajra body, on the wind maṇḍala abiding in the sign-jewel, on the moon, one should meditate on the syllable oṃ, and by the process of entering and so on, one should repeat it two hundred and twenty-five times.

original: // de bzhin du dang ba'i rang bzhin gyi phyir na chu'i dkyil 'khor la gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o //
analyzed: // de bzhin du dang ba'i rang bzhin gyi phyir na chu'i dkyil 'khor la gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o //
translated: Similarly, because of its nature of clarity, the water maṇḍala is called the maṇḍala of light.

original: khyad par gyi chos dang mthun pa yod pa'i phyir na me'i dkyil 'khor la chos kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o //
analyzed: khyad par gyi chos dang mthun pa yod pa'i phyir na me'i dkyil 'khor la chos kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o //
translated: Because it has the concordant qualities of fire, the fire maṇḍala is called the maṇḍala of phenomena.

original: de bas na dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor ni ye shes sems dpa' yin par mngon no //
analyzed: de bas na dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor ni ye shes sems dpa' yin par mngon no //
translated: Therefore, it is clear that the maṇḍala of earth is the gnosis being.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: rdo rje gsal ba chos 'khor lo //
analyzed: rdo rje gsal ba chos 'khor lo //
translated: The vajra light is the dharma wheel.

original: sku gsung thugs dang de nang chud //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs dang de nang chud //
translated: The body, speech, and mind are included in that.

original: gnas de la ni brtan byas nas //
analyzed: gnas de la ni brtan byas nas //
translated: Having stabilized that place,

original: ye shes sku 'phros bzlas brjod bya //
analyzed: ye shes sku 'phros bzlas brjod bya //
translated: the repetition is the emanation of the wisdom body.

original: zhes te rdo rje bzlas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes te rdo rje bzlas pa'o //
translated: This is the vajra repetition.

original: rten gyi dkyil 'khor dang cho ga dang po'i mtshams sbyar ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: rten gyi dkyil 'khor dang cho ga dang po'i mtshams sbyar ba gsungs pa /
translated: The support mandala and the first rite are taught to be connected:

original: yi ge zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: yi ge zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The syllables, etc.

original: yi ge bhr'um gyis gnas bsgoms te //
analyzed: yi ge bhr'um gyis gnas bsgoms te //
translated: The place is meditated on with the syllable bhrūṃ.

original: zhes pa ni 'khor lo la sogs pa'i rim pas gdan dang ldan par bsgoms te zhes so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'khor lo la sogs pa'i rim pas gdan dang ldan par bsgoms te zhes so //
translated: This means that one meditates on the seat with the stages of the wheel, etc.

original: de nas ci bya zhe na /
analyzed: de nas ci bya zhe na /
translated: Then, what is done?

original: rdo rje gsum 'byang bsgom par bya //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum 'byang bsgom par bya //
translated: The meditation is the arising of the three vajras.

original: zhes te bar gyi srid pa'i sems gong du gsungs pa ni rdo rje gsum ste /
analyzed: zhes te bar gyi srid pa'i sems gong du gsungs pa ni rdo rje gsum ste /
translated: The mind of the intermediate existence mentioned above is the three vajras.

original: de las byung ba ni de la gnas pa'i sems gsum ste //
analyzed: de las byung ba ni de la gnas pa'i sems gsum ste //
translated: The arising from that is the three minds abiding in that.

original: de dbus kyi gdan la babs par bsgoms la bde bar gshegs pa la sogs pa gzigs pa la sogs pa ni gong ma ltar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de dbus kyi gdan la babs par bsgoms la bde bar gshegs pa la sogs pa gzigs pa la sogs pa ni gong ma ltar shes par bya'o //
translated: Having meditated on those descending onto the central seat, the seeing of the sugatas, etc., should be understood as above.

original: dam tshig gsum nyid gsang ba ste yi ge gsum mo //
analyzed: dam tshig gsum nyid gsang ba ste yi ge gsum mo //
translated: The three sacred commitments are the secret, which is the three syllables.

original: de las byung ba'i phyir de skad do //
analyzed: de las byung ba'i phyir de skad do //
translated: Because it arises from that, it is so called.

original: da ni gong du gsungs pa'i yi ge gsum po ho gnyis kyi bar du gnas pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni gong du gsungs pa'i yi ge gsum po ho gnyis kyi bar du gnas pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the three syllables previously mentioned, abiding between the two hohs, are stated:

original: snying po zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: snying po zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The essence, etc.

original: snying po zhes pa ni ho dmar po gnyis te 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snying po zhes pa ni ho dmar po gnyis te 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The essence is the two red hohs, because they give rise to the fruit of desire.

original: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku gsung thugs zhes pa ni de'i mtshan ma ste yi ge gsum mo //🔽de mnyes par byed pa ni de ste /🔽zab pa dang rgya che bas gzung ba ste /
analyzed: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku gsung thugs zhes pa ni de'i mtshan ma ste yi ge gsum mo // de mnyes par byed pa ni de ste / zab pa dang rgya che bas gzung ba ste /
translated: The body, speech, and mind of the Buddhas of the three times is their sign, i.e., the three syllables.

original: yan lag gnyis kyis 'dod chags chen po rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yan lag gnyis kyis 'dod chags chen po rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Pleased by that, i.e., by the two branches of retention, i.e., the profound and the extensive, is the great desire, because of the purification of great desire.

original: da ni le'u drug pa las thabs kyis zhes pa don yi ge gsum las rdo rje gsum bskyed pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni le'u drug pa las thabs kyis zhes pa don yi ge gsum las rdo rje gsum bskyed pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, in the sixth chapter, the meaning of the three syllables, the generation of the three vajras from the three syllables, is stated:

original: aom ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: aom ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Om, etc.

original: aom ni zhes pa ni spyi bor aom las bskyed pa'i 'khor lo'i ste bar zla ba la gnas pa'i aom mo //
analyzed: aom ni zhes pa ni spyi bor aom las bskyed pa'i 'khor lo'i ste bar zla ba la gnas pa'i aom mo //
translated: Om is the moon located in the wheel generated from the om at the crown.

original: de ni phyag mtshan la sogs pa'i rim pas sku'i rdo rje mchog bskyed pa'i sa bon bas na sangs rgyas sku'i mchog ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni phyag mtshan la sogs pa'i rim pas sku'i rdo rje mchog bskyed pa'i sa bon bas na sangs rgyas sku'i mchog ces bya'o //
translated: Since it is the seed of the supreme vajra body, generated by the stages of the hand implements, etc., it is called the supreme buddha body.

original: gnyis pas ni rnam par mtshan pa @46a * //
analyzed: gnyis pas ni rnam par mtshan pa @46a * //
translated: The second line indicates the characteristic.

original: bstan pa'o // a'a: zhes pa yang gong ma ltar ro //
analyzed: bstan pa'o // a'a: zhes pa yang gong ma ltar ro //
translated: A is as above.

original: sangs rgyas gsung gi lam zhes pa ni gsung nyid lam ste des 'gro bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas gsung gi lam zhes pa ni gsung nyid lam ste des 'gro bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The path of the buddha speech is speech itself, the path, because it causes one to go.

original: de'i rang bzhin gsung gi rdo rje ste de'i sa bon zhes so //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin gsung gi rdo rje ste de'i sa bon zhes so //
translated: It is the nature of that, the seed of the supreme vajra speech.

original: h'um zhes pa yang gong ma ltar ro //
analyzed: h'um zhes pa yang gong ma ltar ro //
translated: Hum is as above.

original: thugs kyi ye shes 'jings zhes pa ni thugs nyid ye shes te mang po tshogs pas 'jings so //
analyzed: thugs kyi ye shes 'jings zhes pa ni thugs nyid ye shes te mang po tshogs pas 'jings so //
translated: The mass of the wisdom mind is the mind itself, wisdom, a mass because of the collection of many.

original: de'i rang bzhin thugs kyi rdo rje bskyed pa'i sa bon zhes so //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin thugs kyi rdo rje bskyed pa'i sa bon zhes so //
translated: It is the nature of that, the seed of the supreme vajra mind.

original: byang chub sgrub pa'i thabs kyi mchog yin pas na byang chub mchog go //
analyzed: byang chub sgrub pa'i thabs kyi mchog yin pas na byang chub mchog go //
translated: Since it is the supreme means of accomplishing enlightenment, it is supreme enlightenment.

original: ye shes rdo rje sprul pa zhes pa ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis sprul pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes rdo rje sprul pa zhes pa ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis sprul pa'o //
translated: The emanation of the vajra of intuition is the emanation of the yogin endowed with nondual intuition.

original: sangs rgyas rgyu dang 'bras bu 'byung //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rgyu dang 'bras bu 'byung //
translated: The buddhas arise from the cause and effect.

original: zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang mi bskyod pa la sogs pa 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang mi bskyod pa la sogs pa 'byung ba'o //
translated: This means that Vajrasattva, Akshobhya, and so forth arise.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad las 'byung bas na sangs rgyas skyes bu ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad las 'byung bas na sangs rgyas skyes bu ste /
translated: The buddhas are the beings born from all buddhas.

original: rdo rje gsum dang gnas la mtshan ma'i byang chub sems dpa' dang ; ye shes sems dpa' zhes so //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum dang gnas la mtshan ma'i byang chub sems dpa' dang ; ye shes sems dpa' zhes so //
translated: The three vajras are the sign bodhisattvas in the places and the intuition bodhisattvas.

original: de rnams la sngags kyi rig pa zhes kyang bsgrags te /
analyzed: de rnams la sngags kyi rig pa zhes kyang bsgrags te /
translated: They are also proclaimed as the mantras and awarenesses.

original: 'dis ma rig pa 'joms par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dis ma rig pa 'joms par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because they destroy ignorance.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
analyzed: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
translated: by meditating on the three inseparable vajras,

original: zhes pa ni sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
translated: means consecrating body, speech, and mind.

original: dam tshig dag gis zhes pa ni mig la sogs pa bying yis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig dag gis zhes pa ni mig la sogs pa bying yis brlabs pa'o //
translated: By the pure commitments means consecrating the eyes, and so forth.

original: ye shes sems dpa' ni rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' ni rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The intuition being is perfected.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dam tshig ces pa ni des mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dam tshig ces pa ni des mtshan pa'o //
translated: The “pledges of body, speech, and mind” are marked by that.

original: de kho na nyid ces pa ni mig la sogs pa las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de kho na nyid ces pa ni mig la sogs pa las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro //
translated: “Reality” is not beyond the eye, etc.

original: ye shes rdo rje ni ye shes sems dpa' ste de byin gyis rlob pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes rdo rje ni ye shes sems dpa' ste de byin gyis rlob pa'o //
translated: “Vajra wisdom” is the wisdom being, and that is empowered.

original: de rnams mdzes par byas pas rgyal mtshan dang 'dra ba'i phyir dkon mchog dpal te rang gi lha'o //
analyzed: de rnams mdzes par byas pas rgyal mtshan dang 'dra ba'i phyir dkon mchog dpal te rang gi lha'o //
translated: Since those are made beautiful, like a banner, it is Ratnaketu, one’s deity.

original: rtse gcig pas na ting nge 'dzin to zhes te bsnyen pa'o //🔽da ni grub pa'i mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas rig 'dzin la sogs pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i cho ga'i spyi'i tshig gsungs pa /
analyzed: rtse gcig pas na ting nge 'dzin to zhes te bsnyen pa'o // da ni grub pa'i mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas rig 'dzin la sogs pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i cho ga'i spyi'i tshig gsungs pa /
translated: Since it is one-pointed, it is meditative concentration, and that is the service.

original: dben zhing zhes pa la sogs pa'o //🔽dben zhing rab tu nyams dga' ba //
analyzed: dben zhing zhes pa la sogs pa'o // dben zhing rab tu nyams dga' ba //
translated: Now, the general words of the rite for the practitioner who has attained the signs of accomplishment to achieve the powers of the awareness holder, etc., are stated:🔽In a solitary, delightful🔽place,

original: zhes pa ni gnas ston to //
analyzed: zhes pa ni gnas ston to //
translated: “Solitary and delightful” indicates the place.

original: sbyor ba 'di ni kun brtsams na //
analyzed: sbyor ba 'di ni kun brtsams na //
translated: “Having begun this practice”

original: zhes pa ni lam gyi rim pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni lam gyi rim pa'o //
translated: is the sequence of the path.

original: rdo rje sku dang gsung dang thugs //
analyzed: rdo rje sku dang gsung dang thugs //
translated: “Vajra body, speech, and mind”

original: zhes pa ni 'dra ba zhes tha ma'i @46b tshig ste 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'dra ba zhes tha ma'i @46b tshig ste 'bras bu'o //
translated: The word like in the last line means result.

original: zla ba phyed kyis nges par 'grub //
analyzed: zla ba phyed kyis nges par 'grub //
translated: In half a month, it is definitely accomplished

original: ces pa ni chung du la gnas nas ni sngon gyi tshig ste dus so //
analyzed: ces pa ni chung du la gnas nas ni sngon gyi tshig ste dus so //
translated: means that, having remained in the small, the former word means time.

original: de la thun mong gi dngos grub thams cad ni brgyad de /
analyzed: de la thun mong gi dngos grub thams cad ni brgyad de /
translated: Therein, all common powers are eight.

original: de yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: de yang gang zhe na /
translated: And what are they?

original: rig 'dzin dang / mi snang ba shes pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rgya mtsho rkang pas bcag ba dang / mig sman dang / sngags kyi khyad par gyi sgrub pa dang / mngag gzhug sgrub pa dang / las kyi rab tu dbye ba'o //
analyzed: rig 'dzin dang / mi snang ba shes pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rgya mtsho rkang pas bcag ba dang / mig sman dang / sngags kyi khyad par gyi sgrub pa dang / mngag gzhug sgrub pa dang / las kyi rab tu dbye ba'o //
translated: They are the knowledge-holder, the knowledge of invisibility, the superknowledges, the ocean crossed on foot, the eye medicine, the accomplishment of the special mantra, the accomplishment of the messenger, and the classification of activities.

original: de rnams kyang chung ngu'i bsnyen sgrub bzhi la gnas te sgrub pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la gnas te sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyang chung ngu'i bsnyen sgrub bzhi la gnas te sgrub pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la gnas te sgrub pa'o //
translated: Those are accomplished by remaining in the four small-stage approach and accomplishment and by accomplishing the mandala wheel.

original: de la dang po 'dir rig 'dzin 'ga' zhig la mig 'bru'i sgo nas sgrub pa'i thabs gsungs pa /
analyzed: de la dang po 'dir rig 'dzin 'ga' zhig la mig 'bru'i sgo nas sgrub pa'i thabs gsungs pa /
translated: Therein, first, here, the method of accomplishment by means of eye medicine is taught for some knowledge-holders.

original: gsal ba'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gsal ba'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The clear...

original: gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te /
translated: The “mandala of light” is the mandala of the moon.

original: ye shes las grub pa'i phyir na dam pa'o //🔽nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus su bsam //
analyzed: ye shes las grub pa'i phyir na dam pa'o // nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus su bsam //
translated: It is “excellent” because it is accomplished from pristine awareness.

original: zhes pa ni chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi nang gzhal yas khang brtsegs pa'i dbus su zhes so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi nang gzhal yas khang brtsegs pa'i dbus su zhes so //
translated: “ In the middle of the vajra of space” means in the middle of the celestial mansion built in the womb of the source of phenomena.

original: rang gi sngags kyis zhes pa ni dang po'i cho ga bzhi rdzogs pa'i 'og tu yi ge aom du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi sngags kyis zhes pa ni dang po'i cho ga bzhi rdzogs pa'i 'og tu yi ge aom du gyur pa'o //
translated: “ With one’s own mantra” means that after the four rites of the beginning are complete, one becomes the syllable oṃ.

original: de la dam tshig bskyed ces pa ni dam tshig sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: de la dam tshig bskyed ces pa ni dam tshig sems dpa' ste /
translated: “ Generate the pledge being” means the pledge being.

original: rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo la sogs pa'i rim pas bskyed nas byin gyis brlabs nas zhes so //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo la sogs pa'i rim pas bskyed nas byin gyis brlabs nas zhes so //
translated: After generating Vairocana by the stages of the wheel, and so on, one blesses it.

original: yi ge aom ni snying gar gzhag / ces pa ni zla ba la gnas pa'i mtshan ma dbus su bsam pa'o //
analyzed: yi ge aom ni snying gar gzhag / ces pa ni zla ba la gnas pa'i mtshan ma dbus su bsam pa'o //
translated: “ Place the syllable oṃ in the heart” means to imagine the sign in the middle of the moon.

original: 'od zer lnga yi sprin chen po //
analyzed: 'od zer lnga yi sprin chen po //
translated: “ A great cloud of five-colored light”

original: zhes pa ni de las kha dog lnga'i 'od zer 'phro bas ji snyed pa'i bde bar gshegs pa thams cad la phog pas /
analyzed: zhes pa ni de las kha dog lnga'i 'od zer 'phro bas ji snyed pa'i bde bar gshegs pa thams cad la phog pas /
translated: This is the light rays radiating five colored lights from that, and striking all the Sugatas of the extent of existence.

original: rnam par snang mdzad mchog tu bsgom //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad mchog tu bsgom //
translated: Meditate on Vairocana as supreme.

original: zhes te thams cad de'i skur byas nas slar bsdus te ba spu'i bu gar gzhug cing yi ge gsum gyi bar du chud pas bzlas pas ji skad du gsungs pa'i yon tan du 'gyur ro zhes so //
analyzed: zhes te thams cad de'i skur byas nas slar bsdus te ba spu'i bu gar gzhug cing yi ge gsum gyi bar du chud pas bzlas pas ji skad du gsungs pa'i yon tan du 'gyur ro zhes so //
