translated: Having made everything his body, one should gather it back and enter it into the pores of the body. Since it is included within the three syllables, one should repeat it. The qualities as stated will occur.

original: de'i don ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de'i don ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The meaning of that is as follows.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i sgrub pa po bya bar 'os pa tshogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas ting nge 'dzin gsum yan lag dang bcas pa la gzhol zhing brtan par gyur pa'i mtshan ma rnyed nas de'i sbyor ba las gong du gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa gang yang rung bas
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i sgrub pa po bya bar 'os pa tshogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas ting nge 'dzin gsum yan lag dang bcas pa la gzhol zhing brtan par gyur pa'i mtshan ma rnyed nas de'i sbyor ba las gong du gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa gang yang rung bas
translated: The practitioner who is suitable to perform the practice as explained, the yogi/nī who is devoted to the three samādhis with the limbs, having found the signs of stability, from that yoga, whatever higher yoga

original: rmi lam la sogs pa spyi'i mtshan ma rnyed pas /
analyzed: rmi lam la sogs pa spyi'i mtshan ma rnyed pas /
translated: having found the general signs of dreams, etc.,

original: ji skad du bshad @47a * //
analyzed: ji skad du bshad @47a * //
translated: as it is explained,

original: ba'i gnas su 'dzab bzlas pa sngon du 'gro ba'i sa gzhi sbyang ba la sogs pa byas te /
analyzed: ba'i gnas su 'dzab bzlas pa sngon du 'gro ba'i sa gzhi sbyang ba la sogs pa byas te /
translated: Having recited the essence mantra in a place that is suitable, one should perform the purification of the ground, and so forth, preceded by the recitation of the essence mantra.

original: 'og nas 'byung ba'i cho gas snod la phab pa'i lhas ri mo'i dkyil 'khor 'brir bcug nas snod rang gi gnas su btang ste byin gyis brlab pa dang / de mnyes par bya ba dang / slob ma gzhug pa'i rim pas zhugs nas lha rnams kyis bdag la bla mas ji ltar gnang ba ltar dbang bskur bar bsam mo //
analyzed: 'og nas 'byung ba'i cho gas snod la phab pa'i lhas ri mo'i dkyil 'khor 'brir bcug nas snod rang gi gnas su btang ste byin gyis brlab pa dang / de mnyes par bya ba dang / slob ma gzhug pa'i rim pas zhugs nas lha rnams kyis bdag la bla mas ji ltar gnang ba ltar dbang bskur bar bsam mo //
translated: Having caused the deity who has descended into the vessel to draw the mandala with the rite that will be explained below, one should send the vessel to its place and bless it, please it, and enter it with the sequence of the disciple's entry, and imagine that the deities confer initiation upon oneself just as the master has granted it.

original: de nas bsrung ba'i 'khor los bgegs bskrad nas //
analyzed: de nas bsrung ba'i 'khor los bgegs bskrad nas //
translated: Then, having driven away the obstructors with the protection wheel,

original: chos kyi 'byung gnas su rnam par snang mdzad las gyur pa'i gzhal yas khang pa'i dbus kyi zla ba'i gdan la ye shes lnga'i cho gas dang po'i mgon po bskyed la /
analyzed: chos kyi 'byung gnas su rnam par snang mdzad las gyur pa'i gzhal yas khang pa'i dbus kyi zla ba'i gdan la ye shes lnga'i cho gas dang po'i mgon po bskyed la /
translated: in the source of phenomena, one should generate the primordial lord with the rite of the five awarenesses on a moon seat in the center of the immeasurable mansion arisen from Vairocana.

original: bar gyi sems 'jug pa sngon du 'gro bas de gnas su zhu ba las lha mo'i glus bskul bas sa bon dang phyag mtshan dang spro bsdu las rnam par snang mdzad du bsgoms nas nye bar sgrub pa la sogs pa'i cho ga ma gtogs pa chos kyi dbyings🔽su byin gyis brlabs te /
analyzed: bar gyi sems 'jug pa sngon du 'gro bas de gnas su zhu ba las lha mo'i glus bskul bas sa bon dang phyag mtshan dang spro bsdu las rnam par snang mdzad du bsgoms nas nye bar sgrub pa la sogs pa'i cho ga ma gtogs pa chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlabs te /
translated: Then, after the invocation by the song of the goddesses, one meditates on Vairocana from the seed syllable and hand implement and emanation and re-absorption, and then one should perform the consecration of the realm of reality, except for the rite of near attainment and so on.

original: de'i thugs kar zla ba la gnas pa'i 'khor lo'i lte bar aom bsams nas de'i yi ge gsum gyi bar du chud par bzlas pas /
analyzed: de'i thugs kar zla ba la gnas pa'i 'khor lo'i lte bar aom bsams nas de'i yi ge gsum gyi bar du chud par bzlas pas /
translated: Then, one should meditate on the four times, after imagining the wheel located on the moon at the heart, with oṃ in the center of the wheel, and the three syllables in the spokes.

original: kha dog sna tshogs pa'i 'od zer 'phros pas bde bar gshegs pa thams cad rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur byas pas bkug nas rang gi ba spu'i bu gar btsud /
analyzed: kha dog sna tshogs pa'i 'od zer 'phros pas bde bar gshegs pa thams cad rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur byas pas bkug nas rang gi ba spu'i bu gar btsud /
translated: Light rays radiate from the three syllables, various colors, and draw in all the sugatas, who are transformed into the form of Vairocana, and they enter one’s pores.

original: de bzhin brtan pa'i ngo bor chags par byas shing dus rnam pa bzhir bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin brtan pa'i ngo bor chags par byas shing dus rnam pa bzhir bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then, one should meditate on the four times, after imagining the wheel located on the moon at the heart, with oṃ in the center of the wheel, and the three syllables in the spokes.🔽Light rays radiate from the three syllables, various colors, and draw in all the sugatas, who are transformed into the form of Vairocana, and they enter one’s pores.

original: de nas nye ba'i mtshan ma mthong bas dkyil 'khor mchod pa dang 'byung po mnyes par bya ba la sogs pa byas te /
analyzed: de nas nye ba'i mtshan ma mthong bas dkyil 'khor mchod pa dang 'byung po mnyes par bya ba la sogs pa byas te /
translated: Then, having seen the proximate signs, one should make offerings to the mandala, please the spirits, and so forth.

original: rang gi sbyor ba la lhag par gnas par byas pas ji skad du gsungs pa thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang gi sbyor ba la lhag par gnas par byas pas ji skad du gsungs pa thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having performed the special observances, one will attain the stated [powers].

original: gnyis pas kyang cho ga'i rim pa 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: gnyis pas kyang cho ga'i rim pa 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: Also, by the second [mantra], one should perform the rite in this way.

original: gnyis kyi mtha' lta bur shes pa ni khyad par ro //
analyzed: gnyis kyi mtha' lta bur shes pa ni khyad par ro //
translated: The knowledge of the two ends is the distinction.

original: phyi ma rnams la yang de kho na bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: phyi ma rnams la yang de kho na bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: One should apply [this] in the same way to the later [mantras].

original: khyad par gang yin pa ni 'og nas bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: khyad par gang yin pa ni 'og nas bshad par bya'o //
translated: The distinction will be explained below.

original: 'di yis zhes pa ni sbyor ba des so //
analyzed: 'di yis zhes pa ni sbyor ba des so //
translated: This means by that application.

original: sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad ces pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku'i rdo rje ste de'i /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad ces pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku'i rdo rje ste de'i /
translated: Buddha Vairocana is the complete body-vajra, and of that,

original: rdo rje'i sku ni rgya mtsho dag / ces pa ni de dang 'dra ba'i sku grub ces so //
analyzed: rdo rje'i sku ni rgya mtsho dag / ces pa ni de dang 'dra ba'i sku grub ces so //
translated: the ocean of vajra bodies means the attainment of a body like that.

original: nges par grub ces pa ni che ba lta bu ma yin te sbyor ba des zhag bco lnga na rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: nges par grub ces pa ni che ba lta bu ma yin te sbyor ba des zhag bco lnga na rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: “Certainly accomplished” does not mean like greatness, but by that practice, in fifteen days, it will be completed.

original: ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni //
analyzed: ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni //
translated: If one relies on the one endowed with the five intuitions,

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: this is said.

original: @47b dang po'i mgon po ni ye shes lnga ldan te des rang gi lhar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: @47b dang po'i mgon po ni ye shes lnga ldan te des rang gi lhar gyur pa'o //
translated: The primordial lord is endowed with the five intuitions, and by that, one becomes one’s own deity.🔽The color like the body of the Buddha

original: sangs rgyas sku ni 'dra ba'i mdog / ces pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i rnam par snang mdzad ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sku ni 'dra ba'i mdog / ces pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i rnam par snang mdzad ma yin pa'o //
translated: is not the Mahāmudrā Vairocana.

original: de grub pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang /
analyzed: de grub pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang /
translated: Also, the measure of the time of accomplishing that is

original: rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas //
analyzed: rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas //
translated: abiding for three vajra eons.

original: zhes so // de bka' stsal ba'i skabs su sku rdo rje gsang ba ste ston pa po'o //
analyzed: zhes so // de bka' stsal ba'i skabs su sku rdo rje gsang ba ste ston pa po'o //
translated: When that is taught, the body vajra is secret, that is, the teacher.

original: sku rdo rje ni rtag pa'i sku mang po rnams so //
analyzed: sku rdo rje ni rtag pa'i sku mang po rnams so //
translated: The body vajra is the many bodies of the eternal.

original: de rnams bsdus pa las byung ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa na bkod pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams bsdus pa las byung ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa na bkod pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The knowledge-holder arisen from the collection of those is called the array.

original: phyi ma yang de bzhin du sbyar ro //
analyzed: phyi ma yang de bzhin du sbyar ro //
translated: The same should be applied to the latter.

original: yi ge a'as gsung rdo rje dang mnyam pa'i sgrub pa gsungs pa chos kyi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: yi ge a'as gsung rdo rje dang mnyam pa'i sgrub pa gsungs pa chos kyi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The letter A teaches the practice of being equal to Vajra Speech.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo zhes pa ni chos bdag med par ston pa ste /
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo zhes pa ni chos bdag med par ston pa ste /
translated: The Dharma wheel is the teaching of the selflessness of phenomena.

original: snang ba mtha' yas so //
analyzed: snang ba mtha' yas so //
translated: It is Amitabha.

original: rang gi sngags kyis skyes bu bskyed //
analyzed: rang gi sngags kyis skyes bu bskyed //
translated: One should generate the person with one's mantra.

original: ces pa ni yi ge a'as de bskyed pa'i cho gas rdzogs par byas nas yi ge a'a: ngag gi lam ste /
analyzed: ces pa ni yi ge a'as de bskyed pa'i cho gas rdzogs par byas nas yi ge a'a: ngag gi lam ste /
translated: Having completed the rite of generating that with the letter A, the path of speech is the letter A.

original: mgrin par zla ba la mtshan ma'i dbus su bzhag ste zhes so //
analyzed: mgrin par zla ba la mtshan ma'i dbus su bzhag ste zhes so //
translated: One should place it on the moon in the middle of the sign at the throat.

original: 'od zer lnga pa zhes pa ni de las 'phros pa'i 'od zer sna lngas so //
analyzed: 'od zer lnga pa zhes pa ni de las 'phros pa'i 'od zer sna lngas so //
translated: The five lights are the five light rays that radiate from that.

original: rdo rje mchog ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: rdo rje mchog ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The supreme vajra is the discriminating wisdom.

original: de nyid 'jig rten thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pas na 'jig rten dbang mchog go //
analyzed: de nyid 'jig rten thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pas na 'jig rten dbang mchog go //
translated: Since it is the lord of all worlds, it is the supreme lord of the world.

original: de bsgoms pa ni sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis sprul pa bsdu zhing gnas brtan pa'i ngo bor chags par bya'o //
analyzed: de bsgoms pa ni sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis sprul pa bsdu zhing gnas brtan pa'i ngo bor chags par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on that, gathering the emanations with the light rays of the seed syllable and causing them to enter into the essence of the elder.

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: That is stated:

original: dam tshig ye shes rdzogs bya ste //
analyzed: dam tshig ye shes rdzogs bya ste //
translated: The pledge is to perfect the pristine awareness.

original: zhes pa ni dam tshig dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas ye shes kyi rang bzhin snang ba mtha' yas bskyed nas tshig gi dam tshig ces pa ni mi 'da' bas na a'a'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni dam tshig dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas ye shes kyi rang bzhin snang ba mtha' yas bskyed nas tshig gi dam tshig ces pa ni mi 'da' bas na a'a'o //
translated: This is to say, the yogin who is endowed with the pledge, having generated the nature of pristine awareness, Amitābha, should not transgress the pledge of speech, and so is “A.”

original: 'od zer sna lnga dang ldan pas na lnga'i mchog go //
analyzed: 'od zer sna lnga dang ldan pas na lnga'i mchog go //
translated: Since it is endowed with five lights, it is “the supreme of the five.”

original: chos kyi tshig gi lam ni kha ste mgrin par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi tshig gi lam ni kha ste mgrin par gnas pa'o //
translated: The path of the word of the Dharma is the mouth, which is to say, the throat.

original: des ni gong ltar rdo rje chos ni bsgrub par byas pas ji skad du gsungs pa'i yon tan du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des ni gong ltar rdo rje chos ni bsgrub par byas pas ji skad du gsungs pa'i yon tan du 'gyur ro //
translated: As above, having accomplished Vajradharma, one will attain the qualities as stated.

original: gsung rdo rje ni snang ba mtha' yas so //
analyzed: gsung rdo rje ni snang ba mtha' yas so //
translated: Vajra Speech is Amitābha.

original: mi 'da' bas na dam tshig go //
analyzed: mi 'da' bas na dam tshig go //
translated: Since one does not transgress, it is a pledge.

original: de 'di las byung ba'i phyir na de skad do //
analyzed: de 'di las byung ba'i phyir na de skad do //
translated: Since it arises from this, it is so called.

original: yi ge h'um gis thugs rdo rje dang mnyam pa'i sgrub ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: yi ge h'um gis thugs rdo rje dang mnyam pa'i sgrub ba gsungs pa /
translated: The syllable hūṃ is taught to be the means of accomplishing the equality of mind vajra.

original: rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The vajra maṇḍala and so on.

original: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa 'di ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa 'di ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: The vajra maṇḍala is the pristine awareness of the expanse of reality, which is Akṣobhya.

original: rang sngags skyes bu rdzogs byas la //🔽zhes pa ni yi ge h'um gis de bskyed pa'i cho ga rdzogs par byas nas sems la @48a * //
analyzed: rang sngags skyes bu rdzogs byas la // zhes pa ni yi ge h'um gis de bskyed pa'i cho ga rdzogs par byas nas sems la @48a * //
translated: Having completed the being born from one's mantra,🔽one should visualize the mind,

original: zhes te thugs kar zla ba la mtshan ma'i dbus su h'um gnas par bsam mo //
analyzed: zhes te thugs kar zla ba la mtshan ma'i dbus su h'um gnas par bsam mo //
translated: that is, one should imagine the syllable hum in the middle of the sign on the moon at the heart.

original: dam tshig chen po ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig chen po ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: Great commitment is Akshobhya.

original: de sems pa ni sku ste kha dog lnga dang ldan pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de sems pa ni sku ste kha dog lnga dang ldan pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should visualize his mind, that is, his body, which is white in color.

original: des rdo rje kun zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
analyzed: des rdo rje kun zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
translated: By that, all vajras are the Tathagatas.

original: rgyal ba'i gnas ni chos kyi dbyings te mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i gnas ni chos kyi dbyings te mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: The abode of the Victor is the realm of phenomena, which is Akshobhya.

original: de rnams der byas pa bsdu zhing gnas brtan pa'i ngo bor chags par byas pas ji skad gsungs pa'i yon tan du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rnams der byas pa bsdu zhing gnas brtan pa'i ngo bor chags par byas pas ji skad gsungs pa'i yon tan du 'gyur ro //
translated: Having gathered them there, and having made them abide in the nature of the elders, one will attain the qualities as stated.

original: ye shes ni ye shes lnga'o //
analyzed: ye shes ni ye shes lnga'o //
translated: Wisdom is the five wisdoms.

original: yon tan ni stobs la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: yon tan ni stobs la sogs pa'o //
translated: The qualities are the powers and so forth.

original: de'i rten rgya mtsho lta bur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i rten rgya mtsho lta bur 'gyur ro //
translated: One should visualize them as an ocean-like basis for those.

original: thugs nyid mi 'da' bas na dam tshig ste rdo rje'o //
analyzed: thugs nyid mi 'da' bas na dam tshig ste rdo rje'o //
translated: The mind itself is commitment, which is a vajra.

original: de dang 'dra ba 'grub pa de la de skad do //
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba 'grub pa de la de skad do //
translated: That which is accomplished like that is so called.

original: mi snang ba'i sgrub pa la nam mkha'i snying po'i kham gis sgrub pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: mi snang ba'i sgrub pa la nam mkha'i snying po'i kham gis sgrub pa gsungs pa /
translated: In the practice of invisibility, the practice of Akashagarbha is taught.

original: ye shes zhes pa ni me long lta bu ste /
analyzed: ye shes zhes pa ni me long lta bu ste /
translated: Wisdom is the mirror-like one.

original: de las grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ni gzhal yas khang ngo //
analyzed: de las grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ni gzhal yas khang ngo //
translated: The mandala accomplished from that is the celestial mansion.

original: de'i dbus su mnyam par gzhag go zhes so //
analyzed: de'i dbus su mnyam par gzhag go zhes so //
translated: In the middle of that, one should meditate.

original: rdo rje chen po bsam par bya //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po bsam par bya //
translated: One should imagine the great vajra.

original: zhes pa ni nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya chen po bskyed pa'i cho ga brgyad rdzogs pas lus rnams kun la kham dmigs nas zhes pa ni rang bzhin gyis gnas te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya chen po bskyed pa'i cho ga brgyad rdzogs pas lus rnams kun la kham dmigs nas zhes pa ni rang bzhin gyis gnas te /
translated: This is the procedure for generating the great seal of Akashagarbha, with the eight complete, and then visualizing the syllable kham in all the bodies.

original: gnas bzhi'i lha ma gtogs pa lus thams cad yi ge kham ser pos gtams la /
analyzed: gnas bzhi'i lha ma gtogs pa lus thams cad yi ge kham ser pos gtams la /
translated: The bodies are filled with the yellow syllable kham, except for the deities of the four places.

original: de'i 'od zer gyis bde bar gshegs pa thams cad nam mkha'i snying po'i gzugs su byas pa bkug nas /
analyzed: de'i 'od zer gyis bde bar gshegs pa thams cad nam mkha'i snying po'i gzugs su byas pa bkug nas /
translated: The light rays from that draw in all the Sugatas in the form of Akashagarbha.

original: lus kun la zhugs pa dang gzhi brtan pa'i ngo bor chags par byas pas ye shes rdo rje ste /
analyzed: lus kun la zhugs pa dang gzhi brtan pa'i ngo bor chags par byas pas ye shes rdo rje ste /
translated: The vajra of exalted wisdom is the vajra of exalted wisdom, since it is the vajra of exalted wisdom that is the nature of the firm basis of the pervasion of the entire body.

original: nam mkha'i snying po dang 'dra bar 'gyur zhes so //
analyzed: nam mkha'i snying po dang 'dra bar 'gyur zhes so //
translated: One becomes like Akashagarbha.

original: de'i yon tan yang sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa ste go sla'o //
analyzed: de'i yon tan yang sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa ste go sla'o //
translated: His qualities are also easy to understand, such as the buddhas.

original: nam mkha' bzhin du mi snang bas na rdo rje ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' bzhin du mi snang bas na rdo rje ste /
translated: The vajra is like space, since it is invisible.

original: dam tshig gi de nyid de ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gi de nyid de ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: That reality of the commitments is Great Vajradhara.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
translated: The vajra of body, speech, and mind are the Tathagatas.

original: de nyid nam mkha'i snying po'i gzugs su byas pa ni snang ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid nam mkha'i snying po'i gzugs su byas pa ni snang ba'o //
translated: That very [reality] is the appearance, since it is made into the form of Akashagarbha.

original: de nyid rgyan te mang po 'dus pas na bkod pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid rgyan te mang po 'dus pas na bkod pa'o //
translated: That very [reality] is the array, since it is the collection of many.

original: mdzes par byed pas na phreng ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mdzes par byed pas na phreng ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is the garland, since it is the beautifier.

original: 'jam dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis byang chub sems dpa'i rig 'dzin sgrub pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'jam dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis byang chub sems dpa'i rig 'dzin sgrub pa gsungs pa /
translated: The attainment of the knowledge-holder bodhisattva is taught by the samadhi of Manjushri.

original: rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: [It is taught] by the vajra, etc.

original: rdo rje dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis dag pa'i 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor ni de skad do //
analyzed: rdo rje dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis dag pa'i 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor ni de skad do //
translated: The vajra maṇḍala is the maṇḍala of Mañjuśrī purified by the gnosis of the dharmadhātu.

original: rang @48b sngags skyes bu rab bsams la //
analyzed: rang @48b sngags skyes bu rab bsams la //
translated: Having well contemplated the being born from one’s mantra,

original: zhes pa ni yi ge ham las 'jam dpal bskyed pa'i cho ga rdzogs par byas nas /
analyzed: zhes pa ni yi ge ham las 'jam dpal bskyed pa'i cho ga rdzogs par byas nas /
translated: having completed the rite of generating Mañjuśrī from the letter haṃ,

original: de'i snying gar zla ba la mtshan ma'i dbus su h'um zhes pa bzhag ste /
analyzed: de'i snying gar zla ba la mtshan ma'i dbus su h'um zhes pa bzhag ste /
translated: one should place the syllable hūṃ on a moon in his heart, in the middle of the sign.

original: de la kha dog lnga pa'i 'od zer rnam par spros pas /
analyzed: de la kha dog lnga pa'i 'od zer rnam par spros pas /
translated: Having emanated light rays of five colors from that,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'jam dpal gyi gzugs su byas nas slar bsdus te rang la zhugs nas gzhi brtan pa'i ngo bor chags par byas pas ji skad du gsungs pa'i yon tan du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'jam dpal gyi gzugs su byas nas slar bsdus te rang la zhugs nas gzhi brtan pa'i ngo bor chags par byas pas ji skad du gsungs pa'i yon tan du 'gyur ro //
translated: having made all the tathāgatas into the form of Mañjuśrī, having reabsorbed them, having caused them to enter oneself, and having made them stable in the nature of the basis, one will have the qualities as described.

original: zhes so // de yang gang zhe na /🔽'jam dpal dam tshig longs spyod pa //
analyzed: zhes so // de yang gang zhe na / 'jam dpal dam tshig longs spyod pa //
translated: What is that?🔽The enjoyment of the Mañjuśrī pledge

original: zhes pa ni 'dis 'jam dpal gyi go 'phang thob pa las mi 'da' bas so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'dis 'jam dpal gyi go 'phang thob pa las mi 'da' bas so //
translated: is not transgressing the attainment of the state of Mañjuśrī.

original: sa bcu la gnas zhes pa ni 'bras bu'i 'jam dpal ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: sa bcu la gnas zhes pa ni 'bras bu'i 'jam dpal ma yin pa'o //
translated: The one abiding on the ten stages is not the fruitional Manjushri.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes nyid mi 'da' bas ni dam tshig go //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes nyid mi 'da' bas ni dam tshig go //
translated: Since the wisdom of the bodhisattva does not pass beyond, it is a pledge.

original: des gsal bar byed pas na zla ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: des gsal bar byed pas na zla ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Since it illuminates with that, it is called the moon.

original: cho ga de kho nas thlim gyi sgrub pa yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: cho ga de kho nas thlim gyi sgrub pa yang gsungs pa /
translated: By that very rite, he also teaches the accomplishment of THLĪM:

original: 'od zer 'bar ba'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'od zer 'bar ba'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Blazing with light rays” and so forth.

original: rdul phran rdo rje lus ngag gis //
analyzed: rdul phran rdo rje lus ngag gis //
translated: “The body and speech of the atom vajra”

original: zhes pa ni de'i 'od zer gyis bde bar gshegs pa rdul phra rab 'jam dpal du byas pa las bskyed ces so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de'i 'od zer gyis bde bar gshegs pa rdul phra rab 'jam dpal du byas pa las bskyed ces so //
translated: means that the light rays of that [THLĪM] transform the atoms of the sugatas into Manjushri, and he is generated from that.

original: des 'jam dpal rdo rje'i sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur zhes te sa bcu la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: des 'jam dpal rdo rje'i sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur zhes te sa bcu la gnas pa'o //
translated: By that, one becomes like the body of Manjushri Vajra, abiding on the ten stages.

original: nam mkha' rdo rje zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: nam mkha' rdo rje zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: “Space vajra” is the dharmadhatu.

original: 'jam dpal nyid de las mi 'da' bas na dam tshig go //
analyzed: 'jam dpal nyid de las mi 'da' bas na dam tshig go //
translated: Since Manjushri does not pass beyond that, it is a pledge.

original: mdzes par byed pas na rgyan gyis gnas pa'o //
analyzed: mdzes par byed pas na rgyan gyis gnas pa'o //
translated: Since it beautifies, it is an ornament.

original: mang po 'dus pas na bkod pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mang po 'dus pas na bkod pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Since it is an assembly of many, it is called an array.

original: da ni mngon par shes pa lnga'i sgrub pa bsdus pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni mngon par shes pa lnga'i sgrub pa bsdus pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the accomplishment of the five superknowledges is taught.

original: sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The buddha and so forth.

original: sangs rgyas mngon shes ni sangs rgyas kyi mngon par shes pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mngon shes ni sangs rgyas kyi mngon par shes pa'o //
translated: The buddha's superknowledge is the buddha's superknowledge.

original: de'i sngon du 'gro zhing mi 'da' bas na dam tshig mchog ces so //
analyzed: de'i sngon du 'gro zhing mi 'da' bas na dam tshig mchog ces so //
translated: Since it is the forerunner of that and does not pass beyond, it is called supreme commitment.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na /
translated: For that very reason,

original: mngon shes lnga dang 'dra bar 'gyur //
analyzed: mngon shes lnga dang 'dra bar 'gyur //
translated: it becomes like the five superknowledges.

original: zhes te dngos ni ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes te dngos ni ma yin pa'o //
translated: It is not the actual thing.

original: de bas na 'di yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa rab tu sgrub pa'i rgyu yin no zhes spyir bstan pa'o //🔽de ltar sku gsung thugs kyi sa bon gyis bsgrub pa bstan nas da ni ye shes lnga'i aom lngas sgrub pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bas na 'di yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa rab tu sgrub pa'i rgyu yin no zhes spyir bstan pa'o // de ltar sku gsung thugs kyi sa bon gyis bsgrub pa bstan nas da ni ye shes lnga'i aom lngas sgrub pa gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, this is also the cause of accomplishing the superknowledge of all buddhas.

original: nam mkha'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Having thus taught the accomplishment by the seed syllables of body, speech, and mind, now, the accomplishment by the five oṃ syllables of the five gnoses is taught, beginning with space, and so on.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni //
translated: In the center of the realm of space

original: zhes pa ni chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi dbus su'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi dbus su'o //
translated: means in the center of the source of phenomena.

original: @49a * // sangs rgyas ni rnam par snang mdzad de de las gyur pa'i gzhal yas khang ni dkyil 'khor dam pa'o //
analyzed: @49a * // sangs rgyas ni rnam par snang mdzad de de las gyur pa'i gzhal yas khang ni dkyil 'khor dam pa'o //
translated: The Buddha is Vairocana, and the palace that has come from him is the holy mandala.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' rab bsgoms la //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' rab bsgoms la //
translated: Having meditated on Vajrasattva,

original: zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'am mi bskyod pa bskyed pa'i cho ga rdzogs par byas nas zhes so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'am mi bskyod pa bskyed pa'i cho ga rdzogs par byas nas zhes so //
translated: having completed the rite of generating Vajrasattva or Akshobhya,

original: ye shes aom ni bsgom par bya //
analyzed: ye shes aom ni bsgom par bya //
translated: one should meditate on the syllable Om of intuition.

original: zhes pa ni de'i thugs kar zla ba la gnas pa'i mtshan ma'i dbus su chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi aom bsams nas /
analyzed: zhes pa ni de'i thugs kar zla ba la gnas pa'i mtshan ma'i dbus su chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi aom bsams nas /
translated: Having imagined the syllable Om of the intuition of the realm of reality in the center of the sign located on the moon at his heart,

original: de'i 'od zer stug pos bde bar gshegs pa thams cad rgyu dang 'bras bu'i gzugs su byas pa bsdus pa bcug nas gzhi brtan pa'i dngos po rgyun mi 'chad par bsgoms pas ji skad du gsungs pa'i yon tan du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i 'od zer stug pos bde bar gshegs pa thams cad rgyu dang 'bras bu'i gzugs su byas pa bsdus pa bcug nas gzhi brtan pa'i dngos po rgyun mi 'chad par bsgoms pas ji skad du gsungs pa'i yon tan du 'gyur ro //
translated: one should meditate on the uninterrupted process of the firm basis, by the gathering and entry of all Sugatas in the form of cause and effect, by the thick light rays from that.

original: rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas //
analyzed: rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas //
translated: By meditating on the three vajra commitments,

original: zhes pa ni de yang yi ge gsum gyi bar du chud pa bzlas pas gong ma ltar dpag par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de yang yi ge gsum gyi bar du chud pa bzlas pas gong ma ltar dpag par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, one should count as above by means of the repetition contained in the three syllables.

original: gzhan ni go sla'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni go sla'o //
translated: The other is easy to understand.

original: mi bskyod rdo rje ni de dang 'dra ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'o ;
analyzed: mi bskyod rdo rje ni de dang 'dra ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'o ;
translated: Akshobhya-vajra is the knowledge-holder who is like that.

original: / mi bskyod sku dang mnyam pa ni rig 'dzin no //
analyzed: / mi bskyod sku dang mnyam pa ni rig 'dzin no //
translated: Equal to the body of Akshobhya is the knowledge-holder.

original: de nyid mi bskyod pa'i mngon par byang chub pa dam tshig rdo rje zhes pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: de nyid mi bskyod pa'i mngon par byang chub pa dam tshig rdo rje zhes pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: That very one is the cause of the pledge-vajra of the manifest enlightenment of Akshobhya.

original: rin chen dbang phyug gi sgrub pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: rin chen dbang phyug gi sgrub pa gsungs pa /
translated: The accomplishment of Ratnasaṃbhava is stated:

original: nam mkha'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “The vajra of space,” and so on.

original: nam mkha'i rdo rje zhes pa ni nam mkha' bzhin du mi phyed pas na rin chen dbang phyug go //
analyzed: nam mkha'i rdo rje zhes pa ni nam mkha' bzhin du mi phyed pas na rin chen dbang phyug go //
translated: The vajra of space is Ratnasaṃbhava, because it is indivisible like space.

original: rin chen aom ni bsam par bya //
analyzed: rin chen aom ni bsam par bya //
translated: One should think of the jewel-om.

original: zhes pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi aom mo //
analyzed: zhes pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi aom mo //
translated: The om of the nature of the gnosis of equality.

original: byang chub bdag med pa ni gnyis kyi bdag dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub bdag med pa ni gnyis kyi bdag dang bral ba'o //
translated: Enlightenment is selfless, free from the self of the two.

original: de nyid ye shes gsang ba ste rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes so //
analyzed: de nyid ye shes gsang ba ste rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes so //
translated: That very one is the secret of gnosis, the gnosis of the three vajras.

original: de'i rten du 'gyur bas na gnas so //
analyzed: de'i rten du 'gyur bas na gnas so //
translated: Since it is the basis of that, it is the abode.

original: rin po che'i rigs sgrub pa las mi 'da' bas na rin po che'i dam tshig go //
analyzed: rin po che'i rigs sgrub pa las mi 'da' bas na rin po che'i dam tshig go //
translated: Since it is the jewel pledge, it is the jewel pledge.

original: des de'i phan yon gyi tshogs la longs spyod pa nyid rdo rje ste de'i tshul lo //
analyzed: des de'i phan yon gyi tshogs la longs spyod pa nyid rdo rje ste de'i tshul lo //
translated: Since it is the means of enjoying the accumulation of its benefits, it is the vajra.

original: 'od dpag med kyi sgrub pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'od dpag med kyi sgrub pa gsungs pa /
translated: The accomplishment of Amitābha is stated:

original: nam mkha' zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Space, etc.

original: 'jig rten dbang po zhes pa ni 'jig rten gyi bdag por gyur pa de snang ba mtha' yas so //
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang po zhes pa ni 'jig rten gyi bdag por gyur pa de snang ba mtha' yas so //
translated: The lord of the world is Amitābha, who is the lord of the world.

original: de rab tu bsgom pa la zhes so //
analyzed: de rab tu bsgom pa la zhes so //
translated: It is cultivated by him.

original: chos kyi aom zhes pa ni so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi aom mo //
analyzed: chos kyi aom zhes pa ni so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi aom mo //
translated: The dharma-oṃ is the oṃ of the nature of the gnosis of discernment.

original: theg chen lam gyi mchog tu gyur //
analyzed: theg chen lam gyi mchog tu gyur //
translated: It is the supreme of the Mahāyāna path.

original: zhes pa ni theg pa chen po'i lam ston pa ni gsung ste de nyid mchog @49b go ;
analyzed: zhes pa ni theg pa chen po'i lam ston pa ni gsung ste de nyid mchog @49b go ;
translated: It is the speech that teaches the Mahāyāna path, and it is supreme.

original: / de yang 'di la brten nas 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: / de yang 'di la brten nas 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is because it is based on that that it occurs.

original: yon tan dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje ni snang ba mtha' yas so //
analyzed: yon tan dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje ni snang ba mtha' yas so //
translated: The vajra of immeasurable qualities is Amitābha.🔽 🔽The supreme of all mantras is the mantra of the nature of the gnosis of accomplishment.

original: de'i sngon du mdzes shing rgyal mtshan dang 'dra bas na 'od kyi dpal zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i sngon du mdzes shing rgyal mtshan dang 'dra bas na 'od kyi dpal zhes bya'o //
translated: Prior to that, it is the glory of light, since it is beautiful and like a victory banner.

original: don yod grub pa'i sgrub pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: don yod grub pa'i sgrub pa gsungs pa /
translated: The accomplishment of Amoghasiddhi is taught:

original: nam mkha' zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “In the sky, etc.

original: rdo rje autpala zhes pa ni las kyis sna tshogs su gyes pa ste don yod grub pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje autpala zhes pa ni las kyis sna tshogs su gyes pa ste don yod grub pa'o //
translated: The vajra lotus is Amoghasiddhi, since it is the differentiation of action in various ways.

original: dam tshig aom zhes pa ni mi 'da' bas te bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi aom mo //
analyzed: dam tshig aom zhes pa ni mi 'da' bas te bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi aom mo //
translated: The commitment is the syllable Om, since it is the nature of the gnosis of successful activity, since it is not transgressed.

original: dpal ldan ye shes gtso ni don yod grub pa'o //
analyzed: dpal ldan ye shes gtso ni don yod grub pa'o //
translated: The glorious chief of gnosis is Amoghasiddhi.

original: sems can gyi don byed pas kyang de ste de las 'byung bar 'gyur zhes pa'i don to ;
analyzed: sems can gyi don byed pas kyang de ste de las 'byung bar 'gyur zhes pa'i don to ;
translated: It is also the benefit of sentient beings, since it arises from that.

original: / gdon ni za ba'i dam tshig ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes so //
analyzed: / gdon ni za ba'i dam tshig ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes so //
translated: The commitment to eat the oblation is the gnosis of successful activity.

original: de nyid sprul pas na 'od zer ro //
analyzed: de nyid sprul pas na 'od zer ro //
translated: Since it is emanated from that, it is the light ray.

original: ye shes mchog ni phyag rgya chen po ste de 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ye shes mchog ni phyag rgya chen po ste de 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
translated: The supreme gnosis is the great seal, and it arises from that.

original: rnam bar snang mdzad 'dir ma gsungs pa ni 'og tu shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam bar snang mdzad 'dir ma gsungs pa ni 'og tu shes par bya'o //
translated: Vairochana is not mentioned here, but it will be known below.

original: da ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas sku gsum gyi aom gyi sgrub pa gsungs pa /🔽nam mkha' zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: da ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas sku gsum gyi aom gyi sgrub pa gsungs pa / nam mkha' zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Now, the yoga of Vairochana is taught, the accomplishment of the three-body OṂ.

original: sku gsum aom zhes pa ni chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa'i sku'i rang bzhin mtshan ma gsum la snying ga dang / mgrin pa dang spyi bor kha dog gsum dang ldan pa bsams te gzhan gong ma ltar dpag par bya'o //
analyzed: sku gsum aom zhes pa ni chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa'i sku'i rang bzhin mtshan ma gsum la snying ga dang / mgrin pa dang spyi bor kha dog gsum dang ldan pa bsams te gzhan gong ma ltar dpag par bya'o //
translated: The three-body OṂ is the three signs of the nature of the three bodies, the dharmakāya, sambhogakāya, and nirmāṇakāya, imagined at the heart, throat, and head, with the three colors. The rest is to be inferred as above.

original: ye shes byang chub ni me long lta bu'o //
analyzed: ye shes byang chub ni me long lta bu'o //
translated: The wisdom enlightenment is the mirror-like one.

original: de'i sku gsum ni mi phyed pa yang 'di la brten nas thob par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de'i sku gsum ni mi phyed pa yang 'di la brten nas thob par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The three bodies of that are the indivisible ones, which are attained in dependence on this.

original: lus dang ngag dang sems ni sgo gsum mo //
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang sems ni sgo gsum mo //
translated: The body, speech, and mind are the three doors.

original: de nyid aom gsum du bsgom pa ni rdo rjer dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid aom gsum du bsgom pa ni rdo rjer dmigs pa'o //
translated: The meditation on those as the three OṂs is the observation of the vajra.

original: de nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyu yin bas na de skad do //
analyzed: de nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyu yin bas na de skad do //
translated: That is the cause of manifest enlightenment, and so it is called that.

original: 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan ma gsungs pa ni gong du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan ma gsungs pa ni gong du shes par bya'o //
translated: Here, the other tathāgatas are not mentioned, but they are to be understood as above.

original: da ni gnas phun sum tshogs pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni gnas phun sum tshogs pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the excellent place is taught:🔽In a very isolated mountain wilderness, on a mountain of various forms,🔽on a riverbank or in a charnel ground,

original: shin tu dben pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu dben pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: in a pleasant or frightening place,🔽one should practice the yoga of the two accumulations.

original: skye bo 'dus pa spangs pa'i sa phyogs kyi ri ni shin tu dben pa'i ri dgon no //
analyzed: skye bo 'dus pa spangs pa'i sa phyogs kyi ri ni shin tu dben pa'i ri dgon no //
translated: In a very isolated mountain wilderness: a mountain wilderness is a place in the mountains that is free from crowds of people.

original: rtsi shing nags tshal la sogs pas brgyan pa'i ri ni rnam pa sna tshogs ri'o //🔽klung chen po ni chu chen po 'bab ba'i 'gram ni klung dang 'bab chu'o //
analyzed: rtsi shing nags tshal la sogs pas brgyan pa'i ri ni rnam pa sna tshogs ri'o // klung chen po ni chu chen po 'bab ba'i 'gram ni klung dang 'bab chu'o //
translated: On a mountain of various forms: a mountain adorned with trees, forests, and so on.

original: srog song ba bskyal ba'i sa ni dur khrod do //
analyzed: srog song ba bskyal ba'i sa ni dur khrod do //
translated: On a riverbank or in a charnel ground: a riverbank is a place where a great river flows. A charnel ground is a place where living beings are cremated.

original: sogs kyi sgras bsdus pa yid du 'ong ba dang 'jigs su rung ba ji snyed bsdu'o //🔽bsam gtan @50a * //
analyzed: sogs kyi sgras bsdus pa yid du 'ong ba dang 'jigs su rung ba ji snyed bsdu'o // bsam gtan @50a * //
translated: The words “and so on” include pleasant and frightening places.

original: bsdus pa 'di dag bsgom zhes pa ni der bskyed pa'i rim pas bsnyen pa bya ba dang bsgrub pa bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: bsdus pa 'di dag bsgom zhes pa ni der bskyed pa'i rim pas bsnyen pa bya ba dang bsgrub pa bya'o zhes so //
translated: One should practice the yoga of the two accumulations: one should practice the approach and accomplishment by generating the creation stage in those places.

original: gzhan du na shin tu dben pa'i ri dgon pa ni bud med 'ga' zhig gzhan gyis phyed par dka' ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan du na shin tu dben pa'i ri dgon pa ni bud med 'ga' zhig gzhan gyis phyed par dka' ba'o //
translated: Otherwise, a very isolated mountain wilderness is difficult for any woman to reach.

original: de nyid nu ma dang rked pa phra ba dang / rkub tshos che ba la sogs pa ni rnam pa sna tshogs ri bo'o //
analyzed: de nyid nu ma dang rked pa phra ba dang / rkub tshos che ba la sogs pa ni rnam pa sna tshogs ri bo'o //
translated: That very [vajra] is the various aspects of the mountain, such as the breasts and waist being slender and the buttocks being large.

original: smad 'tshong ma la sogs kun gyi thun mong du gyur pa ni klung dang 'bab chu'o //
analyzed: smad 'tshong ma la sogs kun gyi thun mong du gyur pa ni klung dang 'bab chu'o //
translated: The river and waterfall are the common [consorts] of all prostitutes and so forth.

original: gdol ba mo la sogs pa smad pa ni dur khrod do //
analyzed: gdol ba mo la sogs pa smad pa ni dur khrod do //
translated: The charnel ground is the despised [consort] such as the untouchable woman and so forth.

original: sogs kyi sgras bsdus pas lha mo la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sogs kyi sgras bsdus pas lha mo la sogs pa'o //
translated: The goddess and so forth are included by the word and so forth.

original: bsam gtan bsdus pa 'di dag bsgom //
analyzed: bsam gtan bsdus pa 'di dag bsgom //
translated: These are the summarized contemplations.

original: zhes pa ni der ye shes gsum du chos thams cad bsdus pa rdzogs pa'i rim pa rtogs pa dang phyin ci ma log par bsgom pa dang / mi 'gyur bar brnyes par bya'o zhes ji snyed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni der ye shes gsum du chos thams cad bsdus pa rdzogs pa'i rim pa rtogs pa dang phyin ci ma log par bsgom pa dang / mi 'gyur bar brnyes par bya'o zhes ji snyed pa'o //
translated: This means that all phenomena are summarized in the three exalted wisdoms, and one should realize the stage of completion, meditate without error, and attain immutability.

original: da ni thun mong gi dngos grub gnyis pa la gnas pa'i cho ga mngon par shes pa lnga sgrub pa gsungs pa /🔽mi bskyod ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: da ni thun mong gi dngos grub gnyis pa la gnas pa'i cho ga mngon par shes pa lnga sgrub pa gsungs pa / mi bskyod ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Now, the ritual of the second stage, the attainment of the five clairvoyances, is taught.

original: mi bskyod ye shes zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: mi bskyod ye shes zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: The “Akshobhya exalted wisdom” is the great seal of Akshobhya.

original: sogs kyi sgras bsdus pa rtag pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / don yod grub pa dang / rang gi lha bsdu'o //
analyzed: sogs kyi sgras bsdus pa rtag pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / don yod grub pa dang / rang gi lha bsdu'o //
translated: and so on, means the eternal, Ratnasaṃbhava, Amitābha, Amoghasiddhi, and one’s own deity.

original: de nyid kyang rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil du bsam //
analyzed: de nyid kyang rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil du bsam //
translated: That very [vajra] is imagined in the middle of the sky.

original: zhes te chos kyi 'byung gnas so //
analyzed: zhes te chos kyi 'byung gnas so //
translated: The “source of phenomena” is the celestial mansion.

original: mngon shes lnga'i sbyor ba ni 'og nas 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: mngon shes lnga'i sbyor ba ni 'og nas 'byung ba'o //
translated: The application of the five superknowledges will come later.

original: sangs rgyas mchog ni rtag pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mchog ni rtag pa'o //
translated: The supreme buddha is the eternal.

original: de las gyur pa ni gnas te gzhal yas khang ngo //
analyzed: de las gyur pa ni gnas te gzhal yas khang ngo //
translated: The abode is the celestial mansion, which is formed from that.

original: der bsgom zhes so //
analyzed: der bsgom zhes so //
translated: One should meditate on that.

original: rdo rje dam tshig chen po ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dam tshig chen po ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The great vajra commitment is Vajradhara.

original: mig la sogs pa'i yul lnga zhes pas ni mngon par mkhyen pa'o //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa'i yul lnga zhes pas ni mngon par mkhyen pa'o //
translated: The five objects of the eyes and so on are the superknowledges.

original: de'i sbyor ba gsungs ba ;
analyzed: de'i sbyor ba gsungs ba ;
translated: The application of that is stated:

original: rdo rje chen po zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The great vajra, and so on.

original: de yang mi bskyod pa bskyed pa'i cho ga rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
analyzed: de yang mi bskyod pa bskyed pa'i cho ga rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
translated: Moreover, the yogin who has completed the rite of generating Akṣobhya

original: mig la sogs pa byang chub sems dpas rgyas btab ste /
analyzed: mig la sogs pa byang chub sems dpas rgyas btab ste /
translated: should seal the eyes and so on with the bodhisattvas.

original: de gnas gyur pa las nyi ma'i gdan la rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa 'od zer sna lnga 'bar bas rnam par brgyan pa /
analyzed: de gnas gyur pa las nyi ma'i gdan la rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa 'od zer sna lnga 'bar bas rnam par brgyan pa /
translated: The transformation of those is the great five-pronged vajra on a sun seat, adorned with blazing five-colored light rays.

original: mig dang rna ba dang snying ga dang lte ba dang dpral ba ste gnas lnga po dag tu bsams la sbyor ba yin te /
analyzed: mig dang rna ba dang snying ga dang lte ba dang dpral ba ste gnas lnga po dag tu bsams la sbyor ba yin te /
translated: One should imagine those at the five places, the eyes, ears, heart, navel, and forehead, and practice.🔽One should meditate on the projection and insertion of the vase as previously explained.

original: de'i bum pa la gong nas gsungs pa'i 'phen cing bcug pa bsgoms la de'i 'od zer gyis de rnams dang mthun pa'i sems dpa' spyan drangs te bcug nas gzhi brtan pa'i dngos por chags par byas pas /
analyzed: de'i bum pa la gong nas gsungs pa'i 'phen cing bcug pa bsgoms la de'i 'od zer gyis de rnams dang mthun pa'i sems dpa' spyan drangs te bcug nas gzhi brtan pa'i dngos por chags par byas pas /
translated: One should invite the heroes who are similar to those light rays, insert them, and cause them to be attached as the basis of stability.

original: rdo rje @50b mngon shes 'dra bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rdo rje @50b mngon shes 'dra bar 'gyur //
translated: One will become like the vajra superknowledge.

original: zhes te le'u bcu gnyis pa las gsungs pa thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes te le'u bcu gnyis pa las gsungs pa thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will attain what is taught in the twelfth chapter.

original: cho ga de kho nas rtag pa'i rnal 'byor pas bsgom par gsungs pa me stag ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: cho ga de kho nas rtag pa'i rnal 'byor pas bsgom par gsungs pa me stag ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The yoga of constancy is taught by the same procedure, “the meditation of the sparks, etc.”

original: rang sngags zhes pa ni rang gi sngags kyi lhar gyur pa las zhes so //
analyzed: rang sngags zhes pa ni rang gi sngags kyi lhar gyur pa las zhes so //
translated: “One’s own mantra” means one’s own mantra deity.

original: rdo rje lnga'i sbyor ba ni sbyor ba gong ma ste /
analyzed: rdo rje lnga'i sbyor ba ni sbyor ba gong ma ste /
translated: The union of the five vajras is the prior union.

original: de ltar 'di yang gnas lngar sbyar nas gong ma ltar rdo rje mngon shes zhes so //
analyzed: de ltar 'di yang gnas lngar sbyar nas gong ma ltar rdo rje mngon shes zhes so //
translated: Thus, this is also applied to the five places, and like the prior one, it is called the vajra superknowledge.

original: de bzhin du rin po che la sogs pa kun la yang sbyor ba 'dis rjes su dpag par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rin po che la sogs pa kun la yang sbyor ba 'dis rjes su dpag par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, this application should be inferred for all the jewels, etc.🔽Now, the wheel is generated from the syllable bhrūṃ immediately after that.

original: da ni yi ge bhr'um gyis de ma thag tu 'khor lor gyur pa gsungs pa /🔽rdo rje nam mkha' zhes pa la sogs pa'o ;
analyzed: da ni yi ge bhr'um gyis de ma thag tu 'khor lor gyur pa gsungs pa / rdo rje nam mkha' zhes pa la sogs pa'o ;
translated: It is said:

original: /'khor lo sangs rgyas 'bar 'od 'dra //
analyzed: /'khor lo sangs rgyas 'bar 'od 'dra //
translated: The wheel is like the blazing light of the Buddha.

original: zhes pa ni bhr'um gnas gyur pa las 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad rnam par dag pa'i 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa ste ba la bhr'um 'od zer dang ldan pa bsgoms te zhes so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni bhr'um gnas gyur pa las 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad rnam par dag pa'i 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa ste ba la bhr'um 'od zer dang ldan pa bsgoms te zhes so //
translated: The wheel is a white eight-spoked wheel, the pure eightfold noble path, generated from the transformation of the syllable bhrūṃ.

original: sangs rgyas 'jug pa zhes pa ni de'i 'od zer gyis bskul ba'i sangs rgyas 'jug pas rnam par snang mdzad bsgoms nas /
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'jug pa zhes pa ni de'i 'od zer gyis bskul ba'i sangs rgyas 'jug pas rnam par snang mdzad bsgoms nas /
translated: The Buddha enters means that after meditating on Vairocana, the Buddha enters by being impelled by the light rays from that.

original: sangs rgyas rten dang bral bar 'gyur //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rten dang bral bar 'gyur //
translated: The Buddha becomes free from a support.

original: zhes te sangs rgyas kyi rten gyi dkyil 'khor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnam par dag pa'i dbyibs can gcig tu gyur pa ste 'dir dpe'i tshig ma yin te /
analyzed: zhes te sangs rgyas kyi rten gyi dkyil 'khor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnam par dag pa'i dbyibs can gcig tu gyur pa ste 'dir dpe'i tshig ma yin te /
translated: Thus, the mandala of the support of the Buddha becomes one having the shape of the thirty-seven factors of enlightenment, which are pure.

original: de'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, the words of the example are not [used], because [the mandala] is the result of that.

original: da ni phra mor sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni phra mor sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the three concentrations of subtle yoga are taught,

original: sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: beginning with “the mandala of the Buddha,” and so on.

original: de la sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni mtshan ma phra mo'i lte bar bsams pa'i gzhal yas khang pa'o //
analyzed: de la sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni mtshan ma phra mo'i lte bar bsams pa'i gzhal yas khang pa'o //
translated: There, the “mandala of the Buddha” is the celestial mansion imagined at the center of the subtle sign.

original: de'i dbus na gnas pa zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dbus na gnas pa zhes pa'o //
translated: “Residing in its center” is that.

original: bdag gi lus la zhes pa ni bdag nyid de ltar snang ba ste /
analyzed: bdag gi lus la zhes pa ni bdag nyid de ltar snang ba ste /
translated: “In my body” is oneself appearing as that,

original: dam tshig sems dpa' phra mo'o //
analyzed: dam tshig sems dpa' phra mo'o //
translated: the subtle commitment being.

original: de nyid kyang rnam par snang mdzad du mnyam par gzhag go zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyang rnam par snang mdzad du mnyam par gzhag go zhes pa'o //
translated: That very [commitment being] is equipoised as Vairocana.

original: snying gar yi ge aom bsams la //
analyzed: snying gar yi ge aom bsams la //
translated: Visualize the syllable oṃ at the heart.

original: zhes pa ni de'i thugs kar mtshan ma la gnas pa'i ye shes sems dpa'i 'khor lo'i snying gar yang mtshan ma la yi ge aom bsams te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni de'i thugs kar mtshan ma la gnas pa'i ye shes sems dpa'i 'khor lo'i snying gar yang mtshan ma la yi ge aom bsams te /
translated: At the heart of the gnosis being who is marked at the heart of the commitment being, imagine an oṃ marked at the heart of the wheel.🔽

original: de nyid sngags kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom zhes te /
analyzed: de nyid sngags kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom zhes te /
translated: This is the meditation on the mantra-form of one’s consciousness in the heart of the gnosis being at the heart of the insignia, which is in turn at the heart of the insignia at the heart of the wheel at the heart of the gnosis being.

original: thig le'i gzugs can la rang gi rnam par shes pa de'i yan lag gnyis pas gzung pa'o //
analyzed: thig le'i gzugs can la rang gi rnam par shes pa de'i yan lag gnyis pas gzung pa'o //
translated: The second limb is the retention of one’s consciousness in the form of a drop.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: rang sngags snying gar bzhag nas su //
analyzed: rang sngags snying gar bzhag nas su //
translated: Having placed one’s mantra at the heart,

original: dbus ni thig ler gyur par gzhag / rang dbang rin chen @51a * //🔽dgag pa yis //
analyzed: dbus ni thig ler gyur par gzhag / rang dbang rin chen @51a * // dgag pa yis //
translated: one should place the center in the form of a drop.🔽The jewel of self-mastery🔽is explained as the retention of the jewel

original: rin chen gzung bar yang dag bshad //
analyzed: rin chen gzung bar yang dag bshad //
translated: through the blocking of the winds.

original: ces so // des cir 'gyur zhe na /🔽'gog pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ces so // des cir 'gyur zhe na / 'gog pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: What is the result of this?

original: 'gog pa'i rdo rje zhes pa ni dbugs 'jug pa'i spyod pas so //
analyzed: 'gog pa'i rdo rje zhes pa ni dbugs 'jug pa'i spyod pas so //
translated: The “vajra of cessation” is the conduct of the inhalation of the winds.

original: sems nyid du ni zhes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i sems de nyid do //🔽nam zhig de la reg 'gyur na //
analyzed: sems nyid du ni zhes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i sems de nyid do // nam zhig de la reg 'gyur na //
translated: “In the mind itself” is the mind that has become the cessation.

original: zhes pa ni brtan par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni brtan par gyur pa'o //
translated: “When one touches it” is when it becomes stable.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog 'dzin pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog 'dzin pa //
translated: One holds the supreme of all Buddhas,

original: yid bzhin dpal ldan 'dra bar 'gyur //
analyzed: yid bzhin dpal ldan 'dra bar 'gyur //
translated: and becomes like the glorious wish-fulfilling gem.

original: zhes te bstan pa la de dang 'dra ba'i rtags rnyed de de gong nas gong du 'phel nas ji srid der gyur pa'i bar du thob par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: zhes te bstan pa la de dang 'dra ba'i rtags rnyed de de gong nas gong du 'phel nas ji srid der gyur pa'i bar du thob par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Thus, one should understand that the signs of that [attainment] are found in the teaching, and that [the signs] increase more and more until one attains that [state].

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As [the tantra] says:

original: sems ni 'gog pa'i rdo rjer 'gyur //
analyzed: sems ni 'gog pa'i rdo rjer 'gyur //
translated: The mind becomes the vajra of cessation,

original: mtshan ma nyer 'dzin 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: mtshan ma nyer 'dzin 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: and the apprehension of signs arises.

original: mtshan ma'i khams ni rnam pa lnga //
analyzed: mtshan ma'i khams ni rnam pa lnga //
translated: The realm of signs is of five kinds,

original: byang chub rdo rjes gsungs pa yin //
analyzed: byang chub rdo rjes gsungs pa yin //
translated: taught by the Awakened Vajra.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par gsungs pa dang sbyor ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par gsungs pa dang sbyor ro //
translated: And so on extensively.

original: de ltar mi bskyod pa la sogs pa gzhan la sbyar ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar mi bskyod pa la sogs pa gzhan la sbyar ba gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, it is said that one should apply [this process] to Akshobhya and the others.

original: sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: [The verse] beginning with “Buddha” and so on.

original: don gyi mjug bsdu ba ni 'di ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: don gyi mjug bsdu ba ni 'di ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The summary of the meaning is [the verse] beginning with “this is.

original: dam tshig mchog yin te zhes pa ni las dang po la zhugs pas 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pas so //
analyzed: dam tshig mchog yin te zhes pa ni las dang po la zhugs pas 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pas so //
translated: ” It is the supreme commitment because it is not to be transgressed by one who has entered the beginner’s stage.

original: rdo rje gsum gyi rang bzhin yin pas na rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum gyi rang bzhin yin pas na rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgom pa'o //
translated: Since it is the nature of the three vajras, it is the meditation on the three indivisible vajras.

original: mi g-yo zhing brtan par byed pas na 'gog pa'i dam tshig ye shes so //
analyzed: mi g-yo zhing brtan par byed pas na 'gog pa'i dam tshig ye shes so //
translated: Since it is unmoving and firm, it is the pledge of cessation, wisdom.

original: des kyang rim gyis phyag rgya chen po mngon du byed pas na sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'o zhes bya'o //
analyzed: des kyang rim gyis phyag rgya chen po mngon du byed pas na sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'o zhes bya'o //
translated: Since it gradually causes the Great Seal to manifest, it is the attainment of the accomplishment of Buddhahood.

original: da ni gong du gsungs pa'i sku gsum gyi aom rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na tshe'i rig 'dzin grub pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni gong du gsungs pa'i sku gsum gyi aom rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na tshe'i rig 'dzin grub pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, it is said that the practitioner of Vairocana, having meditated on the Om of the three bodies mentioned above, attains the life-vidyādhara.

original: nam mkha' zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: [The Bhagavān] declares space, etc.

original: rdo rje zhes pa ni bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes pa ni bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'o //
translated: Vajra is the protection cakra.

original: nam mkha' ni chos kyi 'byung gnas so //
analyzed: nam mkha' ni chos kyi 'byung gnas so //
translated: Space is the source of phenomena.

original: de'i dbus na gnas pa ni gzhal yas khang pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dbus na gnas pa ni gzhal yas khang pa'o //
translated: In the middle of that, existing is the celestial mansion.

original: gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te der bsgom par bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad longs spyod bzhis bskyed pa'i cho ga rdzogs pas gong ma ltar /
analyzed: gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te der bsgom par bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad longs spyod bzhis bskyed pa'i cho ga rdzogs pas gong ma ltar /
translated: The mandala of light is the mandala of the moon, and one should meditate on it, with the rite complete, generated by the four enjoyments of Vairochana, as above.

original: lus ngag sems la yi ge aom //
analyzed: lus ngag sems la yi ge aom //
translated: The letter OM in body, speech, and mind,

original: bsams nas de ni bskal par gnas //
analyzed: bsams nas de ni bskal par gnas //
translated: having contemplated it, one abides for an eon.

original: zhes bya'o // de bzhin du snang ba mtha' yas dang mi bskyod pa la sbyar @51b ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // de bzhin du snang ba mtha' yas dang mi bskyod pa la sbyar @51b ba gsungs pa /
translated: Thus it is said, and likewise, one should apply it to Amitabha and Akshobhya.

original: rdo rje nam mkha'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje nam mkha'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The vajra of space, etc.

original: rang gi mos pas gnas par brtan pa'i phyir grangs kyi nges pa ma gsungs par yang nas yang du gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi mos pas gnas par brtan pa'i phyir grangs kyi nges pa ma gsungs par yang nas yang du gsungs pa'o //
translated: In order to stabilize one's faith, one should repeat it again and again, without stating a definite number.

original: ye shes lnga dang sku gsum ni thams cad kyi mtshan nyid pas na kun la yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: ye shes lnga dang sku gsum ni thams cad kyi mtshan nyid pas na kun la yang shes par bya'o //
translated: The five pristine awarenesses and the three bodies are the characteristics of all, so one should understand them in all [cases].

original: rdo rje gsum kho na gtso bos sbyor ba ston pa'i phyir rdo rje gsum mo //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum kho na gtso bos sbyor ba ston pa'i phyir rdo rje gsum mo //
translated: The three vajras are the three vajras themselves.

original: ye shes las bsam pa'i dbye bas brtag pas na /
analyzed: ye shes las bsam pa'i dbye bas brtag pas na /
translated: The analysis is by way of the distinctions of intention from pristine awareness.

original: rtog pa'i ye shes te mi 'da' bas na dam tshig go //
analyzed: rtog pa'i ye shes te mi 'da' bas na dam tshig go //
translated: The pristine awareness of the imagination is the pledge, because it is not transgressed.

original: gzhan yang phan yon gsungs pa /
analyzed: gzhan yang phan yon gsungs pa /
translated: Moreover, the benefits are stated:

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ni de'i rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ni de'i rnal 'byor ro //
translated: The yoga of the vajra body, speech, and mind is the yoga of the vajra body, speech, and mind.

original: 'dir gyur phyin chad ces pa ni bla ma las nges pa'i lung thob nas /
analyzed: 'dir gyur phyin chad ces pa ni bla ma las nges pa'i lung thob nas /
translated: From this time forward means that, having obtained the definitive transmission from the guru,

original: rang gi lha dang bla ma'i lung la yid ches pa'i rnal 'byor du gyur phyin chad du 'di klog gam rtse gcig pas sems kyang rung ste /
analyzed: rang gi lha dang bla ma'i lung la yid ches pa'i rnal 'byor du gyur phyin chad du 'di klog gam rtse gcig pas sems kyang rung ste /
translated: from the time of becoming a yogin who has confidence in the transmission of his deity and the guru, whether he reads this or meditates one-pointedly,

original: rnal 'byor pa de yang rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa de yang rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur te /
translated: that yogin becomes a vajra holder,

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyu la zhugs pas de kun gyi de bzhin nyid du shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyu la zhugs pas de kun gyi de bzhin nyid du shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he has entered the cause of a vajra holder, and knows all things as they are.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags ni sa bon no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags ni sa bon no //
translated: The mantra of all the transcendent lords is the seed.

original: dam tshig ni nye bar sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig ni nye bar sgrub pa'o //
translated: The pledge is the approximation.

original: de kho na nyid ni rdo rje gsum mo //
analyzed: de kho na nyid ni rdo rje gsum mo //
translated: Reality is the three vajras.

original: rdo rje rig pa'i skyes bu mchog ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: rdo rje rig pa'i skyes bu mchog ni bshad zin to //
translated: The supreme person of vajra knowledge has been explained.

original: de grub par byed pa'i gzhung gi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o //
analyzed: de grub par byed pa'i gzhung gi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o //
translated: This is the eleventh chapter on the accomplishment of that.

original: le'u bcu gcig pa'i 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: le'u bcu gcig pa'i 'grel pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary on the eleventh chapter.

original: // / da ni de nas zhes pa la sogs pas le'u bcu gnyis pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: // / da ni de nas zhes pa la sogs pas le'u bcu gnyis pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, from “Then” and so forth, the twelfth chapter is begun.

original: ye shes kyi mthus lam log pa yang dag pa'i thabs kyi lam du 'dzud pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi mthus lam log pa yang dag pa'i thabs kyi lam du 'dzud pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
translated: The teacher is so called because by the power of wisdom, one is led to the path of the method of the correct path, even if one is on a wrong path.

original: lha thams cad kyi snang ba'i rkyen du gyur pas na skyed pa'o //
analyzed: lha thams cad kyi snang ba'i rkyen du gyur pas na skyed pa'o //
translated: It is a producer because it is the condition for the appearance of all deities.

original: sems can gyi rgyud la yongs su dag pa'i sku skyed par byed pas na ye shes mchog tu bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: sems can gyi rgyud la yongs su dag pa'i sku skyed par byed pas na ye shes mchog tu bsgrub pa'o //
translated: It is the supreme accomplishment of wisdom because it produces the completely pure body in the continuum of sentient beings.

original: rdo rje gsum gyi ngo bo las mi 'da' zhing skyon med pas na dam tshig yang dag pa rdo rje gsum mo //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum gyi ngo bo las mi 'da' zhing skyon med pas na dam tshig yang dag pa rdo rje gsum mo //
translated: It is the perfect three vajras of commitment because it does not pass beyond the nature of the three vajras and is faultless.

original: des rdo rje gsung gi le'u bcu gnyis pa bka' stsal zhes bya'o //
analyzed: des rdo rje gsung gi le'u bcu gnyis pa bka' stsal zhes bya'o //
translated: It is said that by that, the twelfth vajra-speech chapter was spoken.

original: chos thams cad kyang don dam pa'i bden pas nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i phyir nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa mnyam par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyang don dam pa'i bden pas nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i phyir nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa mnyam par 'gyur ro //
translated: All phenomena are also the same, equal to space, because of the ultimate truth being like space.

original: de yang brtag pa thams cad bdag dang bral bas na rnam par mi rtog ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: de yang brtag pa thams cad bdag dang bral bas na rnam par mi rtog ngo bo nyid do //
translated: Moreover, since all investigations are free from self, it is the very nature of non-conceptuality.

original: de nyid ni chos rnams kyi rang bzhin dag pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni chos rnams kyi rang bzhin dag pa'o //
translated: That itself is the purity of the nature of phenomena.

original: las zhes pa ni lnga pa'o //
analyzed: las zhes pa ni lnga pa'o //
translated: Action is the fifth.

original: da las / rol @52a * //
analyzed: da las / rol @52a * //
translated: From action,

original: mo 'di dag rab tu bsgom //
analyzed: mo 'di dag rab tu bsgom //
translated: one should cultivate these enjoyments.

original: zhes te kun rdzob tu gar mkhan ltar dngos grub kyi thabs kyi cho ga 'di dag rab tu bsgom mo zhes don dam pa'i bden pa la gnas nas bya bar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes te kun rdzob tu gar mkhan ltar dngos grub kyi thabs kyi cho ga 'di dag rab tu bsgom mo zhes don dam pa'i bden pa la gnas nas bya bar bstan pa'o //
translated: Thus, one should cultivate these ritual methods for the means of attainment, like an actor in the relative, abiding in ultimate truth.🔽The place is stated by

original: gnas gsungs pa dgon pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gnas gsungs pa dgon pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: great forest, and so on.

original: dpag tshad bco lnga'i tshad dang ldan pa'i skye bo spangs pa ni dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs so //
analyzed: dpag tshad bco lnga'i tshad dang ldan pa'i skye bo spangs pa ni dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs so //
translated: A place in a great forest is a place abandoned by people, with a size of fifteen yojanas.

original: de nyid dam gzhan yang rung ste bza' shing dang 'bab chu la sogs pas yid dga' ba'i sa phyogs ni /
analyzed: de nyid dam gzhan yang rung ste bza' shing dang 'bab chu la sogs pas yid dga' ba'i sa phyogs ni /
translated: That itself or another, a place pleasing to the mind with fruit trees, waterfalls, and so on,

original: me tog 'bras bu sogs kyis brgyan //
analyzed: me tog 'bras bu sogs kyis brgyan //
translated: is adorned with flowers, fruits, and so on.

original: zhes so // de skye bo'i tshogs spangs pa'i phyir ri bo dben pa'o //
analyzed: zhes so // de skye bo'i tshogs spangs pa'i phyir ri bo dben pa'o //
translated: Since it is abandoned by crowds of people, it is a solitary mountain.

original: dngos grub thams cad bsdus pas 'grub //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad bsdus pas 'grub //
translated: Since all powers are included, one is successful.

original: ces pa ni re rer yang dngos grub thams cad 'grub tu rung bas de skad do //
analyzed: ces pa ni re rer yang dngos grub thams cad 'grub tu rung bas de skad do //
translated: This is said because each one is suitable for the accomplishment of all powers.

original: don du na sems rnam par dag pa las ye shes 'byung ba'i phyir rang gi gnas pa thams cad la de skad do //
analyzed: don du na sems rnam par dag pa las ye shes 'byung ba'i phyir rang gi gnas pa thams cad la de skad do //
translated: In fact, since pristine awareness arises from the purification of mind, this is said for all one's states.

original: mi snang ba'i bsgrub pa la 'jam dpal mam gyis sgrub pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: mi snang ba'i bsgrub pa la 'jam dpal mam gyis sgrub pa gsungs pa /
translated: For the practice of invisibility, the Mañjuśrī-mām practice is taught.

original: mam zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mam zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Mām and so forth.

original: lus dang ngag sems rdo rje la //🔽zhes pa ni rang gi lus la sogs pa yi ge mam las gong ma ltar dbyer mi phyed pa'i rdo rje 'jam dpal cho ga brgyad kyis rnam par bsgoms te /
analyzed: lus dang ngag sems rdo rje la // zhes pa ni rang gi lus la sogs pa yi ge mam las gong ma ltar dbyer mi phyed pa'i rdo rje 'jam dpal cho ga brgyad kyis rnam par bsgoms te /
translated: In body, speech, and mind vajra,🔽means that one's body and so forth are the indivisible vajra Mañjuśrī from the syllable mām, as above.

original: gong ma ltar gnas bzhi'i lha ma gtogs pa lus kun la mam gyis gtams te /
analyzed: gong ma ltar gnas bzhi'i lha ma gtogs pa lus kun la mam gyis gtams te /
translated: One visualizes him with the eight rites, as above, filling the whole body with mām, except for the deities in the four places.

original: nam mkha'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin bzhin du dpag par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin bzhin du dpag par bya'o //
translated: One should measure it as in the Ākāśagarbha meditative absorption.

original: lus dang ngag sems las spros pas //
analyzed: lus dang ngag sems las spros pas //
translated: Since it emanates from body, speech, and mind,

original: zhes pa ni yi ge gsum gyi bar du chud pa bzlas pas /
analyzed: zhes pa ni yi ge gsum gyi bar du chud pa bzlas pas /
translated: This is the recitation that is included in the three syllables.

original: rdo rje 'jam dpal 'dra bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rdo rje 'jam dpal 'dra bar 'gyur //
translated: One becomes like Vajra Manjusri.

original: zhes phan yon gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes phan yon gsungs so //
translated: This is the statement of the benefit.

original: rdo rje 'bar ba ni 'od zer 'bar ba'i 'jam dpal de'i 'od dag gis zhes so //
analyzed: rdo rje 'bar ba ni 'od zer 'bar ba'i 'jam dpal de'i 'od dag gis zhes so //
translated: The blazing vajra is the blazing light of Manjusri. By his light,

original: ji lta bu'i 'od ce na /
analyzed: ji lta bu'i 'od ce na /
translated: What kind of light?

original: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi //
analyzed: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi //
translated: Adorned with all ornaments,

original: zhes te gdu bu phra can dang / dpung rgyan dang / nu phur dang / zur phud la sogs pas brgyan nas lo bcu drug pa'i gzugs su grub pa'i bdag nyid kyis phyogs de tsam snang bar byed ces so //
analyzed: zhes te gdu bu phra can dang / dpung rgyan dang / nu phur dang / zur phud la sogs pas brgyan nas lo bcu drug pa'i gzugs su grub pa'i bdag nyid kyis phyogs de tsam snang bar byed ces so //
translated: adorned with thin bracelets, armlets, necklaces, earrings, etc., having the nature of a sixteen-year-old, he illuminates that much of the directions.

original: snang bar byed kyang ye shes kyi sku'i rang bzhin pas na so so'i yul ma yin te /
analyzed: snang bar byed kyang ye shes kyi sku'i rang bzhin pas na so so'i yul ma yin te /
translated: Although he illuminates, he is not the object of each one, because he is the nature of the body of wisdom.

original: de lta bas na tshangs pa la sogs pas kyang mthong mi nus na gzhan gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes so //
analyzed: de lta bas na tshangs pa la sogs pas kyang mthong mi nus na gzhan gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes so //
translated: Therefore, if Brahma, etc. cannot see him, what need is there to speak of others?

original: rdo rje 'jam dpal mchog ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'jam dpal mchog ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje'o //
translated: The supreme vajra Manjusri is Manjusrivajra.

original: mi 'da' bas na @52b dam tshig go //
analyzed: mi 'da' bas na @52b dam tshig go //
translated: The commitment is that he does not transgress.

original: des mthong ba mi nus pa'i stobs ster ba'i phyir mi snang ba'i rgyan zhes bya'o //
analyzed: des mthong ba mi nus pa'i stobs ster ba'i phyir mi snang ba'i rgyan zhes bya'o //
translated: Since it gives the power of invisibility, it is called the ornament of invisibility.

original: rdzas kyi sgo nas mi snang ba sgrub pa la ril bu'i dngos grub gsungs pa /🔽rdo rje mi phyed ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdzas kyi sgo nas mi snang ba sgrub pa la ril bu'i dngos grub gsungs pa / rdo rje mi phyed ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: For the accomplishment of invisibility by means of substances, the power of the pill is taught.

original: rdo rje mi phyed gsum las byung //
analyzed: rdo rje mi phyed gsum las byung //
translated: The vajra is born from the three vajras,

original: zhes pa ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa gsum las byung ba'i phyir ril bu'i dkris ma /
analyzed: zhes pa ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa gsum las byung ba'i phyir ril bu'i dkris ma /
translated: and so forth. Since it is born from the three vajras, the body vajra and so forth, the pill is made.

original: lcags gsum las byung ldan byas te //
analyzed: lcags gsum las byung ldan byas te //
translated: Made from the three metals,

original: zhes te gser dngul zangs gsum dang ldan par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes te gser dngul zangs gsum dang ldan par bya'o //
translated: it is made from the three metals, gold, silver, and copper.

original: des dkri ba'i rdzas ni bshad gci dam tshig lnga rnams ni /
analyzed: des dkri ba'i rdzas ni bshad gci dam tshig lnga rnams ni /
translated: The substance for the wrapping is feces and urine, the five nectars,

original: zhes te bdud rtsi lnga bsdus pa 'am so so ste le'u bco lnga par gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes te bdud rtsi lnga bsdus pa 'am so so ste le'u bco lnga par gsungs pa'o //
translated: and the five pledges, which are either the five nectars or individual, as taught in chapter 15.

original: khar bcug nas bsgom par bya zhes pa ni /
analyzed: khar bcug nas bsgom par bya zhes pa ni /
translated: Having placed it in the mouth, meditate.

original: bsgom pa'i dus su khar bcug ste 'og nas 'byung ba ltar bya'o //
analyzed: bsgom pa'i dus su khar bcug ste 'og nas 'byung ba ltar bya'o //
translated: At the time of meditation, place it in the mouth and do as it is explained below.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs //
translated: The body, speech, and mind of the buddhas

original: zhes pa ni bde bar gshegs pa ji snyed pa thams cad de'i 'od zer stug pos bkug nas de dang mi phyed par bsgoms na ji skad gsungs pa'i yon tan du 'gyur ro //
