analyzed: zhes pa ni bde bar gshegs pa ji snyed pa thams cad de'i 'od zer stug pos bkug nas de dang mi phyed par bsgoms na ji skad gsungs pa'i yon tan du 'gyur ro //
translated: This is to say, all the Sugatas are summoned by the thick light rays of that [wheel], and when meditated on as inseparable from it, the qualities as stated will come about.

original: 'dir ma gsungs pa ni 'og tu shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir ma gsungs pa ni 'og tu shes par bya'o //
translated: What is not stated here should be understood from below.

original: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs 'dzin phyag mtshan gyi bsgrub pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs 'dzin phyag mtshan gyi bsgrub pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the accomplishment of the insignia of the family of the Tathāgatas is stated:

original: 'khor lo zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The wheel, etc.

original: 'khor lo 'od 'phro mdangs mchog can //
analyzed: 'khor lo 'od 'phro mdangs mchog can //
translated: The wheel, radiant with light, of supreme splendor,

original: zhes pa ni gser ram dngul lam /
analyzed: zhes pa ni gser ram dngul lam /
translated: is made of gold or silver,🔽or of wood or clay, etc., as a substance.

original: shing ngam sa la sogs pa las dngos por byas te de nyid /
analyzed: shing ngam sa la sogs pa las dngos por byas te de nyid /
translated: That itself,

original: rang gi sngags kyis rab bsgoms na //
analyzed: rang gi sngags kyis rab bsgoms na //
translated: meditated on with one’s mantra,

original: zhes te yi ge aom gyi mdangs can du bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes te yi ge aom gyi mdangs can du bskyed par bya'o //
translated: is generated as having the splendor of the syllable oṃ.

original: 'khor lo yang sangs rgyas thams cad sku'i rigs rnams bzhugs pa'i gnas su bsgoms na rnam par snang mdzad dang 'dra par 'gyur zhes so //
analyzed: 'khor lo yang sangs rgyas thams cad sku'i rigs rnams bzhugs pa'i gnas su bsgoms na rnam par snang mdzad dang 'dra par 'gyur zhes so //
translated: And the wheel, when meditated on as the abode of all the Buddhas of the family of Body, will become like Vairocana.

original: 'dra ba de la yon tan ci mnga' zhe na /
analyzed: 'dra ba de la yon tan ci mnga' zhe na /
translated: What is the quality of that likeness?

original: ri rab ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ri rab ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The great mountain and so forth.

original: de yang ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi tshad bar du phra ba'i rdul du bsres pa snyed kyi rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra ba kun zhes te /
analyzed: de yang ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi tshad bar du phra ba'i rdul du bsres pa snyed kyi rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra ba kun zhes te /
translated: Moreover, all refers to the Vajra-holders who are equal to the number of particles in thirty-six great mountains.

original: de dang 'dra ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad de'i rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur zhes te /
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad de'i rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur zhes te /
translated: All the Vidyadharas who are like that will follow him,

original: g-yog byed par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: g-yog byed par shes par bya'o //
translated: that is, they will serve him.

original: 'khor lo nyid mi 'da' bas na dam tshig go //
analyzed: 'khor lo nyid mi 'da' bas na dam tshig go //
translated: Since the wheel itself is not transgressed, it is a pledge.

original: phyi ma rnams la yang des 'gre bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyi ma rnams la yang des 'gre bar bya'o //
translated: This should be applied to the subsequent [pledges] as well.

original: 'di yang 'og nas rgyas par bstan to //🔽mi bskyod pa sgrub pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di yang 'og nas rgyas par bstan to // mi bskyod pa sgrub pa gsungs pa /
translated: This will be taught extensively below.

original: rdo rje chen po zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The accomplishment of Akshobhya is stated by the great vajra and so forth.

original: @53a * // sa gsum gyi bud med rnams mthong ba tsam gyis dbang du byed bas na bud med rnams /
analyzed: @53a * // sa gsum gyi bud med rnams mthong ba tsam gyis dbang du byed bas na bud med rnams /
translated: Since the women of the three worlds are brought under control merely by seeing [him], the women

original: yon tan can ni bdag gir 'gyur //
analyzed: yon tan can ni bdag gir 'gyur //
translated: become his, endowed with good qualities.

original: zhes 'dod pa'i dbang phyug tu ston pa'o //
analyzed: zhes 'dod pa'i dbang phyug tu ston pa'o //
translated: This shows him to be the lord of desire.

original: drag po'i ni lha chen po ste /
analyzed: drag po'i ni lha chen po ste /
translated: The fierce is the great god.

original: gang de gdung ba tsha byed dang // gzhan gyi sha tshil khrag za ba //
analyzed: gang de gdung ba tsha byed dang // gzhan gyi sha tshil khrag za ba //
translated: and which eats the flesh, fat, and blood of others,

original: gang de drag po zhes su bshad //
analyzed: gang de drag po zhes su bshad //
translated: that is explained as “fierce.”

original: ces so // de lta bus phyag byas pas khams gsum rdo rje chen po'o //
analyzed: ces so // de lta bus phyag byas pas khams gsum rdo rje chen po'o //
translated: Thus, by bowing in that way, the three realms are the great vajra.

original: rdo rje nyid brtan zhing mi 'da' bas na rdo rje'i dam tshig go //
analyzed: rdo rje nyid brtan zhing mi 'da' bas na rdo rje'i dam tshig go //
translated: Since the vajra itself is firm and does not pass beyond, it is the vajra commitment.

original: 'od dpag med kyi sgrub pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'od dpag med kyi sgrub pa gsungs pa /
translated: The accomplishment of Amitābha is taught:

original: padmo chen po zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: padmo chen po zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “The great lotus” and so on.

original: rdo rje dkyil 'khor ni mngon dga' la sogs par ro //
analyzed: rdo rje dkyil 'khor ni mngon dga' la sogs par ro //
translated: The vajra maṇḍala is Abhirati and so on.

original: der padmo'i rig pa ni dag pa'i bdag nyid de sangs rgyas la sogs pas 'jog par byed ces so //
analyzed: der padmo'i rig pa ni dag pa'i bdag nyid de sangs rgyas la sogs pas 'jog par byed ces so //
translated: There, the lotus awareness is the nature of purity, which is placed by the buddhas and so on.

original: snang ba mtha' yas dang 'dra ba 'grub pa'i phyir padmo mnyam pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: snang ba mtha' yas dang 'dra ba 'grub pa'i phyir padmo mnyam pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: Since it is accomplished as similar to Amitābha, it is called the “equality of the lotus.”

original: mjug bsdu ba ye shes lnga ldan zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mjug bsdu ba ye shes lnga ldan zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The summary is “endowed with the five gnoses” and so on.

original: de ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: de ni bshad zin to //
translated: That has already been explained.

original: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje gsum gyi rang bzhin yin pas na gsang ba gsum ste /
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje gsum gyi rang bzhin yin pas na gsang ba gsum ste /
translated: Since he is the nature of the three vajras of all buddhas in the ten directions, he is the three secrets.

original: de la rim gro byed pa'i nus pa thob pa'i phyir bsnyen bkur byed ces so //
analyzed: de la rim gro byed pa'i nus pa thob pa'i phyir bsnyen bkur byed ces so //
translated: Since he has attained the ability to serve them, he is to be worshipped.

original: don yod grub pa'i sgrub pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: don yod grub pa'i sgrub pa gsungs pa /
translated: The accomplishment of Amoghasiddhi is taught:

original: 'od zer lnga yi mdog 'dra ba //
analyzed: 'od zer lnga yi mdog 'dra ba //
translated: Having the color of the five light rays,

original: zhes pa ni ljang gu ni kha dog lnga bsdus pa las byung pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni ljang gu ni kha dog lnga bsdus pa las byung pa'o //
translated: Green is produced from the collection of the five colors.

original: mig yangs zhes pa ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la lta ba ste sgrub pa po'o //
analyzed: mig yangs zhes pa ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la lta ba ste sgrub pa po'o //
translated: Having wide eyes means that the practitioner sees the thatness of all phenomena.

original: khams gsum kun gyi zhes pa ni de na gnas pa thams cad kyis mchod pa'o //
analyzed: khams gsum kun gyi zhes pa ni de na gnas pa thams cad kyis mchod pa'o //
translated: All in the three realms means that he is worshipped by all who dwell there.

original: de 'og tu gtso bo tshangs pa la sogs pas phyag byed pa'o //
analyzed: de 'og tu gtso bo tshangs pa la sogs pas phyag byed pa'o //
translated: After that, the chief ones, Brahma and so on, pay homage.

original: gzhan gyi zil gyis mi non pa'i stobs mnga' bas na stong gsum na ni mchog tu dpa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi zil gyis mi non pa'i stobs mnga' bas na stong gsum na ni mchog tu dpa'o //
translated: Since he possesses the power that cannot be overwhelmed by others, he is the supreme hero in the trichiliocosm.

original: khyab 'jug la sogs pa lta bu ma yin pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: khyab 'jug la sogs pa lta bu ma yin pa'i phyir na /
translated: Since he is not like Vishnu and so on,

original: mi mchog gsang ba 'dzin par 'gyur //
analyzed: mi mchog gsang ba 'dzin par 'gyur //
translated: he becomes the secret holder of the supreme human.

original: zhes so // gzhan yang gang dang gang 'dod pa dang ci bsams pa dag /
analyzed: zhes so // gzhan yang gang dang gang 'dod pa dang ci bsams pa dag /
translated: Moreover, whatever is desired, whatever is thought,

original: sku gsung thugs nyid rdo rje ste de 'dzin pa ni sgrub pa po de'i'o //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs nyid rdo rje ste de 'dzin pa ni sgrub pa po de'i'o //
translated: is the vajra of body, speech, and mind, and the adept holds that.

original: de'i thugs las ci byung pa'i dngos grub ster bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de'i thugs las ci byung pa'i dngos grub ster bar sbyar ro //
translated: The adept is the one who grants the powers that arise from his mind.

original: 'og nas ston pa'i phyir na rin po che'i sgrub pa yang gsungs par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'og nas ston pa'i phyir na rin po che'i sgrub pa yang gsungs par shes par bya'o //
translated: Since it will be taught below, one should understand that the jewel practice is also taught.

original: da ni gong du gsungs pa'i ril bu'i sa bon dang / tshad dang lha bskyed pa @53b ma bshad pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni gong du gsungs pa'i ril bu'i sa bon dang / tshad dang lha bskyed pa @53b ma bshad pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the seed of the pill taught above, and the size and deity generation are taught.

original: aom zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: aom zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Om and so on.

original: aom zhes pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas gong du gsungs pa aom las bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: aom zhes pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas gong du gsungs pa aom las bskyed par bya'o //
translated: The yogin of Vairochana should generate it from the previously taught om.

original: de'i tshad kyang tsa na ka'i 'bru tshad tsam du bsams nas ni zhes so //
analyzed: de'i tshad kyang tsa na ka'i 'bru tshad tsam du bsams nas ni zhes so //
translated: And its size is the size of a mustard seed.

original: de'i dbus su gzhal yas khang la sogs pa'i rim pas bdag gi lha'i gzugs zhes te rtag pa'i 'khor lo bsams te rang gi khang bcug nas 'od zer spro ba la sogs pa gong ma ltar bsgoms nas 'bar ba la sogs pa nye ba'i mtshan ma mthong bas
analyzed: de'i dbus su gzhal yas khang la sogs pa'i rim pas bdag gi lha'i gzugs zhes te rtag pa'i 'khor lo bsams te rang gi khang bcug nas 'od zer spro ba la sogs pa gong ma ltar bsgoms nas 'bar ba la sogs pa nye ba'i mtshan ma mthong bas
translated: In the middle of that, having visualized the form of one's deity with the celestial mansion and so forth, one should meditate on the blazing and so forth, as before, having emanated light rays and so on, and having seen the signs of the near attainment and so on.🔽 One should abide in that yoga for a half month, and one will become like the vajra body.

original: sbyar ba de la lhag par gnas pa zla ba phyed na rdo rje sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur zhes te de'i gzi brjid gzhan gyis blta bar dka' bas na /
analyzed: sbyar ba de la lhag par gnas pa zla ba phyed na rdo rje sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur zhes te de'i gzi brjid gzhan gyis blta bar dka' bas na /
translated: Since the brilliance of that is difficult for others to behold,

original: nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra zhing //
analyzed: nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra zhing //
translated: it is like the light of the rising sun.

original: zhes so // mdog la sogs pa dag cing gsal bas na /
analyzed: zhes so // mdog la sogs pa dag cing gsal bas na /
translated: Since the color and so on are pure and clear,

original: 'dzam bu na de'i gser mdog 'dra //
analyzed: 'dzam bu na de'i gser mdog 'dra //
translated: it is like the color of gold from the Jambū River.

original: zhes so // phyag rgya chen po 'grub pa'i mtshan ma bas na /
analyzed: zhes so // phyag rgya chen po 'grub pa'i mtshan ma bas na /
translated: Since it is the sign of the accomplishment of the great seal,

original: byang chub ye shes thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: byang chub ye shes thob par 'gyur //
translated: one will attain the gnosis of enlightenment.

original: zhes bya'o // de ltar snang ba mtha' yas dang mi bskyod pa'i yang de'i bsgre ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // de ltar snang ba mtha' yas dang mi bskyod pa'i yang de'i bsgre ba gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, the same is said for Amitābha and Akṣobhya.

original: a'a: ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: a'a: ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Aḥ and so on.

original: rdo rje gsum gtso bor ston pa'i phyir phal cher dus gsum smos so //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum gtso bor ston pa'i phyir phal cher dus gsum smos so //
translated: The three times are mentioned for the most part in order to show the three vajras.

original: da ni gong du gsungs pa'i 'khor lo de lhan cig pa'i rnal 'byor pas dang po'i gnas de lag tu bsgoms nas ji skad du gsungs pa thob par 'gyur ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni gong du gsungs pa'i 'khor lo de lhan cig pa'i rnal 'byor pas dang po'i gnas de lag tu bsgoms nas ji skad du gsungs pa thob par 'gyur ba gsungs pa /
translated: Now, having meditated on that wheel which was previously taught in the first place in the hand of the yogi, it is said that one attains what was taught.

original: mkha' dbyings zhes pa la sogs pa'o //🔽mkha' dbyings gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas par zhes pa ni /
analyzed: mkha' dbyings zhes pa la sogs pa'o // mkha' dbyings gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas par zhes pa ni /
translated: [The Bhagavān] declares space, etc.🔽Abiding in the maṇḍala of the clear sky means

original: bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i dbus su chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi nang du gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus kyi zla ba'i gdan la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i dbus su chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi nang du gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus kyi zla ba'i gdan la gnas pa'o //
translated: abiding on the moon seat in the center of the celestial mansion located inside the source of phenomena in the center of the protection wheel.

original: rnam par snang mdzad rab tu bsgom //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad rab tu bsgom //
translated: One should meditate on Vairocana.

original: zhes pa ni dang po'i skyes bu las rnam par snang mdzad bskyed pa'i cho ga bzhi rdzogs pas byin gyis brlabs te zhes so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni dang po'i skyes bu las rnam par snang mdzad bskyed pa'i cho ga bzhi rdzogs pas byin gyis brlabs te zhes so //
translated: This means that one should bless the complete four-seal generation of Vairocana from the first being.

original: lag tu 'khor lo rab bsgoms nas //
analyzed: lag tu 'khor lo rab bsgoms nas //
translated: Having meditated on the wheel in the hand,

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: this is said.

original: de'i g-yas kyi bar mar gong du smos pa'i 'khor lo bzung zhing bsgoms pas /
analyzed: de'i g-yas kyi bar mar gong du smos pa'i 'khor lo bzung zhing bsgoms pas /
translated: On the right side, in the middle, one should hold the wheel as previously mentioned, and meditate.

original: nyi ma bdun la sogs par du ba 'thul ba dang / gsal ba dang / 'bar ba dang / nam mkha' las 'phar bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyi ma bdun la sogs par du ba 'thul ba dang / gsal ba dang / 'bar ba dang / nam mkha' las 'phar bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Through that, one will emit smoke, shine, blaze, and fly up into the sky for seven days, and so on.

original: lag te 'bar ba'i steng du sum bsams pas 'bab par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lag te 'bar ba'i steng du sum bsams pas 'bab par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one thinks of the water above the blazing wheel, it will fall.

original: de nas de'i @54a * //
analyzed: de nas de'i @54a * //
translated: Then,

original: sbyor ba la lhag par gnas pas ji skad gsungs pa'i yon tan du 'gyur ro zhes so //
analyzed: sbyor ba la lhag par gnas pas ji skad gsungs pa'i yon tan du 'gyur ro zhes so //
translated: through abiding in the yoga, one will attain the qualities as stated.

original: de'i sbyor ba yang /
analyzed: de'i sbyor ba yang /
translated: The yoga of that is

original: 'khor lo chen po'i rigs bsgoms te //
analyzed: 'khor lo chen po'i rigs bsgoms te //
translated: meditating on the family of the great wheel.

original: zhes te de'i lte bar de'i rigs kyi lha rnams bsgoms pas 'od zer spro ba la sogs pa gong ma ltar dpag par bya'o ;
analyzed: zhes te de'i lte bar de'i rigs kyi lha rnams bsgoms pas 'od zer spro ba la sogs pa gong ma ltar dpag par bya'o ;
translated: One should meditate on the deities of that family in its center. The emission of light rays and so on should be imagined as before.

original: / bdag nyid sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur sbyor zhing /
analyzed: / bdag nyid sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur sbyor zhing /
translated: One should apply oneself to the body of Vairocana Buddha.

original: de lta bu 'dra ba'i rdo rje mchog 'di sgrub pa ni ye shes rdo rje zhes pa ni gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas pa dag gis bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: de lta bu 'dra ba'i rdo rje mchog 'di sgrub pa ni ye shes rdo rje zhes pa ni gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas pa dag gis bya'o zhes so //
translated: This supreme vajra like that should be accomplished by those abiding in the yoga of nonduality, who are called vajra wisdom.

original: phyi ma rnams la yang de kho na bzhin du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: phyi ma rnams la yang de kho na bzhin du shes par bya'o //
translated: This should be understood in the same way for the subsequent [vajras].

original: mi bskyod pa'i rnal 'byor rdo rje gzung ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa'i rnal 'byor rdo rje gzung ba gsungs pa /
translated: The vajra to be held by one in the yoga of Akshobhya is stated:

original: mkha' dbyings rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mkha' dbyings rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The vajra of the realm of space, etc.

original: rin chen dbang phyug gi rnal 'byor pas rin po che gzung ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: rin chen dbang phyug gi rnal 'byor pas rin po che gzung ba gsungs pa /
translated: The jewel to be held by one in the yoga of Ratnasambhava is stated:

original: mkha' dbyings rin chen zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mkha' dbyings rin chen zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The jewel of the realm of space, etc.

original: 'od dpag med kyi rnal 'byor pas padmo gzung ba gsungs pa ;
analyzed: 'od dpag med kyi rnal 'byor pas padmo gzung ba gsungs pa ;
translated: The lotus to be held by one in the yoga of Amitabha is stated:

original: mkha' dbyings chos zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mkha' dbyings chos zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The dharma of the realm of space, etc.

original: don yod grub pa'i rnal 'byor pas ral gri gzung ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: don yod grub pa'i rnal 'byor pas ral gri gzung ba gsungs pa /
translated: The sword to be held by one in the yoga of Amoghasiddhi is stated:

original: mkha' dbyings dam tshig ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mkha' dbyings dam tshig ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The commitment of the realm of space, etc.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig 'dzin bshad zin to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig 'dzin bshad zin to //
translated: The knowledge holders of the tathagatas have been explained.

original: da ni rang rang gi phyag mtshan gyi sgo nas khro bo'i rig 'dzin sgrub pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni rang rang gi phyag mtshan gyi sgo nas khro bo'i rig 'dzin sgrub pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the accomplishment of the wrathful knowledge-holders by way of their individual hand implements is taught.

original: tri sh'u la zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: tri sh'u la zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The trident and so forth.

original: tri sh'u la zhes pa ni mdung rtse gsum pa ste stobs po che'o //
analyzed: tri sh'u la zhes pa ni mdung rtse gsum pa ste stobs po che'o //
translated: The trident is the trident of Mahābala.

original: kyo ba dang zhes pa ni lcags kyo ste 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o //
analyzed: kyo ba dang zhes pa ni lcags kyo ste 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o //
translated: The goad is the iron hook of Kāmarāja.

original: sogs zhes pa ni dbyug pa sngon po'i dbyug pa dang / mi g-yo mgon po'i ral gri dang / gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i 'khor lo dang / gnod mdzes kyi rdo rje dang / gshin rje gshed kyi tho ba dang / shes rab mthar byed kyi rdo rje dbyug pa dang /
analyzed: sogs zhes pa ni dbyug pa sngon po'i dbyug pa dang / mi g-yo mgon po'i ral gri dang / gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i 'khor lo dang / gnod mdzes kyi rdo rje dang / gshin rje gshed kyi tho ba dang / shes rab mthar byed kyi rdo rje dbyug pa dang /
translated: The etc. includes the club of Nīladaṇḍa, the sword of Acalanātha, the wheel of Uṣṇīṣa Cakravartin, the vajra of Sumbha, the hammer of Yamāntaka, the vajra club of Prajñāntaka,

original: padma mthar byed kyi padma dang / bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: padma mthar byed kyi padma dang / bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rdo rje'o //
translated: the lotus of Padmāntaka, and the vajra of Amṛtakuṇḍali.

original: rdo rje khyad par gyis sgrubs na //
analyzed: rdo rje khyad par gyis sgrubs na //
translated: If one accomplishes with the vajra,

original: zhes pa ni bdag po'i rim pas sgrub pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni bdag po'i rim pas sgrub pa ste /
translated: it is taught that one will become the lord of the vajra family.🔽

original: rang dang 'dra ba'i tshogs bkug cing bcug nas brtan par bya ba ni khyad par ro //
analyzed: rang dang 'dra ba'i tshogs bkug cing bcug nas brtan par bya ba ni khyad par ro //
translated: The special feature is that one summons and causes to enter the assembly that is like oneself, and stabilizes it.

original: de bas na sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa'i zhes te /
analyzed: de bas na sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa'i zhes te /
translated: Therefore, it is the “accomplishment of body, speech, and mind.”

original: rnam par snang mdzad dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / mi bskyod pa'i bsam gtan des @54b 'grub pa'o zhes so //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / mi bskyod pa'i bsam gtan des @54b 'grub pa'o zhes so //
translated: By that meditative stabilization of Vairocana, Amitābha, and Akṣobhya, one accomplishes them.

original: 'khor lo dang ldan pa ni rang gi ngo bo kho nas sgrub pa yang mi 'gal lo //
analyzed: 'khor lo dang ldan pa ni rang gi ngo bo kho nas sgrub pa yang mi 'gal lo //
translated: And it is not contradictory that one accomplishes them by their very nature, since they are endowed with the wheel.

original: dam tshig chen po sngon du 'gro bas de rnams 'byung ba'i phyir dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub rdo rje ston pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig chen po sngon du 'gro bas de rnams 'byung ba'i phyir dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub rdo rje ston pa'o //
translated: The Great Seal is taught as the “accomplishment of the great pledge,” since they arise by the precedence of the great pledge.

original: da ni las kyi khyad par las dgug pa'i sbyor ba'i gnas gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni las kyi khyad par las dgug pa'i sbyor ba'i gnas gsungs pa /
translated: Now, from among the special activities, he teaches the procedure for summoning:

original: lam gyi zhes pha la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lam gyi zhes pha la sogs pa'o //
translated: “At a crossroads, etc.”

original: lam gyi bzhi mdor zhes pa ni mi mang po 'du ba'o //
analyzed: lam gyi bzhi mdor zhes pa ni mi mang po 'du ba'o //
translated: “At a crossroads” is where many people gather.

original: shing gcig drung ni 'jig rten gyi mkha' 'gro ma 'du ba'o //
analyzed: shing gcig drung ni 'jig rten gyi mkha' 'gro ma 'du ba'o //
translated: “At the foot of a tree” is where worldly ḍākinīs gather.

original: mtshan ma gcig pa ni 'byung po rnams 'du ba'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma gcig pa ni 'byung po rnams 'du ba'o //
translated: “At a single sign” is where bhūtas gather.

original: zhi gnas ni 'phags pa rnams 'du ba'o //
analyzed: zhi gnas ni 'phags pa rnams 'du ba'o //
translated: Tranquility is the gathering of the Noble Ones.🔽The gathering of all is the auspicious place for summoning.

original: thams cad rnam par 'du ba ni 'gugs pa la shis pa'i gnas te gzhan las kyang /
analyzed: thams cad rnam par 'du ba ni 'gugs pa la shis pa'i gnas te gzhan las kyang /
translated: Also, in another text:

original: chang 'tshong smang 'tshong khyim la sogs //
analyzed: chang 'tshong smang 'tshong khyim la sogs //
translated: The tavern, the brothel, and the house,

original: dgug pa bsgrub pa khyad par shes //
analyzed: dgug pa bsgrub pa khyad par shes //
translated: are known as the special places for summoning.

original: zhes blta'o // rdo rje dgug pa'i zhes pa ni rdo rje gsum gyis dgug pa zhes so //
analyzed: zhes blta'o // rdo rje dgug pa'i zhes pa ni rdo rje gsum gyis dgug pa zhes so //
translated: The vajra summoning is the summoning by the three vajras.

original: khyad par gyis zhes pa ni rang rang gi lha'i rim pa sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu bsgrub ces so //
analyzed: khyad par gyis zhes pa ni rang rang gi lha'i rim pa sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu bsgrub ces so //
translated: The special is the special practice of the practitioner of the stage of one's own deity.

original: ji lta bur sgrub ce na /
analyzed: ji lta bur sgrub ce na /
translated: How does one practice?

original: 'gugs pa thams cad kyi spyi'i cho gas gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'gugs pa thams cad kyi spyi'i cho gas gsungs pa /
translated: It is said that the general rite for all summonings is

original: sbyor gsum zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sbyor gsum zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: the three-part union, etc.

original: de la rang gi lus la sogs pa'i lha'i rnam pa lta bu 'khor lo 'am gcig par sgom pa ni sbyor gsum rdo rje can rnams so //🔽de la / longs spyod gsum pa'i rnam par mtshan //
analyzed: de la rang gi lus la sogs pa'i lha'i rnam pa lta bu 'khor lo 'am gcig par sgom pa ni sbyor gsum rdo rje can rnams so // de la / longs spyod gsum pa'i rnam par mtshan //
translated: There, the three-part vajra-holders are those who meditate on the wheel or the single form of the deity, such as one's own body, etc.

original: zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba nas /
translated: There, it says:🔽The sign of the three-part enjoyment,🔽 up to

original: sbyor gsum sngags kyi skyes bur bams //
analyzed: sbyor gsum sngags kyi skyes bur bams //
translated: the three-part person of mantra.

original: zhes te / sku la sogs pa rig ma dang ldan zhes aom la sogs pa las bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes te / sku la sogs pa rig ma dang ldan zhes aom la sogs pa las bskyed pa'o //
translated: Thus, the body and so forth are endowed with the knowledge consorts, generated from the seed syllables such as OṂ and so forth.

original: de rnams kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And since they are all the Buddhas,

original: sangs rgyas ye shes blo ldan gyi //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ye shes blo ldan gyi //
translated: the Buddhas’ wisdom is endowed with the knowledge consorts.

original: zhes so // de'i sku gsung thugs las 'phros pa'i lcags kyu ni /
analyzed: zhes so // de'i sku gsung thugs las 'phros pa'i lcags kyu ni /
translated: The hooks that emanate from their body, speech, and mind

original: sku gsung thugs kyi kyo ba zhes te des mtshon pa'i lha rnams 'gugs pa'o //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi kyo ba zhes te des mtshon pa'i lha rnams 'gugs pa'o //
translated: are the hooks of body, speech, and mind. The deities that are indicated by those hooks are summoned.

original: rlung gi dkyil 'khor mchog gnas pa //🔽zhes pa ni /
analyzed: rlung gi dkyil 'khor mchog gnas pa // zhes pa ni /
translated: The supreme wind maṇḍala is the abode.

original: dgug bya yang ming gi yi ge dang pos bskyed la /
analyzed: dgug bya yang ming gi yi ge dang pos bskyed la /
translated: The one to be summoned is also generated by the first syllable of the name.

original: yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gnas par byas nas /
analyzed: yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gnas par byas nas /
translated: Having been placed upon the wind maṇḍala arisen from YAṂ,

original: ji snyed sangs rgyas rnams kyang dgug / ces so //
analyzed: ji snyed sangs rgyas rnams kyang dgug / ces so //
translated: all the Buddhas are summoned.

original: dam tshig las byung phyogs bcu pa //
analyzed: dam tshig las byung phyogs bcu pa //
translated: The pledge beings are the ten directions.

original: zhes pa ni sems can dang sems can ma yin pa thams cad kyang 'gugs pa las mi 'da' bas na /
analyzed: zhes pa ni sems can dang sems can ma yin pa thams cad kyang 'gugs pa las mi 'da' bas na /
translated: Since all sentient beings and non-sentient beings are summoned without transgressing the pledge,

original: rdo rje @55a * //
analyzed: rdo rje @55a * //
translated: the vajra hook is the hook of the mind.

original: gsum gyis dgug cing longs spyad par bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: gsum gyis dgug cing longs spyad par bya'o zhes so //
translated: One should summon the three and enjoy them.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings na gnas pa thams cad mi 'da' bas na nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dam tshig go //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings na gnas pa thams cad mi 'da' bas na nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dam tshig go //
translated: Since all those abiding in the realm of space are not transgressed, it is the commitment of the realm of space.

original: rdo rje gsum gyi lcags kyus 'gugs pas na rdo rje 'gugs pa'i cho ga'o zhes so //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum gyi lcags kyus 'gugs pas na rdo rje 'gugs pa'i cho ga'o zhes so //
translated: Since one summons with the hook of the three vajras, it is the ritual of summoning with the vajra.

original: da ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang ldan par bsam gtan gyi dgug pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang ldan par bsam gtan gyi dgug pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, having contemplated the wheel of the mandala of Vairocana, the summoning of meditative concentration is stated:

original: rnam par snang mdzad ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Vairocana, etc.

original: rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo mchog / ces pa ni srung ba'i 'khor lo la sogs pas ji srid rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'khor lo bskyed pa'i cho ga nyi shu rdzogs par byas pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo mchog / ces pa ni srung ba'i 'khor lo la sogs pas ji srid rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'khor lo bskyed pa'i cho ga nyi shu rdzogs par byas pa'o //
translated: Vairocana, the supreme wheel, etc., is the completion of the ritual of generating the wheel of Vairocana up to the protection wheel, etc.

original: lcags kyu 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi phyag mtshan gzhan gyis kyang dgug tu rung bas na /
analyzed: lcags kyu 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi phyag mtshan gzhan gyis kyang dgug tu rung bas na /
translated: Not only with the hook, but also with other hand implements, it is suitable to summon, so it is said:

original: rdo rje padma dag la sogs //
analyzed: rdo rje padma dag la sogs //
translated: Vajra, lotus, etc.

original: zhes bya'o // rgyal ba dag gis zhes pa ni des mtshan pa'i lha'i sku'o //
analyzed: zhes bya'o // rgyal ba dag gis zhes pa ni des mtshan pa'i lha'i sku'o //
translated: The victors’ is the divine body characterized by that.

original: de'i gnas ni 'phro ba'i gzhi ste rdo rje gsum bsams nas zhes so //
analyzed: de'i gnas ni 'phro ba'i gzhi ste rdo rje gsum bsams nas zhes so //
translated: Its place is the basis of emanation, having contemplated the three vajras.

original: de nas dam tshig thams cad dgug pa'i mchog ni kyo bas bya zhes te /
analyzed: de nas dam tshig thams cad dgug pa'i mchog ni kyo bas bya zhes te /
translated: Then, the supreme summoning of all pledges is with the hook.

original: 'gugs par nus pa'i phyir gzhan yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'gugs par nus pa'i phyir gzhan yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: It is also called that because it is able to summon.

original: sa 'og la sogs pa na gnas pa rnams kyang mi 'da' bas na khams gsum gyi dam tshig 'gugs pa'o //
analyzed: sa 'og la sogs pa na gnas pa rnams kyang mi 'da' bas na khams gsum gyi dam tshig 'gugs pa'o //
translated: Since it does not pass beyond the three realms, it is the summoning of the pledge of the three realms.

original: rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i //
analyzed: rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i //
translated: Endowed with all the supreme aspects.

original: zhes pa ni sku rdo rje de yang mtshan dang dpe byad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni sku rdo rje de yang mtshan dang dpe byad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'o //
translated: That body vajra is also adorned with the major and minor marks.

original: de lta bur sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur ni rab tu sbyar zhes chung ngu'i sgrub pa la gnas nas dgug go zhes bstan pa'i phyir /🔽lag tu sku gsung thugs rnams kyi //
analyzed: de lta bur sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur ni rab tu sbyar zhes chung ngu'i sgrub pa la gnas nas dgug go zhes bstan pa'i phyir / lag tu sku gsung thugs rnams kyi //
translated: In order to demonstrate that, having remained in the practice of the small, one summons, thusly applied to the body of Buddha Vairochana.

original: kyo ba la sogs rab tu sbyar //
analyzed: kyo ba la sogs rab tu sbyar //
translated: In the hand, one should apply the hook and so forth of body, speech, and mind.

original: zhes lhan cig gi ting nge 'dzin gyi bya ba bstan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes lhan cig gi ting nge 'dzin gyi bya ba bstan pa'o //
translated: Thus he has taught the activity of the simultaneous meditative concentration.

original: 'di dag lta bu'i sbyor ba ni rnam pa gnyis so//
analyzed: 'di dag lta bu'i sbyor ba ni rnam pa gnyis so//
translated: This yoga is of two kinds.

original: las thams cad byed par 'gyur zhes pa ni /
analyzed: las thams cad byed par 'gyur zhes pa ni /
translated: “One will accomplish all actions”

original: sems can dang sems can ma yin pa kun gyis kyang dgos pa sgrub par byed do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: sems can dang sems can ma yin pa kun gyis kyang dgos pa sgrub par byed do zhes pa'o //
translated: means that one will accomplish the aims of all sentient beings and non-sentient beings.

original: da ni mthu chen po zas rnam par dag par byas nas longs spyod pa'i thabs bsdus te gsungs pa /🔽rnam pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: da ni mthu chen po zas rnam par dag par byas nas longs spyod pa'i thabs bsdus te gsungs pa / rnam pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Now, having purified the food of great power, he summarizes and teaches the method of enjoyment:

original: rdo rje sku ni rab bsgoms la //
analyzed: rdo rje sku ni rab bsgoms la //
translated: “The vajra body, having meditated on the form,

original: zhes pa ni dbyer med pa'i sku ste rang gi lha bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni dbyer med pa'i sku ste rang gi lha bsgom pa'o //
translated: ” means the body of indivisibility, one’s deity meditation.

original: @55b rdo rje'i sbyor ba ni 'og nas 'byung bas lcer bsgoms na /
analyzed: @55b rdo rje'i sbyor ba ni 'og nas 'byung bas lcer bsgoms na /
translated: “The vajra union” is the meditation on the tongue as it will be described below.

original: lce nyid snang ba mtha' yas lta bu'i gsung thob pa'i phyir /
analyzed: lce nyid snang ba mtha' yas lta bu'i gsung thob pa'i phyir /
translated: Since the tongue itself is like Amitābha’s speech,

original: rdo rje gsung dang 'dra bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rdo rje gsung dang 'dra bar 'gyur //
translated: “one will become like vajra speech.”

original: zhes so // de yang gsang ba'i mchod pas mnyes par byas nas bstod pa'i de ma thag tu bya'o zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhes so // de yang gsang ba'i mchod pas mnyes par byas nas bstod pa'i de ma thag tu bya'o zhes gsungs pa /
translated: Moreover, having pleased the deities with the secret worship, one should perform the praise immediately after.

original: gsang gsum zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gsang gsum zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The three secrets, etc.

original: gsang gsum ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
analyzed: gsang gsum ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
translated: The three secrets are the Tathagatas.

original: de'i ngo bo las mi 'da' bas na dam tshig go //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo las mi 'da' bas na dam tshig go //
translated: Since one does not transgress the nature of those, that is the pledge.

original: de nyid mchod pa'i mchog ste lha mo bcu'o //
analyzed: de nyid mchod pa'i mchog ste lha mo bcu'o //
translated: That itself is the supreme worship, the ten goddesses.

original: gzhan dang thun mong ma yin pas na mchod pa gsang ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan dang thun mong ma yin pas na mchod pa gsang ba'o //
translated: Since it is not common with others, it is the secret worship.

original: de rab tu bsgrub pa ni 'od zer gyis lha mo dgug pa la sogs pa rgyas par sbyar ro //
analyzed: de rab tu bsgrub pa ni 'od zer gyis lha mo dgug pa la sogs pa rgyas par sbyar ro //
translated: The full accomplishment of that is the extensive application of the light rays summoning the goddesses, and so forth.

original: de nyid gsang ba'i snying po ste 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid gsang ba'i snying po ste 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That itself is the secret essence, because it produces the desired result.

original: gsang ba chen po ni bdud rtsi lnga dang lha mo bcu'o //
analyzed: gsang ba chen po ni bdud rtsi lnga dang lha mo bcu'o //
translated: The great secret is the five nectars and the ten goddesses.

original: de nyid 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pas na dam tshig go //🔽da ni dngos grub thams cad la shis pa'i zas bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pas na dam tshig go // da ni dngos grub thams cad la shis pa'i zas bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Since that itself is not to be transgressed, it is the pledge.

original: sha chen zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sha chen zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Now, in order to teach the food auspicious for all powers, [the Bhagavān] declares, great meat, etc.

original: dam tshig dag gis zhes pa ni sngon du bsten pa'i phan yon dang / phyis sgrub pa la khyad par du shis pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dam tshig dag gis zhes pa ni sngon du bsten pa'i phan yon dang / phyis sgrub pa la khyad par du shis pa'i phyir ro //
translated: By means of pure commitments means that the benefits of reliance are previously stated, and that the special auspiciousness for later practice is stated.

original: rdo rje gsum mchog ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum mchog ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: The supreme three vajras is the great seal.

original: gal te med na sgrub pa'i cho ga yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: gal te med na sgrub pa'i cho ga yang gsungs pa /
translated: If it is not available, the rite of practice is also stated:

original: khyi sha dag gis zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: khyi sha dag gis zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: With dog meat, etc.

original: thams cad du med na sgrub pa'i cho ga gsungs pa /🔽sha rnams thams cad ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad du med na sgrub pa'i cho ga gsungs pa / sha rnams thams cad ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: If all of that is not available, the rite of practice is stated:🔽With all meats, etc.

original: thams cad ces pa ni zan dron dang 'bras chan la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad ces pa ni zan dron dang 'bras chan la sogs pa'o //
translated: All means barley cakes, rice cakes, etc.

original: bsam pas rnam par brtags zhes pa ni sgrub pa po ni sems kyi dbang gis gyur pas na rang rang gi skabs su rnam par brtags pas kyang khyad par rnyed do //
analyzed: bsam pas rnam par brtags zhes pa ni sgrub pa po ni sems kyi dbang gis gyur pas na rang rang gi skabs su rnam par brtags pas kyang khyad par rnyed do //
translated: Imagined means that since the practitioner is under the power of the mind, he will obtain a special result by imagining each one in its own context.

original: rdo rje sbyor pa 'di byas na //
analyzed: rdo rje sbyor pa 'di byas na //
translated: Having made this vajra union,

original: zhes pa ni gzhan la brtag pa'i sbyor ba 'di byas pas kyang /
analyzed: zhes pa ni gzhan la brtag pa'i sbyor ba 'di byas pas kyang /
translated: means that by making this imagined union with another,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis rlobs//
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis rlobs//
translated: all buddhas will bless.

original: zhes te dngos grub ster ro zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes te dngos grub ster ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Thus, it means I will grant spiritual powers.

original: bsnyen sgrub bzhi dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor bas longs spyod par gsungs pa /
analyzed: bsnyen sgrub bzhi dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor bas longs spyod par gsungs pa /
translated: It is said that one who is a yogī/nī endowed with the four: approach, close approach, accomplishment, and great accomplishment, should enjoy.

original: rdo rje can zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje can zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The vajra-holder, etc.

original: rdo rje can gyi sku gsung thugs //
analyzed: rdo rje can gyi sku gsung thugs //
translated: The body, speech, and mind of the vajra-holder

original: zhes pa ni des byin gyis brlab pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni des byin gyis brlab pa'o //
translated: means that one should bless oneself with that.

original: rnam pa'i mchog rnams ni mtshan ma kun dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin gyi lha'o //🔽snying gar ye shes zhes pa ni dam tshig @56a * //
analyzed: rnam pa'i mchog rnams ni mtshan ma kun dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin gyi lha'o // snying gar ye shes zhes pa ni dam tshig @56a * //
translated: The supreme aspects are the deity whose nature is endowed with all the signs.

original: gi phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: gi phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
translated: The gnosis at the heart is the consecration with the pledge seal.

original: dam tshig dang zhes pa ni mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig dang zhes pa ni mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
translated: The pledge is the consecration of the eyes, etc.

original: dbu rgyan rdo rje 'dzin pa'i mchog / ces pa ni dbu rgyan la rdo rje 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: dbu rgyan rdo rje 'dzin pa'i mchog / ces pa ni dbu rgyan la rdo rje 'dzin pa ste /
translated: The crown is the supreme vajra-holder,

original: rigs lnga gang rung cig bsams nas longs spyod na sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par 'gyur ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rigs lnga gang rung cig bsams nas longs spyod na sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par 'gyur ba zhes bya'o //
translated: meaning that one should imagine a vajra-holder in the crown, and if one enjoys, it is said that all buddhas are pleased.

original: 'di ni zhes pa sbyor ba des spyod pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes pa sbyor ba des spyod pa'o //
translated: This means that one should enjoy with that application.

original: de nyid dam tshig mchog ces bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid dam tshig mchog ces bya'o //
translated: That is called the supreme commitment.

original: des ci byed ce na gong ma ltar /
analyzed: des ci byed ce na gong ma ltar /
translated: What does it do? As above,

original: dngos grub thams cad grub pa'i mchog / ces bya'o //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad grub pa'i mchog / ces bya'o //
translated: it is the supreme accomplishment of all powers.

original: de yang dam tshig mchog la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas rab tu bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de yang dam tshig mchog la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas rab tu bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Moreover, the meaning is that the yogi who abides in the supreme commitment should do it.

original: dam tshig thams cad ni bdud rtsi lnga'o //
analyzed: dam tshig thams cad ni bdud rtsi lnga'o //
translated: All commitments are the five nectars.🔽Since they are realized as pristine

original: ye shes su rtogs pas na shes pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes su rtogs pas na shes pa'o //
translated: awareness, they are pristine awareness.

original: des rdo rje lta bu thob par 'gyur bas na rdo rjer 'gyur pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: des rdo rje lta bu thob par 'gyur bas na rdo rjer 'gyur pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Since by that one attains the vajra, it is called the vajra transformation.

original: lce dag par bya ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: lce dag par bya ba gsungs pa /
translated: The purification of the tongue is stated:🔽The tongue vajra commitment

original: lce'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lce'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: is the vajra possessor.

original: lce nyid rdo rje las mi 'da' bas na /🔽lce yi dam tshig rdo rje la //
analyzed: lce nyid rdo rje las mi 'da' bas na / lce yi dam tshig rdo rje la //
translated: The tongue itself is not beyond the vajra,🔽so it is called the tongue vajra commitment.

original: zhes bya'o // rdo rje can zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya'o // rdo rje can zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: The vajra possessor is the yogi.

original: h'um bsgoms te zhes pa ni longs spyod pa po'i lce la h'um las rdo rje rtse gsum pa bum pa la yang h'um ldan par bsgoms te bdud rtsi'i sbyor ba ste dag par byed pa'i cho gas zos na rdo rje gsum thob par 'gyur ro zhes so //
analyzed: h'um bsgoms te zhes pa ni longs spyod pa po'i lce la h'um las rdo rje rtse gsum pa bum pa la yang h'um ldan par bsgoms te bdud rtsi'i sbyor ba ste dag par byed pa'i cho gas zos na rdo rje gsum thob par 'gyur ro zhes so //
translated: The line meditating on HŪṀ means that the enjoyer meditates on a three-pronged vajra from HŪṀ on the tongue, and also on HŪṀ in the vase. If one eats with the rite of purification, the combination of ambrosia, one will attain the three vajras.

original: dag par bya ba'i cho ga gsungs pa /
analyzed: dag par bya ba'i cho ga gsungs pa /
translated: The rite of purification is taught:

original: a'a: dang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: a'a: dang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: AḤ and so forth.

original: aas bhandha bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: aas bhandha bskyed par bya'o //
translated: One should generate with AḤ.

original: aom gyis bsil dbab par bya'o //
analyzed: aom gyis bsil dbab par bya'o //
translated: One should descend with OṀ.

original: dam tshig ni dpa' bo lnga dang lcags kyu lngar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig ni dpa' bo lnga dang lcags kyu lngar shes par bya'o //
translated: The pledge is to be known as the five heroes and the five hooks.

original: rdo rje tshul mchog ni rlung las byung ba'i h'um las gyur pa'i rdo rje bdud rtsi la dbab pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje tshul mchog ni rlung las byung ba'i h'um las gyur pa'i rdo rje bdud rtsi la dbab pa'o //
translated: The supreme vajra method is the descent of vajra nectar from HŪṀ arisen from the wind.

original: de'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The sequence of realization of that is as follows.

original: rdo rje dril bu bde dbyangs kyis bstod pa'i de ma thag tu rang gi mdun du yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu 'dra ba rgyal mtshan sngon pos mtshan pa cig bsam /
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu bde dbyangs kyis bstod pa'i de ma thag tu rang gi mdun du yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu 'dra ba rgyal mtshan sngon pos mtshan pa cig bsam /
translated: Immediately after praising with the melodious sound of the vajra and bell, imagine in front of oneself a bow-shaped wind mandala arisen from yaṃ, marked with a blue banner.

original: de'i steng du ram las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum des mtshan pa cig bsam /
analyzed: de'i steng du ram las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum des mtshan pa cig bsam /
translated: On top of that, imagine a triangular fire mandala arisen from raṃ, marked with that.

original: de'i steng du aa las padma bhandha des mtshan pa cig bsam /
analyzed: de'i steng du aa las padma bhandha des mtshan pa cig bsam /
translated: On top of that, imagine a skull cup arisen from aṃ, marked with that.

original: de'i nang du dri chu dang dri chen dang rakta dang byang chub kyi sems dang / mam sa yang gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i nang du dri chu dang dri chen dang rakta dang byang chub kyi sems dang / mam sa yang gzhag par bya'o //
translated: Inside that, one should place urine, feces, blood, bodhicitta, and flesh.

original: yang de bzhin du glang po che dang rta dang @56b ba lang dang khyi dang mi'i sha rnam par gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: yang de bzhin du glang po che dang rta dang @56b ba lang dang khyi dang mi'i sha rnam par gzhag par bya'o //
translated: Also, in the same way, one should arrange the flesh of elephants, horses, cows, dogs, and humans.

original: de'i steng du zla ba dang nyi ma'i gdan bzhi la h'um bhr'um a'am dzr'im kham zhes bya ba'i sa bon bkod nas /
analyzed: de'i steng du zla ba dang nyi ma'i gdan bzhi la h'um bhr'um a'am dzr'im kham zhes bya ba'i sa bon bkod nas /
translated: On top of that, on four moon and sun seats, the seed syllables hūṃ, bhrūṃ, aṃ, and jriṃ khaṃ are arranged.

original: de'i 'od zer stug pos mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bkug nas sa bon la gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i 'od zer stug pos mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bkug nas sa bon la gzhug par bya'o //
translated: The thick light rays of that [vajra] draw in Akṣobhya and so forth, and they enter the seed [syllable].

original: de'i mthus rlung gis me sbar bas thod pa dros pa'i bdud rtsi la sogs pa gcig tu zhu nas khol ba'i rlangs pas h'um du gyur /
analyzed: de'i mthus rlung gis me sbar bas thod pa dros pa'i bdud rtsi la sogs pa gcig tu zhu nas khol ba'i rlangs pas h'um du gyur /
translated: Through the power of that, the wind ignites the fire, and the skull is heated. The elixir and so forth melt into one, and the boiling vapor transforms into hūṃ.

original: de las rdo rje h'um gis byin gyis brlabs par gyur pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba ltar zhu nas bdud rtsi la dbab par bya'o //
analyzed: de las rdo rje h'um gis byin gyis brlabs par gyur pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba ltar zhu nas bdud rtsi la dbab par bya'o //
translated: From that, the vajra is blessed by hūṃ. It melts like a string of jewels and falls into the elixir.

original: de ltar lan gsum du byas pas padma'i snod bdud rtsis gang ba la aom zhugs pas bsil bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar lan gsum du byas pas padma'i snod bdud rtsis gang ba la aom zhugs pas bsil bar bya'o //
translated: Since that is done three times, the lotus vessel filled with elixir is cooled by the entry of oṃ.

original: de'i 'od zer gyis yang phyogs bcu'i bdud rtsi bkug nas der zhugs par byas pas nyi ma 'am shel ltar dag par bsams nas sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs te /
analyzed: de'i 'od zer gyis yang phyogs bcu'i bdud rtsi bkug nas der zhugs par byas pas nyi ma 'am shel ltar dag par bsams nas sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs te /
translated: The light rays of that [oṃ] draw in the elixir of the ten directions and cause it to enter there. It is imagined to be pure like the sun or a crystal. It is blessed by the mantra.

original: gong ma ltar bdag dang lha thams cad kyi lce dag par byas nas rang gi sa bon gyis bskul pa'i bhandha padma spros te /
analyzed: gong ma ltar bdag dang lha thams cad kyi lce dag par byas nas rang gi sa bon gyis bskul pa'i bhandha padma spros te /
translated: As before, the tongues of oneself and all the deities are purified. One should emanate the skull and lotus, which are urged by one’s seed syllable.

original: lha rnams kyi phyag tu thengs par byas nas longs spyod par byas na /
analyzed: lha rnams kyi phyag tu thengs par byas nas longs spyod par byas na /
translated: Having been taken into the hands of the deities, they are enjoyed.

original: ji skad du gsungs pa'i phan yon thob par 'gyur zhes so //
analyzed: ji skad du gsungs pa'i phan yon thob par 'gyur zhes so //
translated: If one does this, one will obtain the benefits as stated.

original: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
translated: The vajra is the Tathagata.

original: dam tshig ni bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga'o //
analyzed: dam tshig ni bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga'o //
translated: The pledge is the five nectars and the five meats.

original: bdud rtsi ni des rnam par rtog pa'i shi ba dang bral bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: bdud rtsi ni des rnam par rtog pa'i shi ba dang bral bar byed pa'o //
translated: The nectar is that which frees one from the death of conceptualization by means of that.

original: phreng ba ni des mdzes par byed pa'i don to //
analyzed: phreng ba ni des mdzes par byed pa'i don to //
translated: The garland is for the purpose of beautifying with that.

original: da ni de'i phan yon gsungs ba rdo rje'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: da ni de'i phan yon gsungs ba rdo rje'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Now, the benefits of that are stated beginning with “vajra,” etc.

original: rdo rje gsum las mi 'da' bas na dam tshig ste bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum las mi 'da' bas na dam tshig ste bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga'o //
translated: Since one does not transgress the three vajras, the pledge is the five nectars and the five meats.

original: yi ge aas bhandha bskyed pa ni gsung gi dam tshig go ;
analyzed: yi ge aas bhandha bskyed pa ni gsung gi dam tshig go ;
translated: The pledge of speech is the generation of the skull-cup from the syllable A.

original: / h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje'i bdud rtsi la dbab pa ni thugs gyi dam tshig go //
analyzed: / h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje'i bdud rtsi la dbab pa ni thugs gyi dam tshig go //
translated: The pledge of mind is the descent of the vajra nectar arisen from HŪM.

original: aom gyis bsil par bya ba ni sku'i dam tshig go //
analyzed: aom gyis bsil par bya ba ni sku'i dam tshig go //
translated: The pledge of body is the cooling by means of OṀ.

original: de grub zin ma thag tu mchog ste sku gsung thugs rdo rje can sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes so //
analyzed: de grub zin ma thag tu mchog ste sku gsung thugs rdo rje can sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes so //
translated: As soon as that is accomplished, one becomes a supreme buddha, one who has the vajra body, speech, and mind.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is that like?

original: phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par nus pas na nor bu yid bzhin rgya mtshor 'gyur ro zhes so //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par nus pas na nor bu yid bzhin rgya mtshor 'gyur ro zhes so //
translated: One becomes a wish-fulfilling jewel, a wish-granting ocean, able to give all the wishes of all sentient beings in the ten directions.

original: de bas na des 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdo rje lta bu'i lus kyi bdag nyid kyis snang bar byed de rdo rje 'chang chen por gyur nas zhes ji snyed pa'o //🔽da ni gong du @57a * //🔽gsungs pa'i 'khor lo la sogs pa'i rig 'dzin dang gzhan yang grub pa'i yon tan gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bas na des 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdo rje lta bu'i lus kyi bdag nyid kyis snang bar byed de rdo rje 'chang chen por gyur nas zhes ji snyed pa'o // da ni gong du @57a * // gsungs pa'i 'khor lo la sogs pa'i rig 'dzin dang gzhan yang grub pa'i yon tan gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, with that, one illuminates all world systems with the nature of a vajra-like body, having become Great Vajradhara.

original: 'khor lo zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Now, the qualities of the attainments of the knowledge holders of the wheel and so forth, which were mentioned above, and others, are taught.

original: 'khor lo dam tshig ces pa sogs mtshon pa tsam ste rdo rje la sogs pa yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo dam tshig ces pa sogs mtshon pa tsam ste rdo rje la sogs pa yang shes par bya'o //
translated: The wheel, pledge, and so forth are merely illustrations; one should understand the vajra and so forth as well.

original: de rnams grub pa ni mchog ste rang rang gi rigs kyi sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur zhes te dngos ma yin no //
analyzed: de rnams grub pa ni mchog ste rang rang gi rigs kyi sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur zhes te dngos ma yin no //
translated: Those accomplishments are supreme, since one becomes like the body of the Buddha of one’s own family, but not actually so.

original: gang+g'a'i bye snyed ces pa ni grangs can te de yang rig pa 'dzin pa grub pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun du rnam par spyod ces so //
analyzed: gang+g'a'i bye snyed ces pa ni grangs can te de yang rig pa 'dzin pa grub pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun du rnam par spyod ces so //
translated: “As many as the sands of the Ganges” means that one is a numerable one, and that one, by the accomplishment of the knowledge-woman, wanders everywhere in the world systems of a great billion world universe.

original: dam tshig dam pa zhes pa ni rgyud gzhan gyis grub pa'i rig 'dzin thams cad do //
analyzed: dam tshig dam pa zhes pa ni rgyud gzhan gyis grub pa'i rig 'dzin thams cad do //
translated: “The supreme pledge” means all the knowledge-women who are accomplished by other tantras.

original: de rnams kyi gtso bo byed pa'i phyir mchog tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi gtso bo byed pa'i phyir mchog tu gyur pa'o //
translated: Since one acts as their chief, one becomes supreme.

original: de lta bu'i rdo rje sku ste de dang 'dra ba'i rig 'dzin bsgoms pas zhes te grub pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de lta bu'i rdo rje sku ste de dang 'dra ba'i rig 'dzin bsgoms pas zhes te grub pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: By meditating on the knowledge-woman who is like that vajra body, one becomes accomplished, is the meaning.

original: 'di ni dam tshig mchog tu 'gyur //
analyzed: 'di ni dam tshig mchog tu 'gyur //
translated: This becomes the supreme pledge.

original: zhes pa ni de yongs su smin pa'i stobs kyis phyag rgya chen po mngon du byed par 'gyur ro zhes so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de yongs su smin pa'i stobs kyis phyag rgya chen po mngon du byed par 'gyur ro zhes so //
translated: By the power of one’s complete maturation, the Great Seal will be actualized, it is said.

original: mi snang 'gyur ba zhes pa ni rgyud gzhan la grub pa'i mi snang ba las mchog go //
analyzed: mi snang 'gyur ba zhes pa ni rgyud gzhan la grub pa'i mi snang ba las mchog go //
translated: “Invisible transformation” is superior to the invisible established in other tantras.

original: stod khams dag ni zhes pa ni stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rang gi yon tan gyis snang bar byed ces so //
analyzed: stod khams dag ni zhes pa ni stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rang gi yon tan gyis snang bar byed ces so //
translated: “The upper and lower regions” means that the small chiliocosm is illuminated by one’s own qualities.

original: de bzhin du mngon par shes pa lnga grub pa ni stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams na dbang po'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du mngon par shes pa lnga grub pa ni stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams na dbang po'o //
translated: Similarly, the accomplishment of the five superknowledges is in the intermediate chiliocosm world system.

original: phyag rgya chen po la ni phyogs med par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po la ni phyogs med par shes par bya'o //
translated: The great seal is to be understood as being in the ten directions.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: mi snang khams ni stong phrag na //
analyzed: mi snang khams ni stong phrag na //
translated: The invisible realm is a thousandfold;

original: mngon shes stong gnyis 'bring po la //
analyzed: mngon shes stong gnyis 'bring po la //
translated: The superknowledges are in the intermediate chiliocosm;

original: rig 'dzin dag ni stong gsum la ;
analyzed: rig 'dzin dag ni stong gsum la ;
translated: The knowledge holders are in the trichiliocosm;

original: /'gro kun gtso bo rdo rje can //
analyzed: /'gro kun gtso bo rdo rje can //
translated: The lord of all migrators is the vajra holder.

original: zhes so // sangs rgyas kun las 'phrog pa dang // zhes pa ni phul du byung ba'i gtam ste sangs rgyas rnams la yang mi snang bas de'i phun sum tshogs pa 'phrog par nus pa gzi can la sogs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te gdol pa'i bu bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes so // sangs rgyas kun las 'phrog pa dang // zhes pa ni phul du byung ba'i gtam ste sangs rgyas rnams la yang mi snang bas de'i phun sum tshogs pa 'phrog par nus pa gzi can la sogs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te gdol pa'i bu bzhin no //
translated: The line stealing from all the buddhas is a hyperbolic expression, meaning that since he is not even visible to the buddhas, what need is there to speak of the ability of the powerful ones, such as the one called the son of the outcaste, to steal their excellence?

original: de bzhin du lha'i bu mo mchog la spyod nus zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du lha'i bu mo mchog la spyod nus zhes pa'o //
translated: Similarly, he is able to enjoy the best of celestial maidens.

original: da ni gong du gsungs pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga grub pa'i yon tan gsungs pa //
analyzed: da ni gong du gsungs pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga grub pa'i yon tan gsungs pa //
translated: Now, the qualities of the accomplishment of the five superknowledges mentioned above are taught.

original: gang+g'a'i bye snyed ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang+g'a'i bye snyed ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The line as many as there are grains of sand in the Ganges and so forth.

original: gang+g'a'i bye snyed na sangs rgyas rang gi rdo rje gdan la bzhugs pa mthong @57b zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: gang+g'a'i bye snyed na sangs rgyas rang gi rdo rje gdan la bzhugs pa mthong @57b zhes sbyar ro //
translated: One sees as many buddhas as there are grains of sand in the Ganges, each seated on their own vajra seat.

original: sgra grag pa ni ji snyed pa zhes pa ni sems can ma yin pa'i sgra rags pa dang phra ba ji lta snyed pa bsdu'o //
analyzed: sgra grag pa ni ji snyed pa zhes pa ni sems can ma yin pa'i sgra rags pa dang phra ba ji lta snyed pa bsdu'o //
translated: As many sounds as there are includes all coarse and subtle sounds that are not sentient beings.

original: sems can kun gyi sems rnams zhes pa ni /
analyzed: sems can kun gyi sems rnams zhes pa ni /
translated: The minds of all sentient beings refers to🔽the minds of all sentient beings, both coarse and subtle.

original: 'gro ba lngar gtogs pa'i sems can gyi sems rtogs pa'i rgyun dang 'brel pa dang rtog pa de bzlog pas dag par byed pa'i sems des rig 'gyur zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba lngar gtogs pa'i sems can gyi sems rtogs pa'i rgyun dang 'brel pa dang rtog pa de bzlog pas dag par byed pa'i sems des rig 'gyur zhes sbyar ro //
translated: The mind of sentient beings belonging to the five destinies is connected with the stream of conceptual thoughts, and by reversing those thoughts, the mind that purifies is connected with the knowledge of the three times.

original: gang gis she na sku gsung thugs kyis mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: gang gis she na sku gsung thugs kyis mtshan pa'o //
translated: By what? By the sign of body, speech, and mind.

original: rol mo las byung zhes te rdo rje gsum ni sems can gyi don byed pa'i rol mo ste /
analyzed: rol mo las byung zhes te rdo rje gsum ni sems can gyi don byed pa'i rol mo ste /
translated: Arising from the play, the three vajras are the play of benefiting sentient beings.

original: de las byung ba'i sems ni nges mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: de las byung ba'i sems ni nges mtshan pa'o //
translated: The mind that arises from that is the sign.

original: 'khor ba dag na gnas pa'i zhes pa ni rang dang gzhan no//
analyzed: 'khor ba dag na gnas pa'i zhes pa ni rang dang gzhan no//
translated: Dwelling in the pure cyclic existence is oneself and others.

original: gtan tshigs rtags ni rigs dang pha ma dang / rang gi mid dang / las ci spyad ba dang / nad gang gis shi ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs rtags ni rigs dang pha ma dang / rang gi mid dang / las ci spyad ba dang / nad gang gis shi ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The reason is the family, father, mother, one’s own name, what kind of karma was performed, and by what kind of illness one died, and so on.

original: gang+g'a'i bye snyed zhing dag tu //
analyzed: gang+g'a'i bye snyed zhing dag tu //
translated: In buddhafields equal to the number of grains of sand in the Ganges River,

original: zhes pa ni rang gis 'dul ba'i zhing du'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rang gis 'dul ba'i zhing du'o //
translated: one’s own field of disciples.

original: ci byed ce na /
analyzed: ci byed ce na /
translated: What does one do?

original: sangs rgyas sprin gyis brgyan pa'i skus //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sprin gyis brgyan pa'i skus //
translated: The body adorned with the cloud of buddhas.

original: zhes te sangs rgyas lta bu'i sprul pa'i sku 'phro ba ni brgyan pa ste de lta bu yis zhes so //
analyzed: zhes te sangs rgyas lta bu'i sprul pa'i sku 'phro ba ni brgyan pa ste de lta bu yis zhes so //
translated: Thus, the emanation body like a Buddha is the ornament, and it is by that.

original: dus ji tsam zhig tu zhe na /
analyzed: dus ji tsam zhig tu zhe na /
translated: For how long a time?

original: bskal pa gang+g'a'i bye snyed du //
analyzed: bskal pa gang+g'a'i bye snyed du //
translated: For eons equal to the sands of the Ganges.

original: zhes nye bar btags pas te bskal pa gnyis kyi bar du'o //
analyzed: zhes nye bar btags pas te bskal pa gnyis kyi bar du'o //
translated: It is designated by that, and it is for two eons.

original: rdo rje rdzu 'phrul zhes pa ni nam mkha'i khams kun du rang dang 'dra ba'i sku spro ba dang / lha la sogs pa'i gzugs su ston pa dang / nam mkha' la 'phur ba la sogs pa ji snyed pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rdzu 'phrul zhes pa ni nam mkha'i khams kun du rang dang 'dra ba'i sku spro ba dang / lha la sogs pa'i gzugs su ston pa dang / nam mkha' la 'phur ba la sogs pa ji snyed pa'o //
translated: The vajra miracle is the emission of bodies like oneself throughout the realm of space, the display of forms of gods and so forth, and as much as flying through space and so forth.

original: gzhan las khyad par du gyur pa'i phyir mchog ste des 'gengs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan las khyad par du gyur pa'i phyir mchog ste des 'gengs pa'o //
translated: It is supreme because it is superior to others, and it fills with that.

original: dam tshig rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: dam tshig rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: The pledge vajra is Great Vajradhara.

original: de lnga'i mngon par shes pa'i yul mkhyen pas na mngon par mkhyen pa'o //
analyzed: de lnga'i mngon par shes pa'i yul mkhyen pas na mngon par mkhyen pa'o //
translated: Since he knows the objects of the five superknowledges, he is the knower.

original: de rnams kyi ming gsungs pa /
analyzed: de rnams kyi ming gsungs pa /
translated: He states their names.

original: de la zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de la zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Thus, and so forth and so on.

original: gzhan yang de'i khyad par gsungs pa /
analyzed: gzhan yang de'i khyad par gsungs pa /
translated: Moreover, he states their distinctions.

original: sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The Buddha and so forth.

original: sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur //
translated: One becomes like the Buddha's body.

original: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi mngon par shes pa lnga dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba ste de slob pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi mngon par shes pa lnga dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba ste de slob pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This means that one becomes like the five superknowledges of the Buddha, because one is not a learner.

original: 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba'i ni lam mtshungs pa ste /
analyzed: 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba'i ni lam mtshungs pa ste /
translated: The surrounded by a retinue is the same path,

original: de bas na rdo rje sku gsung thugs kyis zhes te de la gnas pas zhes so //
analyzed: de bas na rdo rje sku gsung thugs kyis zhes te de la gnas pas zhes so //
translated: therefore, with the vajra body, speech, and mind, one abides in that.

original: 'jig rten khams kun zhes pa ni gong ma ltar bdag nyid dbang bar ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten khams kun zhes pa ni gong ma ltar bdag nyid dbang bar ro //
translated: The all world systems are as above, one's own empowerment.

original: de kun du bgrod par 'gyur zhes so //
analyzed: de kun du bgrod par 'gyur zhes so //
translated: One goes to all of those.

original: da ni yan lag bzhi @58a * //
analyzed: da ni yan lag bzhi @58a * //
translated: Now, the four branches

original: 'bras bu dang bcas pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'bras bu dang bcas pa gsungs pa /
translated: are explained with the result.

original: bsnyen pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bsnyen pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The approaching and so on.

original: srid pa dang zhi ba so sor nye bas na bsnyen pa'o //
analyzed: srid pa dang zhi ba so sor nye bas na bsnyen pa'o //
translated: Approaching is approaching the individual states of existence and peace.

original: mi 'da' bas na dam tshig go //
analyzed: mi 'da' bas na dam tshig go //
translated: The pledge is not transgressing.

original: de nyid zab mo dang yang dag par gsal ba bsres pas na sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid zab mo dang yang dag par gsal ba bsres pas na sbyor ba'o //
translated: That itself is the union of the profound and the manifest.

original: rang gi lha dang nye bar bsnyen pa ste sa'i snying po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi lha dang nye bar bsnyen pa ste sa'i snying po la sogs pa'o //
translated: Approaching one's deity means such as Kṣitigarbha.

original: de'i 'byung ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'o //
analyzed: de'i 'byung ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'o //
translated: Its emergence is omniscience.

original: sku gsum du sgrub pa ni sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: sku gsum du sgrub pa ni sgrub pa'o //
translated: Accomplishing the three bodies is accomplishment.

original: de'i don ni rdo rje gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste mi 'da' bas na dam tshig go //
analyzed: de'i don ni rdo rje gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste mi 'da' bas na dam tshig go //
translated: Its meaning is the pledge not to transgress the consecration by the three vajras.

original: khams gsum chos kyi dbang phyug tu gnas pa'i dam pa yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas pas na dbang bskur ba na sgrub pa chen po'o //
analyzed: khams gsum chos kyi dbang phyug tu gnas pa'i dam pa yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas pas na dbang bskur ba na sgrub pa chen po'o //
translated: Since it is the consecration of the supreme abode as the lord of the Dharma of the three realms, it is the great accomplishment.

original: rdo rje bye brag ces pa ni chung du dang 'bring po dang chen po ye shes kyi bye brag gi sngon du bsnyen par byas la de las ji skad du gsungs pa'i dngos grub kyi las rnams bsgrub par bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: rdo rje bye brag ces pa ni chung du dang 'bring po dang chen po ye shes kyi bye brag gi sngon du bsnyen par byas la de las ji skad du gsungs pa'i dngos grub kyi las rnams bsgrub par bya'o zhes so //
translated: As for the distinctions of the vajra, one should perform the preliminary approximation with the distinctions of the small, medium, and great gnoses, and accomplish the activities of the powers as taught in those [texts].

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: byang chub rdo rje gsungs pa yi //
analyzed: byang chub rdo rje gsungs pa yi //
translated: The method taught by Bodhivajra

original: thabs ni rnam pa bzhi dag ste //
analyzed: thabs ni rnam pa bzhi dag ste //
translated: Is the fourfold one.

original: bsnyen pa'i cho ga dang po ste //
analyzed: bsnyen pa'i cho ga dang po ste //
translated: The first is the rite of approximation,

original: gnyis pa nye bar sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa nye bar sgrub pa'o //
translated: The second is the rite of near-accomplishment.

original: gsum pa bsgrub par bya ba dang // bzhi pa sgrub pa chen po'o //
analyzed: gsum pa bsgrub par bya ba dang // bzhi pa sgrub pa chen po'o //
translated: and the fourth is the great practice.

original: zhes so // mdor bstan pa'i don rgyas par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir dang po chung ngu'i bsnyen sgrub bzhi gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhes so // mdor bstan pa'i don rgyas par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir dang po chung ngu'i bsnyen sgrub bzhi gsungs pa /
translated: In order to understand the meaning of the brief presentation in detail, the four practices of the small are taught.

original: bsnyen pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bsnyen pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The first is the practice of approach, and so on.

original: ting nge 'dzin ni rang gi sems 'jug pa la sogs pas rang gi lhar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin ni rang gi sems 'jug pa la sogs pas rang gi lhar gyur pa'o //
translated: Samādhi is one’s mind becoming one’s deity through entering, and so on.

original: de nyid don dam pa dang rab tu sbyor zhing byang chub mchog tu byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid don dam pa dang rab tu sbyor zhing byang chub mchog tu byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
translated: That is applied to the ultimate and is empowered as supreme awakening.

original: de'i don ni bar gyi srid pa'i gzugs zhal du 'jug pa la sogs pas lha mo'i gsang ba'i khrag 'dra ba ni ho'i me yis yi ge gsum zhu ba'i 'od zer gyis thabs dang shes rab dbus kyi gdan cho ga dang po gnas pa la rang gi tshad
analyzed: de'i don ni bar gyi srid pa'i gzugs zhal du 'jug pa la sogs pas lha mo'i gsang ba'i khrag 'dra ba ni ho'i me yis yi ge gsum zhu ba'i 'od zer gyis thabs dang shes rab dbus kyi gdan cho ga dang po gnas pa la rang gi tshad
translated: The meaning of that is as follows: The form of the intermediate existence enters the mouth and so on, and the blood of the secret place of the goddess is like ho. The light rays of the three syllables that melt with the fire of ho are the method and wisdom.🔽The seat in the middle is the first rite.

original: med pa bzhis lha mor gyur pa'i glus bskul bas sa bon dang mtshan ma sa bon gyis mtshan pa /
analyzed: med pa bzhis lha mor gyur pa'i glus bskul bas sa bon dang mtshan ma sa bon gyis mtshan pa /
translated: One becomes the goddess through the four immeasurables.

original: de'i 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rang dang 'dra ba'i skur byas pa las byung ba'i rang gi lha ni chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlabs pa ni bsnyen pa'i yan lag chung du dang / rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu chung du ste mya ngan las 'das pa'i yan lag go //
analyzed: de'i 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rang dang 'dra ba'i skur byas pa las byung ba'i rang gi lha ni chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlabs pa ni bsnyen pa'i yan lag chung du dang / rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu chung du ste mya ngan las 'das pa'i yan lag go //
translated: The consecration of one's deity in the realm of reality is the lesser branch of approach, and the lesser result of natural outcome, the branch of nirvana.

original: grub mchog la zhes pa ni rang gi lha ni grub pa mchog ste /
analyzed: grub mchog la zhes pa ni rang gi lha ni grub pa mchog ste /
translated: The supreme attainment is the supreme attainment of one's deity.

original: de'i rdo rje skye mched de mig la sogs @58b pa kshi la sogs pa las mtshan ma des mtshan pa ste sa'i snying po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams rnam par dpyad pa ni nye bar sgrub pa'i yan lag chung ngu dang / rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu chung ngu ste thams cad mkhyen pa'i yan lag go //
analyzed: de'i rdo rje skye mched de mig la sogs @58b pa kshi la sogs pa las mtshan ma des mtshan pa ste sa'i snying po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams rnam par dpyad pa ni nye bar sgrub pa'i yan lag chung ngu dang / rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu chung ngu ste thams cad mkhyen pa'i yan lag go //
translated: The analysis of the vajra sense-spheres, such as the eyes, etc., marked by those signs, such as the earth-womb, etc., is the lesser branch of near-accomplishment, and the lesser result of full ripening, the branch of omniscience.

original: sngags kyi bdag po zhes pa ni sngags h'um la sogs pa las bskyed pa ni thugs kyi rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi bdag po zhes pa ni sngags h'um la sogs pa las bskyed pa ni thugs kyi rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
translated: The lord of the mantra is the mind-vajra, etc., generated from the mantra hum, etc.

original: de byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags kyis gnyis su med par bya ba ni bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: de byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags kyis gnyis su med par bya ba ni bsgom pa'o //
translated: The consecration of that by the mantra of consecration is the meditation.

original: sgrub pa rnam par gzhag pa'i don du tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis bskul ba ni sgrub pa'i yan lag chung ngu dang skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu chung ngu ste sku gsum thob pa'i thab yan lag go //
analyzed: sgrub pa rnam par gzhag pa'i don du tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis bskul ba ni sgrub pa'i yan lag chung ngu dang skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu chung ngu ste sku gsum thob pa'i thab yan lag go //
translated: In order to present the practice, the two verses of exhortation are the small branch of practice and the small human-action result, the branch of the attainment of the three bodies.

original: rang sngags zhes pa ni rang gi sa bon gyis bskul ba'i bde bar gshegs pa las byung ba'i 'od zer las lha mo bcu 'phros pa las rang gi spyi bor thim pa las /
analyzed: rang sngags zhes pa ni rang gi sa bon gyis bskul ba'i bde bar gshegs pa las byung ba'i 'od zer las lha mo bcu 'phros pa las rang gi spyi bor thim pa las /
translated: One’s mantra is the light rays arisen from the Sugata, which are impelled by one’s seed syllable, and from which the ten goddesses emanate, and which dissolve into one’s crown.🔽The form of the vajra-holder is the five or six families, and the great Vajradhara.

original: rdo rje can gyi gzugs te rigs lnga 'am drug la rdo rje 'chang chen po ste de bas na /
analyzed: rdo rje can gyi gzugs te rigs lnga 'am drug la rdo rje 'chang chen po ste de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: dbu rgyan la ni bdag po bsam //
analyzed: dbu rgyan la ni bdag po bsam //
translated: one should think of the lord in the crown.

original: zhes te gang yang rung ba'i bdag po gzhag go zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes te gang yang rung ba'i bdag po gzhag go zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should place any suitable lord.

original: de ltar byas na ye shes rdo rje ste rnal 'byor par 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar byas na ye shes rdo rje ste rnal 'byor par 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
