translated: If one does that, one will accomplish the vajra-wisdom, that is, the yogin.

original: des gong ma gsum la yang bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: des gong ma gsum la yang bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: That should be accomplished in the three higher [empowerments].

original: sgrub pa chen po'i yan lag chung ngu dang ; dri ma dang bral ba'i 'bras bu chung ngu ste /
analyzed: sgrub pa chen po'i yan lag chung ngu dang ; dri ma dang bral ba'i 'bras bu chung ngu ste /
translated: The small branch of the great accomplishment and the small result free from stains

original: khams gsum chos kyi dbang phyug gi yan lag go //
analyzed: khams gsum chos kyi dbang phyug gi yan lag go //
translated: are the branch of the lord of the three realms.

original: de la ting nge 'dzin zhes pa nyid bstan pas bsnyen pa'i khyad par gsungs pa /
analyzed: de la ting nge 'dzin zhes pa nyid bstan pas bsnyen pa'i khyad par gsungs pa /
translated: There, the explanation of the so-called samādhi teaches the special approach:

original: bsnyen pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bsnyen pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “The approach” and so on.

original: ye shes bdud rtsi dag ces pa ni byang chub kyi sems kyi gzugs te ;
analyzed: ye shes bdud rtsi dag ces pa ni byang chub kyi sems kyi gzugs te ;
translated: The pure nectar of gnosis is the form of bodhicitta.

original: de yang gong ma ltar bar gyi srid pa'i sems 'jug pa sngon du byas pa'i zla bar zhu bas mchog gi bsnyen pa bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de yang gong ma ltar bar gyi srid pa'i sems 'jug pa sngon du byas pa'i zla bar zhu bas mchog gi bsnyen pa bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Further, the meaning of “the melting of the moon” is that the supreme approach is performed by first engaging the mind of the intermediate existence, as above.

original: thams cad kyang brtag par bya zhes pa ni des bsnyen pa byas na nye bar bsgrub pa la sogs pas kyang mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad kyang brtag par bya zhes pa ni des bsnyen pa byas na nye bar bsgrub pa la sogs pas kyang mtshan pa'o //
translated: “Everything should be imagined” means that if one performs the approach, one will also be marked by the near accomplishment and so on.

original: longs spyod bzhi po 'di ni sngar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bor rang gi lha'i sngags kyi de nyid don sgrub pa'o zhes so //
analyzed: longs spyod bzhi po 'di ni sngar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bor rang gi lha'i sngags kyi de nyid don sgrub pa'o zhes so //
translated: These four enjoyments are the accomplishment of the reality of one's deity mantra, as the nature of all the Tathagatas.

original: ye shes su bya ba'i ngo bo ma yin pas ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad sel bar mi nus shing ma bsgrubs pas na chung ngu'i sgras bstan to //
analyzed: ye shes su bya ba'i ngo bo ma yin pas ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad sel bar mi nus shing ma bsgrubs pas na chung ngu'i sgras bstan to //
translated: Since they are not the nature of knowledge, they are unable to remove all counteragents, and since they are not accomplished, they are taught by the word 'lesser'.

original: lha gtso bo gcig bu gtogs pa'i @59a * //
analyzed: lha gtso bo gcig bu gtogs pa'i @59a * //
translated: Since they are included in the one principal deity,

original: phyir na de rnams la mchog gi sgras khyad par du byas pa'o //
analyzed: phyir na de rnams la mchog gi sgras khyad par du byas pa'o //
translated: they are distinguished by the word 'supreme'.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: thun mongs mchog gi bye brag gis //
analyzed: thun mongs mchog gi bye brag gis //
translated: By the distinction of common and supreme,

original: bsnyen pa rnam pa bzhir 'gyur pa //
analyzed: bsnyen pa rnam pa bzhir 'gyur pa //
translated: there are four kinds of approach.

original: rdo rje rnam bzhi thun mong ste //
analyzed: rdo rje rnam bzhi thun mong ste //
translated: The four vajras are common,

original: mchog ni ye shes bdud rtsi'o //
analyzed: mchog ni ye shes bdud rtsi'o //
translated: the supreme is the nectar of wisdom.

original: zhes so // de bas na dge ba'i mtshan nyid kyi tshig bsnyen pa bzhi zhes gsungs kyang nye bar sgrub pa la sogs pa yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes so // de bas na dge ba'i mtshan nyid kyi tshig bsnyen pa bzhi zhes gsungs kyang nye bar sgrub pa la sogs pa yang shes par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, although the characteristics of virtue are said to be the four approaches, the near attainment and so forth should also be understood.

original: de bas na mchog gi bsnyen pa gcig yan lag tu bshad zin to //
analyzed: de bas na mchog gi bsnyen pa gcig yan lag tu bshad zin to //
translated: Therefore, the supreme service has been explained as one branch.

original: gnas gsungs pa dgon pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gnas gsungs pa dgon pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The place is stated by “in a forest, etc.”

original: dgon pa la sogs pa'i gnas su ji skad bshad pa dang / bshad par 'gyur ba'i bskyed pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin byas nas dngos grub 'thob pa zhes so //
analyzed: dgon pa la sogs pa'i gnas su ji skad bshad pa dang / bshad par 'gyur ba'i bskyed pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin byas nas dngos grub 'thob pa zhes so //
translated: In a forest, etc., place, having done the creation stage samadhi as explained and as will be explained, one attains power.

original: gzhan du na bud med ni theg pa dman pa la zhugs pas lam du ma mthong bas na dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs so //
analyzed: gzhan du na bud med ni theg pa dman pa la zhugs pas lam du ma mthong bas na dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs so //
translated: Otherwise, a woman is a great forest place, because one who has entered the Lesser Vehicle does not see the path.

original: de nyid rab tu rnam par dben pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid rab tu rnam par dben pa ste /
translated: That is thoroughly isolated,

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i tsher mas gang bas gzhan mi 'gro bas so //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i tsher mas gang bas gzhan mi 'gro bas so //
translated: because it is filled with the thorns of passion, etc., and others do not go there.

original: mi g-yo zhing bde ba chen po mi 'gyur bas ri bor ro //
analyzed: mi g-yo zhing bde ba chen po mi 'gyur bas ri bor ro //
translated: It is a mountain, because it is immovable and unchanging great bliss.

original: blo dman pa rnams nyon mongs pa'i gcan gzan la 'jigs pas na nags 'dabs so //
analyzed: blo dman pa rnams nyon mongs pa'i gcan gzan la 'jigs pas na nags 'dabs so //
translated: It is a forest grove, because those of inferior intellect are afraid of the beasts of afflictive emotion.

original: shes rab kyi cha'i chu dogs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin byas na dngos grub 'thob po zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: shes rab kyi cha'i chu dogs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin byas na dngos grub 'thob po zhes sbyar ro //
translated: If one does the perfection of samadhi in the water of the portion of wisdom, one attains power.

original: da ni chen po'i bsnyen pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni chen po'i bsnyen pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now the great approach is taught.

original: yang na zhes pa ni rnam par gzhag pa'i tshig ma yin te /
analyzed: yang na zhes pa ni rnam par gzhag pa'i tshig ma yin te /
translated: “Or” is not a term of presentation,

original: rang gi lha'i bzhin du gzhan la zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rang gi lha'i bzhin du gzhan la zhes pa'i don to //
translated: but means “in the same way as one’s own deity, so also for another.”

original: rdo rje bzhi dag gis zhes pa ni rang gi sa bon gyis bskul ba'i bde bar gshegs pa zhal du zhugs pa las byung ba'i padma'i nang nas zla bar zhu ba'i cho ga ste dang po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bzhi dag gis zhes pa ni rang gi sa bon gyis bskul ba'i bde bar gshegs pa zhal du zhugs pa las byung ba'i padma'i nang nas zla bar zhu ba'i cho ga ste dang po'o //
translated: “By means of the four vajras” is the first rite, the rite of the moon’s melting from within the lotus, which arises from the Sugata’s entry into the mouth, urged by one’s own seed.

original: de nyid las bdag po'i sa bon du gyur pa'i cho ga ste gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid las bdag po'i sa bon du gyur pa'i cho ga ste gnyis pa'o //
translated: “From that very thing” is the second rite, the rite of the lord’s seed.

original: de nyid las rang ngam bdag po'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa ste cho ga gsum pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid las rang ngam bdag po'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa ste cho ga gsum pa'o //
translated: “From that very thing” is the third rite, the rite of one’s own or the lord’s mandala.

original: de nyid gong ma'i ltar badzra dhri ka la sogs pa'i sngags kyis phyung nas rang rang gi gdan la dgod pa ni cho ga bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid gong ma'i ltar badzra dhri ka la sogs pa'i sngags kyis phyung nas rang rang gi gdan la dgod pa ni cho ga bzhi pa'o //
translated: “From that very thing” is the fourth rite, the rite of the emanation of the deities by means of the mantra “vajra-dhṛk” and so on, and their placement on their respective seats, as before.

original: de nas 'og nas 'byung ba ltar ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang gnyis su med par byas nas byin gyis brlab pa ni brtul zhugs brtan pa'i rnal 'byor bas thun mong gi bsnyen pa'o //
analyzed: de nas 'og nas 'byung ba ltar ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang gnyis su med par byas nas byin gyis brlab pa ni brtul zhugs brtan pa'i rnal 'byor bas thun mong gi bsnyen pa'o //
translated: Then, as will be explained below, having made [the pledge being] non-dual with the gnosis maṇḍala, the consecration is the common recitation by the yogī/nī of firm observances.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: dang po stong nyid byang chub ste //
analyzed: dang po stong nyid byang chub ste //
translated: First, emptiness is enlightenment;

original: gnyis pa sa bon @59b bsdu ba yin //
analyzed: gnyis pa sa bon @59b bsdu ba yin //
translated: Second, the gathering of the seed;

original: gsum pa gzugs ni rdzogs pa ste /
analyzed: gsum pa gzugs ni rdzogs pa ste /
translated: Third, the complete form;

original: bzhi pa yi ge dgod pa'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa yi ge dgod pa'o //
translated: Fourth, the placement of the syllable.

original: rdo rje rnam bzhi 'di dag gis //
analyzed: rdo rje rnam bzhi 'di dag gis //
translated: By means of these four vajras,

original: thun mong bsnyen pa bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: thun mong bsnyen pa bsgrub pa'o //
translated: The common recitation is accomplished.

original: zhes so // sku gsum mnyam pa nyid 'gyur ba //
analyzed: zhes so // sku gsum mnyam pa nyid 'gyur ba //
translated: The equality of the three bodies is attained

original: zhes pa ni cho ga dang po las mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa'i skus 'gro ba rnam smin cing grol bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni cho ga dang po las mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa'i skus 'gro ba rnam smin cing grol bar byed pa'o //
translated: means that by the first rite, one matures and liberates migrating beings with a body adorned with the major and minor marks.

original: de bsgoms na de dang 'dra ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don te /
analyzed: de bsgoms na de dang 'dra ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don te /
translated: The meaning is that if one meditates on that, one will attain the power of being like that.

original: de bzhin du de rnams kyi mig la sogs pa yang byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du de rnams kyi mig la sogs pa yang byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, one should also consecrate their eyes, and so on.

original: de rnams ni chen po'i nye bar sgrub pa la sogs par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams ni chen po'i nye bar sgrub pa la sogs par shes par bya'o //
translated: Those should be known as the “great” and “great-great” accomplishments.

original: de bas na chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i lha'i tshogs mnga' bas na ye shes kyi khyad par gyi dbang gi sa chen po'i chen po zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de bas na chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i lha'i tshogs mnga' bas na ye shes kyi khyad par gyi dbang gi sa chen po'i chen po zhes bya ba la /
translated: Therefore, because of possessing the assembly of gods of the purity of all phenomena, it is called the “great-great stage of the empowerment of the special exalted wisdom.”

original: lha thams la gtogs pa'i phyir thun mong gi bsnyen pa la sogs par bya'o //
analyzed: lha thams la gtogs pa'i phyir thun mong gi bsnyen pa la sogs par bya'o //
translated: Because it belongs to all gods, the common approach and so forth should be performed.

original: de bas na de thun mong gi bsnyen pa gcig yan lag khong nas 'byung ba dang bcas par bshad do //
analyzed: de bas na de thun mong gi bsnyen pa gcig yan lag khong nas 'byung ba dang bcas par bshad do //
translated: Therefore, that common approach is explained to be one with the inner arising of the branches.

original: chung ngu'i dang chen po'i bar na gnas pas 'bring po'i sgras khyad par du byas pa rig ma'i 'du byed pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: chung ngu'i dang chen po'i bar na gnas pas 'bring po'i sgras khyad par du byas pa rig ma'i 'du byed pa gsungs pa /
translated: The conduct of the knowledge consort is stated in the middle between the small and great, distinguished by the word “medium”:

original: dud bzhi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dud bzhi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The four times, and so forth.

original: dus bzhi zhes pa ni dam tshig tu rung pa ste mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dus bzhi zhes pa ni dam tshig tu rung pa ste mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The four times are suitable for the commitments because they are not transgressed.

original: de nyid kyang gang zhe na /
analyzed: de nyid kyang gang zhe na /
translated: What are they?

original: zla ba gnyis la sogs pa'i rim pas rgyu'i cho ga rdzogs pa las bar gyi sems 'jug pa la sogs pas rang gi lha mo lta bu bskyed nas byin gyis brlab pa ni bar ma'i bsnyen pa'o //
analyzed: zla ba gnyis la sogs pa'i rim pas rgyu'i cho ga rdzogs pa las bar gyi sems 'jug pa la sogs pas rang gi lha mo lta bu bskyed nas byin gyis brlab pa ni bar ma'i bsnyen pa'o //
translated: The middling approximation is the creation of one’s own goddess by the intermediate state of mind and so forth, from the completion of the causal rite in two months and so forth, and the consecration.

original: de'i mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa ni bar ma'i nye bar sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de'i mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa ni bar ma'i nye bar sgrub pa'o //
translated: The middling near-accomplishment is the consecration of the eyes and so forth of that [goddess].

original: rdo rje gsum gyis byin gyis brlab pa ni par ma'i sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum gyis byin gyis brlab pa ni par ma'i sgrub pa'o //
translated: The middling accomplishment is the consecration by the three vajras.🔽The middling great accomplishment is the placement of the lord of the family on the head.

original: rigs kyi bdag po dbu la gzhag pa ni bar ma'i sgrub pa chen po ste de rnams dang rab tu sbyor bas zhes so //
analyzed: rigs kyi bdag po dbu la gzhag pa ni bar ma'i sgrub pa chen po ste de rnams dang rab tu sbyor bas zhes so //
translated: “By applying those” means by applying those.

original: blo dang ldan pas zhes pa ni de rnams kyi cho ga la byang ba'o //
analyzed: blo dang ldan pas zhes pa ni de rnams kyi cho ga la byang ba'o //
translated: “The wise one” is skilled in the rites of those.

original: gnas lngar ni zhes pa ni le'u brgyad pa las gsungs pa ltar rigs lnga dang ldan par bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: gnas lngar ni zhes pa ni le'u brgyad pa las gsungs pa ltar rigs lnga dang ldan par bya ba gsungs so //
translated: “In the five places” is said to be endowed with the five families, as stated in chapter eight.

original: ye shes rdo rje zhes pa ni le'u bdun pa ltar h'um las ye shes lnga'i ngo bo rtse lnga'i rdo rje rang gi rdo rje bsams nas yi ge aom zhes pa ni de'i nor bu dmar ba aom gyi rnam par bsgrubs la /
analyzed: ye shes rdo rje zhes pa ni le'u bdun pa ltar h'um las ye shes lnga'i ngo bo rtse lnga'i rdo rje rang gi rdo rje bsams nas yi ge aom zhes pa ni de'i nor bu dmar ba aom gyi rnam par bsgrubs la /
translated: The “vajra of pristine consciousness” is the five-tined vajra, which is the nature of the five pristine consciousnesses, arisen from hūṃ, as explained in the seventh chapter. Having visualized that vajra in one’s vajra, the syllable oṃ is the red jewel of that vajra, accomplished in the form of oṃ.

original: byang chub sems 'byung ba'i lam du mngon spyod kyi ye shes bsams te /
analyzed: byang chub sems 'byung ba'i lam du mngon spyod kyi ye shes bsams te /
translated: The path of the arising of bodhicitta is the pristine consciousness of the fierce fire.

original: shes rab kyi yan lag kyang de bzhin du dag par byas nas /🔽mtshan @60a * //
analyzed: shes rab kyi yan lag kyang de bzhin du dag par byas nas / mtshan @60a * //
translated: The branch of wisdom is also purified in the same way.🔽The five characteristics of the goddess dissolve into one’s goddess.

original: nyid lnga dang ldan pa'i lha mo rang gi lha mo la thim pas te yan lag gnyis sbyar te rjes su chags pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab pa ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pas na sdom pa yin par bshad ces so //
analyzed: nyid lnga dang ldan pa'i lha mo rang gi lha mo la thim pas te yan lag gnyis sbyar te rjes su chags pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab pa ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pas na sdom pa yin par bshad ces so //
translated: The blessing with the mantra of passion, uniting the two branches, is the vow that should not be transgressed.

original: da ni zhi ba'i sbyor ba drug gsum du bsgrub pa ni rnal 'byor pas phyag rgya chen po nyams 'og tu ma chud na de'i che ba'i bskul ba dang dbye ba'i sgo nas sgrub pa'i dus gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni zhi ba'i sbyor ba drug gsum du bsgrub pa ni rnal 'byor pas phyag rgya chen po nyams 'og tu ma chud na de'i che ba'i bskul ba dang dbye ba'i sgo nas sgrub pa'i dus gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the six yogas are accomplished in three ways by means of the six peaceful applications. If the yogi has not brought the Great Seal into his experience, then the time of accomplishment is taught by way of the invocation and the separation of its greatness.

original: zhag bdun zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhag bdun zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Seven days, and so forth.

original: zhag bdun la sogs pa ni blo'i bye brag gis shes par bya'o //
analyzed: zhag bdun la sogs pa ni blo'i bye brag gis shes par bya'o //
translated: Seven days, and so forth, should be understood according to the individual's intelligence.

original: rdo rje dam tshig ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dam tshig ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: The vajra commitment is the Great Seal.

original: bsgrubs na ni zhes pa ni bskul pa dang dbye ba'o //
analyzed: bsgrubs na ni zhes pa ni bskul pa dang dbye ba'o //
translated: If one accomplishes means invocation and separation.

original: de'i blo bye brag gis phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub myur du ste de skad cig gis thob par 'gyur ro zhes so //🔽zhag grangs bye brag rab bskul pa //
analyzed: de'i blo bye brag gis phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub myur du ste de skad cig gis thob par 'gyur ro zhes so // zhag grangs bye brag rab bskul pa //
translated: By means of that individual's intelligence, the yogi will quickly attain the power of the Great Seal, that is, he will attain it in an instant.🔽The invocation of the power of the number of days is taught in the verse The number of days, and so forth, is the invocation of the power of the number of days.

original: zhes pa ni zhing dag pa'i grangs dang zla ba dang zhag bdun la sogs pa'i bye brag gis dngos grub bskul pa ni ngas rgyud 'di las rgyas par rab tu bstan zhes so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni zhing dag pa'i grangs dang zla ba dang zhag bdun la sogs pa'i bye brag gis dngos grub bskul pa ni ngas rgyud 'di las rgyas par rab tu bstan zhes so //
translated: The invocation of the power of the number of days, by means of the number of pure fields, months, seven days, and so forth, is taught extensively in this tantra by me.

original: de nas phyag rgya chen po ji tsam na 'grub ce na /
analyzed: de nas phyag rgya chen po ji tsam na 'grub ce na /
translated: Now, after how long is there the accomplishment of the Great Seal?

original: gsang ba'i mchog ste rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i mchog ste rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: The supreme secret is the Great Vajradhara.

original: de ston par byed pa'i sgra la yang de skad do //
analyzed: de ston par byed pa'i sgra la yang de skad do //
translated: The sound that teaches that is also so called.

original: de las byung ba la gsang ba rnam par khros pa las byung ba'i dngos grub ni zla ba phyed kyis 'grub par gsungs zhes de las ni mi 'da' bar nges so //
analyzed: de las byung ba la gsang ba rnam par khros pa las byung ba'i dngos grub ni zla ba phyed kyis 'grub par gsungs zhes de las ni mi 'da' bar nges so //
translated: The power that arises from that is the power that arises from the wrathful secret, which is said to be accomplished in half a month.

original: da ni lhun gyis grub pa'i sku rdo rje la sogs pa spyan drangs nas mchod pa'i de ma thag tu gsol ba gdab pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni lhun gyis grub pa'i sku rdo rje la sogs pa spyan drangs nas mchod pa'i de ma thag tu gsol ba gdab pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, after inviting the spontaneously accomplished body vajra and so forth, immediately after the worship, the supplication is stated:

original: de la zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de la zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: There, by whom and so forth.

original: gang gis sku rdo rje sgrub pa ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas sgrub pa ste de'i don nye bas na nye bar sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: gang gis sku rdo rje sgrub pa ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas sgrub pa ste de'i don nye bas na nye bar sgrub pa'o //
translated: The accomplishment of the body vajra is the accomplishment of the buddhas of the three times, and since that is the object, it is the near accomplishment.

original: ngan song las g-yogs pas na sdom pa'o //
analyzed: ngan song las g-yogs pas na sdom pa'o //
translated: Since it protects from the lower realms, it is the protection.

original: yul dang ldan par gsol ba gdab pas na yul lo //
analyzed: yul dang ldan par gsol ba gdab pas na yul lo //
translated: Since it is the supplication endowed with the object, it is the object.

original: de nyid gsungs pa sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: That itself is stated by the buddhas and so forth.

original: mtshan dang dpe byad dang ldan pa'i sku 'chang bas na sangs rgyas sku 'dzin no //
analyzed: mtshan dang dpe byad dang ldan pa'i sku 'chang bas na sangs rgyas sku 'dzin no //
translated: Since he holds the body endowed with the major and minor marks, he is the Buddha holding the body.

original: de nyid rig ma dang ldan pas na dpal ldan no //
analyzed: de nyid rig ma dang ldan pas na dpal ldan no //
translated: Since he is endowed with the knowledge of reality, he is glorious.

original: rdo rje gsum ni don dam pa dang kun rdzob gang du phyed pa'i phyir na de skad do //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum ni don dam pa dang kun rdzob gang du phyed pa'i phyir na de skad do //
translated: Since he is the one who has divided the three vajras into ultimate and conventional, he is the one who has divided the three vajras.

original: ding bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
analyzed: ding bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
translated: Having blessed yourself,

original: zhes pa ni de rig dag bsgoms pa khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs la bdag rdo rje sku dang ldan par mdzod ces rang gis bsgoms pa la @60b gsol ba gdab pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de rig dag bsgoms pa khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs la bdag rdo rje sku dang ldan par mdzod ces rang gis bsgoms pa la @60b gsol ba gdab pa'o //
translated: you should visualize yourself as having the vajra body.

original: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
analyzed: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
translated: The buddhas dwelling in the ten directions

original: zhes pa ni de rnams kyi spyi bo na gnas pa zhes so /
analyzed: zhes pa ni de rnams kyi spyi bo na gnas pa zhes so /
translated: are those dwelling in the head of the buddhas.

original: des de ring bdag rdo rje sku can du mdzod cig ces lhun gyis grub pa la mtshan ma'i sku rdo rje la gsol ba gdab pa'o //
analyzed: des de ring bdag rdo rje sku can du mdzod cig ces lhun gyis grub pa la mtshan ma'i sku rdo rje la gsol ba gdab pa'o //
translated: Today, you should make me have the vajra body.

original: des zhugs par gyur nas byin gyis brlab po zhes spyar ro //
analyzed: des zhugs par gyur nas byin gyis brlab po zhes spyar ro //
translated: Having entered that, he should bless himself.

original: gzhan ma rnams la yang des bsgre bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan ma rnams la yang des bsgre bar bya'o //
translated: The others should be expanded upon in the same way.

original: gsung rdo rje ni rnam pa'i mchog dang ldan pa'i sku grub par byed pas na sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: gsung rdo rje ni rnam pa'i mchog dang ldan pa'i sku grub par byed pas na sgrub pa'o //
translated: Speech-vajra is the accomplishment, because it causes the attainment of the body endowed with the supreme aspects.

original: de nyid sdom pa zhes pa la sogs pa gong ma ltar ro //
analyzed: de nyid sdom pa zhes pa la sogs pa gong ma ltar ro //
translated: That itself is the vow, etc., as above.

original: chos kyi gsung lam zhes pa ni chos gsung pa'i lam ste mgrin pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi gsung lam zhes pa ni chos gsung pa'i lam ste mgrin pa'o //
translated: The path of the speech of Dharma is the path of the speech of Dharma, which is the throat.

original: de na gnas pa'i gsung rdo rje ni gong ma ltar dpal dang ldan zhes so //
analyzed: de na gnas pa'i gsung rdo rje ni gong ma ltar dpal dang ldan zhes so //
translated: The speech-vajra that abides there is endowed with glory, as above.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku ni chen po ste grub par byed pas na sgrub pa chen po'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku ni chen po ste grub par byed pas na sgrub pa chen po'o //
translated: The great body of all the buddhas is the great accomplishment, because it causes the attainment of the great body.

original: de nyid sdom pa zhes pa la sogs pa gong ma ltar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de nyid sdom pa zhes pa la sogs pa gong ma ltar sbyar ro //
translated: That itself is the vow, etc., as above.

original: tshigs su bcad pa gsum po 'di las bla ma chen pos gnyis gnyis pa gsum gsungs pa ni dgongs pas bsgyur ba'o //
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa gsum po 'di las bla ma chen pos gnyis gnyis pa gsum gsungs pa ni dgongs pas bsgyur ba'o //
translated: In these three verses, the great master has stated three pairs of two verses each, which are to be applied by the intention.

original: de bas na gcig ni sbyor shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na gcig ni sbyor shes par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should understand the application of one.

original: de ltar bskul bas thugs dam bcas pa las nyams pa'i bsnyengs pas sgrub pa po la byin gyis rlob po zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar bskul bas thugs dam bcas pa las nyams pa'i bsnyengs pas sgrub pa po la byin gyis rlob po zhes gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, since he is urged in this way, he is afraid of violating his vow, and so he blesses the practitioner.

original: sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: This is stated in the verse beginning with “buddha.”

original: sangs rgyas zhes pa ni sku rdo rje'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes pa ni sku rdo rje'o //
translated: “ Buddha” is the Vajra Body.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' 'am zhes pa ni thugs rdo rje'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' 'am zhes pa ni thugs rdo rje'o //
translated: “ Vajrasattva” is the Vajra Mind.

original: yang na chos kyi sems dpa' zhes pa ni gsung rdo rje'o //
analyzed: yang na chos kyi sems dpa' zhes pa ni gsung rdo rje'o //
translated: Or else, “Dharmasattva” is the Vajra Speech.

original: rmongs pa ni gnyis kyi rnam pa'o //
analyzed: rmongs pa ni gnyis kyi rnam pa'o //
translated: “ Delusion” is the form of the two.

original: le'u bcu pa'i drag shul bsgrub pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di sbyar bar tshig 'dis mngon no //
analyzed: le'u bcu pa'i drag shul bsgrub pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di sbyar bar tshig 'dis mngon no //
translated: This verse is applied to the accomplishment of wrath in the tenth chapter.

original: rdo rje sbyor ba ni rang gi lha'i sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sbyor ba ni rang gi lha'i sbyor ba'o //
translated: “ Vajra union” is one’s deity union.

original: mi 'da' bas na dam tshig ste /
analyzed: mi 'da' bas na dam tshig ste /
translated: “ Commitment” is not transgressing.

original: des mi snang ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub thob par byed pas na sgrub pa'i mchog ste /🔽de ston par byed pa'i gzhung ni le'u bcu gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: des mi snang ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub thob par byed pas na sgrub pa'i mchog ste / de ston par byed pa'i gzhung ni le'u bcu gnyis pa'o //
translated: “ Supreme accomplishment” is the attainment of the powers of invisibility, etc.🔽The text that teaches this is the twelfth chapter.

original: le'u bcu gnyis pa'i 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: le'u bcu gnyis pa'i 'grel pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary on the twelfth chapter.

original: // / da ni le'u bcu gsum pa las gsang sngags bzlas brjod kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: // / da ni le'u bcu gsum pa las gsang sngags bzlas brjod kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the characteristics of mantra recitation in the thirteenth chapter,

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: it begins with “Then” and so forth.

original: ji lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhe na /🔽ye shes rdo rje mchog 'dzin dang // zhes te me long lta bu la sogs pa @61a * //
analyzed: ji lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhe na / ye shes rdo rje mchog 'dzin dang // zhes te me long lta bu la sogs pa @61a * //
translated: What kind of all tathāgatas?🔽Holding the supreme vajra of gnosis,

original: nyid rdo rje mchog ste rdo rje 'chang mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: nyid rdo rje mchog ste rdo rje 'chang mdzad pa'o //
translated: the mirror-like and so forth are the supreme vajra, the vajra-holding.

original: don kun ni mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa'o //
analyzed: don kun ni mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa'o //
translated: All objects are the higher and higher and the definite goodness.

original: de 'gro ba'i rgyud la rdzogs par byas nas longs spyod par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'o //
analyzed: de 'gro ba'i rgyud la rdzogs par byas nas longs spyod par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'o //
translated: Having perfected those in the continuum of beings, the enjoyer is the bodhisattva.

original: sgyu ma lta bur thugs su chud pas ni blo ldan no //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bur thugs su chud pas ni blo ldan no //
translated: Understanding as illusion-like is the wise one.

original: nyon mongs bas non pa'i lus ngag gi las mi byed pas na thub pa'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs bas non pa'i lus ngag gi las mi byed pas na thub pa'o //
translated: Not performing the actions of body and speech oppressed by afflictions, he is the sage.

original: 'gro ba'i dgos par sems sba skong bas na don kun no //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i dgos par sems sba skong bas na don kun no //
translated: Fulfilling the needs of beings is all objects.

original: drug sde la sogs pa lta bu ma yin pas na ston pa'i mchog go //
analyzed: drug sde la sogs pa lta bu ma yin pas na ston pa'i mchog go //
translated: Not like the group of six and so forth, he is the supreme teacher.

original: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rdo rje gsum las mi 'da' bas na dam tshig go //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rdo rje gsum las mi 'da' bas na dam tshig go //
translated: Since the nature of all phenomena is not beyond the three vajras, it is the commitment.

original: mos pa la sogs pa lta bu ma yin pas na yang dag mkhyen pa'o //
analyzed: mos pa la sogs pa lta bu ma yin pas na yang dag mkhyen pa'o //
translated: Since it is not like devotion and so forth, it is the perfect knowledge.

original: rdo rje lta bu dang ldan pa'i dbyangs ni rdo rje'i dbyangs so //
analyzed: rdo rje lta bu dang ldan pa'i dbyangs ni rdo rje'i dbyangs so //
translated: The vajra melody is the melody endowed with the vajra.

original: de gang zhe na /
analyzed: de gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: ae ma'o zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ae ma'o zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is the “Amazing!” and so forth.

original: byang chub chen po zhes pa ni 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas gnyis su med pa'i ye shes nam mkha' ltar dag pa'i tshul de las /
analyzed: byang chub chen po zhes pa ni 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas gnyis su med pa'i ye shes nam mkha' ltar dag pa'i tshul de las /
translated: The great enlightenment is the space-like purity of the nondual pristine consciousness of the compounded and uncompounded.

original: thabs kyi zhags pa kun 'byung ba //
analyzed: thabs kyi zhags pa kun 'byung ba //
translated: From that, the “noose of the method” arises.

original: zhes so // sangs rgyas zhes pa ni rnam pa'i mchog thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i sku ni tshul te yongs su dag pa rnams la rtag tu snang bas na bzang po'o //
analyzed: zhes so // sangs rgyas zhes pa ni rnam pa'i mchog thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i sku ni tshul te yongs su dag pa rnams la rtag tu snang bas na bzang po'o //
translated: The buddha is the body adorned with all the supreme aspects. The way is the pure ones, since it always appears.

original: chos zhes pa ni lung dang rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid can ni tshul te /
analyzed: chos zhes pa ni lung dang rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid can ni tshul te /
translated: The Dharma is the way characterized by the scriptures and realizations.

original: 'khor rnam pa gnyis kyi 'gyod pa mi bskyod pas na shis pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor rnam pa gnyis kyi 'gyod pa mi bskyod pas na shis pa'o //
translated: Since it is the auspiciousness of the two retinues, it is the auspiciousness.

original: sngags zhes pa ni rang bzhin shes shing 'gro ba skyob pa ste /
analyzed: sngags zhes pa ni rang bzhin shes shing 'gro ba skyob pa ste /
translated: The mantra is the knowledge of the nature and the protection of beings.

original: gang gi srid pa ji srid kyi bar du 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa de ni tshul te rgyun mi 'chad pas na brtan pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi srid pa ji srid kyi bar du 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa de ni tshul te rgyun mi 'chad pas na brtan pa'o //
translated: The way is that which acts for the sake of beings for as long as there is existence, and it is firm because it is uninterrupted.🔽The dharmas are unborn, etc.

original: ma skyes pa'i chos rnams ni zhes pa ste brda la sogs pa rang bzhin gyis bral ba ni chos rnams te /
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i chos rnams ni zhes pa ste brda la sogs pa rang bzhin gyis bral ba ni chos rnams te /
translated: The dharmas are the natural separation from symbols, etc.

original: des na de rnams ngo bo nyid kyis khyad par can no //
analyzed: des na de rnams ngo bo nyid kyis khyad par can no //
translated: Therefore, they are essentially special.

original: chad pa dgag pa'i phyir /🔽ma skyes rnam par mi rtog las //
analyzed: chad pa dgag pa'i phyir / ma skyes rnam par mi rtog las //
translated: In order to refute nihilism,🔽it is said that the unborn is nonconceptual.

original: zhes te yul ma skyes shing de la ye shes rnam par rtog pa med pa 'byung ste /
analyzed: zhes te yul ma skyes shing de la ye shes rnam par rtog pa med pa 'byung ste /
translated: The object is unborn, and the wisdom that is free from conceptualization arises from that.

original: de la smon lam la sogs pa'i dbang gis ye shes kyi phyag rgya 'byung bar bshad ces so //
analyzed: de la smon lam la sogs pa'i dbang gis ye shes kyi phyag rgya 'byung bar bshad ces so //
translated: It is explained that the wisdom seal arises by the power of aspiration, etc.

original: sngags thams cad ces pa ni lha thams cad de de'i snying po bsdus pa'i mchog ni /🔽rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
analyzed: sngags thams cad ces pa ni lha thams cad de de'i snying po bsdus pa'i mchog ni / rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
translated: All mantras are all deities, and the supreme essence of those is🔽the meditation on the three indivisible vajras.

original: zhes te rdo rje gsum gyi bzlas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes te rdo rje gsum gyi bzlas pa'o //
translated: It is the repetition of the three vajras.

original: rdo rje bzlas pas zhes pa ni dbyer med pa'i bzlas pa ste ye @61b shes sems dpa'i bzlas pas na ye shes mchog ces pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bzlas pas zhes pa ni dbyer med pa'i bzlas pa ste ye @61b shes sems dpa'i bzlas pas na ye shes mchog ces pa'o //
translated: The vajra repetition is the repetition of the indivisible, and since it is the repetition of the knowledge being, it is the supreme knowledge.

original: des ci byed ce na /
analyzed: des ci byed ce na /
translated: What does it do?

original: rdo rje gsum gyi bzlas pas ni mi phyed sku gsum dkyil 'khor 'thob par byed la /
analyzed: rdo rje gsum gyi bzlas pas ni mi phyed sku gsum dkyil 'khor 'thob par byed la /
translated: The repetition of the three vajras causes the attainment of the mandala of the three indivisible bodies.

original: ye shes sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bdag med pa thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir bshad du gsol zhes sbyar ro//
analyzed: ye shes sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bdag med pa thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir bshad du gsol zhes sbyar ro//
translated: Since the knowledge being causes the attainment of the Buddha's knowledge of selflessness, it is said, Please explain.

original: rdo rje bzlas pa zhes pa ni ldang ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bzlas pa zhes pa ni ldang ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The vajra repetition is the arising, etc.

original: de nyid aom la sogs par sbyar bas na sbyor ba yis zhes so //
analyzed: de nyid aom la sogs par sbyar bas na sbyor ba yis zhes so //
translated: Since it is applied to the om, etc. , it is the application.

original: des ci byed ce na /
analyzed: des ci byed ce na /
translated: What does it do?

original: sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o zhes so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o zhes so //
translated: It is the blessing of all the Buddhas.

original: rig dang zhes pa ni spyan ma la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rig dang zhes pa ni spyan ma la sogs pa'o //
translated: The knowledge is Locanā, etc.

original: sngags rnams ni rtag pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sngags rnams ni rtag pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The mantras are the constant, etc.

original: thams cad kyi bsdus pa ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad kyi bsdus pa ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'o //
translated: The collection of all is Yamāntaka, etc.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis mtshan //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis mtshan //
translated: The sign of body, speech, and mind is the three syllables.

original: zhes pa ni de rnams bzlas pa'i gzhi rnam par dgod pa zhus pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de rnams bzlas pa'i gzhi rnam par dgod pa zhus pa'o //
translated: This is the request to set forth the basis of those recitations.

original: sngags zlos sbyor ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sngags zlos sbyor ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The application of mantra recitation, and so on.

original: zhes pa ni phyi rol dang nang gi bzlas pa'i sbyor ba 'og nas 'byung ba rnams so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni phyi rol dang nang gi bzlas pa'i sbyor ba 'og nas 'byung ba rnams so //
translated: This is the application of outer and inner recitation that will be explained below.

original: de ye shes rgya mtsho dang 'dra ba khyed kyis ji ltar gsan pa dang gzhan yang 'das pa'i ye shes can gyi byed pa yin pas bshad par gsol pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ye shes rgya mtsho dang 'dra ba khyed kyis ji ltar gsan pa dang gzhan yang 'das pa'i ye shes can gyi byed pa yin pas bshad par gsol pa gsungs pa /
translated: Since that wisdom is like an ocean, you have heard it, and also it is the activity of the wise of the past, therefore, please explain.

original: sku gsung thugs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The body, speech, and mind, and so on.

original: rdo rje sngags zhes pa ni rdo rje lta bu'i bzlas pa bla ma dang lha la yid ches par rab tu bsgoms pas ye shes bla na med pa thob par 'gyur zhes te rnal 'byor gyi rim pa bzhin du zhes so //
analyzed: rdo rje sngags zhes pa ni rdo rje lta bu'i bzlas pa bla ma dang lha la yid ches par rab tu bsgoms pas ye shes bla na med pa thob par 'gyur zhes te rnal 'byor gyi rim pa bzhin du zhes so //
translated: The vajra mantra is the vajra-like recitation, which is the meditation on the guru and the deity with confidence, whereby one attains unsurpassed wisdom.

original: de lta bu'i bzlas pa de bshad du gsol zhes zhus pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i bzlas pa de bshad du gsol zhes zhus pa'o //
translated: Please explain that kind of recitation.

original: da ni de'i lan gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni de'i lan gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the reply is given.

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then, and so on.

original: rdo rje ye shes zhes pa ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes nam mkha' lta bu las byung ba'i phyir rdo rje las byung ba zhes so //
analyzed: rdo rje ye shes zhes pa ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes nam mkha' lta bu las byung ba'i phyir rdo rje las byung ba zhes so //
translated: The “vajra intuition” is the vajra-born, because it arises from the space-like nondual intuition.

original: 'gro ba'i dgos pa rdzogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i dgos pa rdzogs par byed pa'o //
translated: It fulfills the needs of the world.

original: gong ma ltar bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: gong ma ltar bskyed pa'o //
translated: It is generated as above.

original: rigs rnams kyi bdag po bas na dam tshig pa'i gtsos so //
analyzed: rigs rnams kyi bdag po bas na dam tshig pa'i gtsos so //
translated: It is the chief of the pledge beings, because it is the lord of the families.

original: des gsungs so zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: des gsungs so zhes sbyar ro //
translated: It is said by him.

original: thun mong gi bzlas pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: thun mong gi bzlas pa gsungs pa /
translated: The common recitation is stated

original: sngags kyi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: with “mantra” and so on.

original: sngags ni lha rnams te de'i don du kun bzlas pa ni rdo rje mi phyed gsum ste /
analyzed: sngags ni lha rnams te de'i don du kun bzlas pa ni rdo rje mi phyed gsum ste /
translated: The mantra is the deities, and the recitation for their sake is the three vajras,

original: sku rdo rje la sogs pa gsum gyi mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: sku rdo rje la sogs pa gsum gyi mtshan nyid de /
translated: which have the nature of the three vajras of body and so on.

original: de nyid dbye ba gsum ste /
analyzed: de nyid dbye ba gsum ste /
translated: That itself is threefold,

original: de'i bsgom pa mthar phyin par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i bsgom pa mthar phyin par bya'o //
translated: and one should perfect the meditation on it.

original: de nyid gnas @62a * //
analyzed: de nyid gnas @62a * //
translated: That itself is arranged in the places,

original: rnams su bkod bas na de skad bya ste rdo rje gsum zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rnams su bkod bas na de skad bya ste rdo rje gsum zhes bya'o //
translated: and so it is called the “three vajras.”

original: de ltar bkod nas ci byed ce na /
analyzed: de ltar bkod nas ci byed ce na /
translated: Having arranged it in that way, what does one do?

original: sku gsung zhes pa la sogs pas rim gyis bzlas pa gsungs so //
analyzed: sku gsung zhes pa la sogs pas rim gyis bzlas pa gsungs so //
translated: The verse beginning with “body, speech” and so on teaches the recitation in stages.

original: spros pa rnam gsum dag bya zhes pa ni aom la sogs pa brjod pa'i skad cig de kho na la rang rang gi sa bon las sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i 'khor lo spro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: spros pa rnam gsum dag bya zhes pa ni aom la sogs pa brjod pa'i skad cig de kho na la rang rang gi sa bon las sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i 'khor lo spro zhes pa'o //
translated: “ The three elaborations are to be purified” means that in the very moment of uttering “oṃ” and so on, one emanates the wheel of Vajra Body and so on from one’s own seed.

original: de lta bu'i rdo rje gsum gyi bzlas pa 'di yis rdo rje gsum dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro zhes phan yon no //
analyzed: de lta bu'i rdo rje gsum gyi bzlas pa 'di yis rdo rje gsum dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro zhes phan yon no //
translated: By this recitation of the three vajras, one becomes like the three vajras. This is the benefit.

original: de'i dus su mchod pa spro ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i dus su mchod pa spro ba gsungs pa /
translated: At that time, the emanation of offerings is taught:

original: sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “The buddhas” and so on.

original: sangs rgyas rnams ni lha rnams so//
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams ni lha rnams so//
translated: The buddhas are the deities.

original: de'i sku gsung thugs rim gyis spros pa'o //
analyzed: de'i sku gsung thugs rim gyis spros pa'o //
translated: Their body, speech, and mind are emanated in stages.

original: bsgoms nas zhes pa ni gzhan dang gzhan gyi gzugs lhag par mos pas longs spyod dang ldan par byas pa'o //
analyzed: bsgoms nas zhes pa ni gzhan dang gzhan gyi gzugs lhag par mos pas longs spyod dang ldan par byas pa'o //
translated: “ Having meditated” means that one should enjoy them by visualizing their other forms.

original: mchod pa'i mchog brtag pa zhes pa ni lha mo'i padma na gnas pa'i sa bon las skad cig ma gnyis pa las /
analyzed: mchod pa'i mchog brtag pa zhes pa ni lha mo'i padma na gnas pa'i sa bon las skad cig ma gnyis pa las /
translated: “ The supreme offering” is the examination of the seed in the lotus of the goddess in the second moment.

original: 'od zer ba spu las byung ba'i rtse las skyes pa'i lha mo'i nang du chud pa'i shugs kyis mchog gi bde ba'i dbang du gyur par bya'o //
analyzed: 'od zer ba spu las byung ba'i rtse las skyes pa'i lha mo'i nang du chud pa'i shugs kyis mchog gi bde ba'i dbang du gyur par bya'o //
translated: The force of the goddesses generated at the tips of the light rays that arise from the pores should be brought under the power of supreme bliss.

original: ye shes rdo rje zhes pa ni rang gi sems dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lor snang ba la sogs par snang ba ma gtogs pa phyi rol gyi gzugs med par shes par byas nas ni zhes so //
analyzed: ye shes rdo rje zhes pa ni rang gi sems dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lor snang ba la sogs par snang ba ma gtogs pa phyi rol gyi gzugs med par shes par byas nas ni zhes so //
translated: Having understood that there is no external form apart from the appearance of one's mind as the mandala circle, etc., one should meditate on the vajra wisdom.

original: ni zhes pa ni skad cig gi mthar rang gi sa bon la 'jug par yang bstan to //
analyzed: ni zhes pa ni skad cig gi mthar rang gi sa bon la 'jug par yang bstan to //
translated: The word also indicates that at the end of the instant, one should enter into one's own seed.

original: da las dang po pa la sogs pa gong nas gong du gnas skabs kyi khyad par thob par byed pas na rdo rje gsum gyi thugs 'dra bar 'gyur zhes so //
analyzed: da las dang po pa la sogs pa gong nas gong du gnas skabs kyi khyad par thob par byed pas na rdo rje gsum gyi thugs 'dra bar 'gyur zhes so //
translated: Since one attains the special state higher and higher, beginning with the beginner, one becomes like the mind of the three vajras.

original: de kho nas rab kyi mthar phyin par byed pa yin par yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: de kho nas rab kyi mthar phyin par byed pa yin par yang gsungs pa /
translated: It is also said that this very [practice] brings one to the perfection of the highest:

original: sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The buddhas, etc.

original: byang chub mchog ni phyag rgya chen po ste 'di la goms pa med pas na 'di la thob pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub mchog ni phyag rgya chen po ste 'di la goms pa med pas na 'di la thob pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The supreme enlightenment is the Great Seal, and since there is no cultivation in this, it is called “attainment.”

original: de la cig car du bzlas pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de la cig car du bzlas pa gsungs pa /
translated: The recitation in one moment is stated:

original: yang na zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: yang na zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Or, in one moment, the three vajras,🔽the three divisions, are recited.

original: dbye ba rnam pa gsum zhes pa ni rdo rje gsum la'o //
analyzed: dbye ba rnam pa gsum zhes pa ni rdo rje gsum la'o //
translated: The three divisions are the three vajras.

original: so so dag tu spro bsdu zhes pa ni yi ge re re brjod pa'i skad cig la gzhan rnams la yang rnam par spro ba gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: so so dag tu spro bsdu zhes pa ni yi ge re re brjod pa'i skad cig la gzhan rnams la yang rnam par spro ba gang yin pa ste /
translated: The emanation and withdrawal in each are the emanation in each moment of the utterance of each syllable.

original: gzhan gong ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gong ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
translated: The rest is to be understood as above.

original: ye shes sems dpa'i bzlas pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa'i bzlas pa gsungs pa /
translated: The recitation of the gnosis being is stated:

original: lus dang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lus dang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The body, speech, and mind of the gnosis being🔽are the three vajras, and the recitation is the utterance of the three syllables.

original: lus @62b dang ngag sems bdag med par //
analyzed: lus @62b dang ngag sems bdag med par //
translated: The body, speech, and mind are selfless

original: zhes pa ni lus la sogs pa bdag med pa'i tshul can ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te de'i 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni lus la sogs pa bdag med pa'i tshul can ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te de'i 'khor lo'o //
translated: means that the bodies, etc., are the way of selflessness, and the wheels of those are the three vajras.

original: shes pa'i sems kyis rab tu spro //
analyzed: shes pa'i sems kyis rab tu spro //
translated: The mind of gnosis is fully emanated.

original: zhes pa ni ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon las phyogs gnyis pa ltar gzhan dang gzhan gyi gzugs kyis spro bar bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon las phyogs gnyis pa ltar gzhan dang gzhan gyi gzugs kyis spro bar bya ba ste /
translated: This is the second alternative, the emanation in the form of others from the seed of the Knowledge Beings.

original: gzhan gong ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //🔽gang gi dbang du bya zhe na brjod nas zhes te sngags brjod la reg pa'i dus su rdo rje ste lha rnams rab tu spro bar byas la mchod pas mnyes pa'i lha rnams rdzogs nas zhes te /
analyzed: gzhan gong ma bzhin du shes par bya'o // gang gi dbang du bya zhe na brjod nas zhes te sngags brjod la reg pa'i dus su rdo rje ste lha rnams rab tu spro bar byas la mchod pas mnyes pa'i lha rnams rdzogs nas zhes te /
translated: The rest is to be understood as above.🔽In whose regard? In the regard of the mantra, when the mantra is uttered, the vajra, i.e., the deities, are emanated.

original: dbugs nang du 'jug pa'i mthar rab tu bsdu bar bya'o zhes so//
analyzed: dbugs nang du 'jug pa'i mthar rab tu bsdu bar bya'o zhes so//
translated: When the deities are satisfied by the offerings, they are to be fully reabsorbed at the end of the inhalation.

original: de ltar sku gsum dang rdo rje'i bzlas pa 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi ye shes kyis ni spyan phye ba'o zhes te de 'byed par nus pas de skyed do //
analyzed: de ltar sku gsum dang rdo rje'i bzlas pa 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi ye shes kyis ni spyan phye ba'o zhes te de 'byed par nus pas de skyed do //
translated: Thus, this three-body vajra recitation is the opening of the eyes of the knowledge of all the Buddhas, i.e., it generates that knowledge because it is capable of opening it.

original: lha thams cad bzlas brjod de ltar bya'o zhes thun mong du bshad nas /
analyzed: lha thams cad bzlas brjod de ltar bya'o zhes thun mong du bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the recitation of all the deities in this way, in common,

original: da ni sku la sogs pa'i de kho na nyid kyi sgo nas bzlas pa 'byung ba'i rgyu gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni sku la sogs pa'i de kho na nyid kyi sgo nas bzlas pa 'byung ba'i rgyu gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the cause of the recitation through the reality of the body, and so on, is stated.🔽

original: sku'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sku'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Now, the cause of the recitation in terms of the reality of the body, etc. is stated.

original: sku mchog rdo rje zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: sku mchog rdo rje zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: The supreme body vajra is Vairochana.

original: de'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni dngos dang zhes te 'byung ba la sogs pa'i gzugs so //🔽de brtags pa'i bdag nyid du mi skye bar ye shes su snang ba la dngos min zhes bya ste de ltar rnam par dpyad pa ni /
analyzed: de'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni dngos dang zhes te 'byung ba la sogs pa'i gzugs so // de brtags pa'i bdag nyid du mi skye bar ye shes su snang ba la dngos min zhes bya ste de ltar rnam par dpyad pa ni /
translated: His manifest complete enlightenment is the “real” and so forth, that is, the elements such as form.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rdo rje zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rdo rje zhes bya'o //
translated: The non-arising of that in the nature of an imputation is the appearance as intuition, the “unreal.” The analysis of that is called “the body vajra of all the Buddhas.”

original: de lta bu yod na bzlas pa 'byung ba'i phyir sku'i bzlas pa bshad ces so //
analyzed: de lta bu yod na bzlas pa 'byung ba'i phyir sku'i bzlas pa bshad ces so //
translated: Since there is such a thing, the recitation occurs. Therefore, it is said that the body recitation is explained.

original: gsung gi bzlas pa gsungs pa /🔽gsung gi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gsung gi bzlas pa gsungs pa / gsung gi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The speech recitation is stated.

original: gsung gi dam tshig ni snang ba mtha' yas so //
analyzed: gsung gi dam tshig ni snang ba mtha' yas so //
translated: The speech commitment is Amitābha.

original: de'i rdzogs par byang chub pa ni sgra rnams ye shes su yongs su snang ba'i bdag nyid la sgra min zhes rnam par dpyad pa ni gong ma ltar gsung gi bzlas pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rdzogs par byang chub pa ni sgra rnams ye shes su yongs su snang ba'i bdag nyid la sgra min zhes rnam par dpyad pa ni gong ma ltar gsung gi bzlas pa'o //
translated: His perfect enlightenment is the nature of the complete appearance of sounds as intuition, and the analysis “not sound” is the mantra repetition of speech as before.

original: thugs kyi bzlas pa gsungs pa /🔽thugs ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: thugs kyi bzlas pa gsungs pa / thugs ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The mantra repetition of mind is stated:

original: thugs kyi dam tshig ni mi bskyod pa'o//
analyzed: thugs kyi dam tshig ni mi bskyod pa'o//
translated: “The mind is the commitment of Akṣhobhya.

original: de'i rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems ni nang na yang mi gnas phyi rol na yang mi gnas //
analyzed: de'i rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems ni nang na yang mi gnas phyi rol na yang mi gnas //
translated: His perfect enlightenment mind does not dwell internally, does not dwell externally,

original: gnyi ga'i bar na yang mi gnas pa ni gnas pa'i rdo rje ste mnyam pa nyid du rnam par bshad pa ni gong ma ltar sems kyi bzlas pa'o //
analyzed: gnyi ga'i bar na yang mi gnas pa ni gnas pa'i rdo rje ste mnyam pa nyid du rnam par bshad pa ni gong ma ltar sems kyi bzlas pa'o //
translated: and does not dwell in between those two, and the vajra of that non-dwelling is explained as equality, and the mantra repetition of mind is as before.

original: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi bzlas pa gsungs pa /🔽don zhes pa la @63a * //
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi bzlas pa gsungs pa / don zhes pa la @63a * //
translated: The mantra repetition of Ratnasaṃbhava is stated:

original: sogs pa'o // don zhes pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: sogs pa'o // don zhes pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
translated: “The meaning is the intuition of equality.

original: de rtogs pa'i ni rin chen dbang phyug ste de'i bzlas pa ni ngo bo med pa'o //
analyzed: de rtogs pa'i ni rin chen dbang phyug ste de'i bzlas pa ni ngo bo med pa'o //
translated: The realization of that is Ratnasaṃbhava, and his mantra repetition is essenceless.

original: de ni sbyor ba thams cad las bzang po dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la rnam par brtags ba ni gong ma ltar rin chen bzlas pa'o//
analyzed: de ni sbyor ba thams cad las bzang po dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la rnam par brtags ba ni gong ma ltar rin chen bzlas pa'o//
translated: That is the best of all practices. The recitation of the jewel, as above, is the examination of the buddhas of the three times.

original: don yod bzlas pa gsungs pa /🔽sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: don yod bzlas pa gsungs pa / sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The recitation of the meaningful is stated:🔽The recitation of the meaningful is stated: The buddhas, etc.

original: sangs rgyas zhing rnams zhes pa ni gdul bya yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhing rnams zhes pa ni gdul bya yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du'o //
translated: The buddha-fields are all the worlds in which there are those to be trained.

original: bya ba la nan tan gyi ye shes kyis 'gro ba'i don rdzogs par byed pa'i sku'i sprin spro ba dang spro ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
analyzed: bya ba la nan tan gyi ye shes kyis 'gro ba'i don rdzogs par byed pa'i sku'i sprin spro ba dang spro ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
translated: Not only does the cloud of bodies that emanate and emanate again in order to perfect the welfare of beings through the gnosis of earnest practice in deeds,

original: de nyid bdag gi rang bzhin du bsdu ba'i phyir bzhud cing byon pa'i rdo rje'i bdag ces so //
analyzed: de nyid bdag gi rang bzhin du bsdu ba'i phyir bzhud cing byon pa'i rdo rje'i bdag ces so //
translated: return and come in order to gather that into one's own nature, as the vajra-self.

original: de ni thogs med bzlas pa'o //🔽khro bo'i bzlas pa gsungs pa /🔽khro bo zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ni thogs med bzlas pa'o // khro bo'i bzlas pa gsungs pa / khro bo zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: That is the unobstructed recitation.🔽The recitation of the wrathful is stated:🔽The recitation of the wrathful is stated: The wrathful pledge gnosis, etc.

original: khro bo dam tshig ye shes zhes pa ni mngon spyod la sogs pa'i las rnams so //
analyzed: khro bo dam tshig ye shes zhes pa ni mngon spyod la sogs pa'i las rnams so //
translated: The wrathful pledge gnosis is the activities of killing, etc.

original: rang gi rdo rje dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gcig pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rang gi rdo rje dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gcig pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The one's own vajra maṇḍala means the one maṇḍala.

original: sngags kyi yi ge sgra bsgrags pa //
analyzed: sngags kyi yi ge sgra bsgrags pa //
translated: The mantra syllables are proclaimed.

original: zhes pa khro bo bsgoms nas bzlas pas sngags kyi sgra gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la sogs pas thos par sgrogs pa ni khro bo'i bzlas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa khro bo bsgoms nas bzlas pas sngags kyi sgra gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la sogs pas thos par sgrogs pa ni khro bo'i bzlas pa'o //
translated: Having meditated on the wrathful one, the mantra sound is proclaimed by the transmission of the mantra sound from one to another, and so on. The recitation of the wrathful one is as follows.

original: nyon mongs pa gsum gyi bzlas pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa gsum gyi bzlas pa gsungs pa /
translated: The recitation of the three afflictions is stated.

original: 'dod pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //🔽'dod pa'i don gyis myos 'gyur ba //
analyzed: 'dod pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o // 'dod pa'i don gyis myos 'gyur ba //
translated: Desire and so on.🔽Those who are intoxicated by the object of desire

original: zhes pa nyon mongs pa'i 'dod pas myos par 'gyur ba rnams so //🔽kun du skyob cing phan par dga' //
analyzed: zhes pa nyon mongs pa'i 'dod pas myos par 'gyur ba rnams so // kun du skyob cing phan par dga' //
translated: means those who are intoxicated by the desire of affliction.🔽Those who delight in protecting and benefiting all

original: zhes pa ni de thams cad skyob pa'i don du phan pa tshol bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de thams cad skyob pa'i don du phan pa tshol bar byed pa'o //
translated: means those who seek the benefit for the purpose of protecting all of them.

original: sems can gti mug gnas la gzhag / ces pa ni gti mug rnam par dag pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bo las spro zhing 'jog la sdud pa ni gti mug rnam par dag pa'i bzlas pa'o zhes so //
analyzed: sems can gti mug gnas la gzhag / ces pa ni gti mug rnam par dag pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bo las spro zhing 'jog la sdud pa ni gti mug rnam par dag pa'i bzlas pa'o zhes so //
translated: The line placing sentient beings in the abode of delusion means that one emanates and places [the mantra letters] from the nature of Vairocana, who is the purity of delusion. The recitation is the purity of delusion.

original: 'dod chags nyid rnam par dag pas na rdo rje'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags nyid rnam par dag pas na rdo rje'o //
translated: Since desire itself is pure, it is a vajra.

original: de las byung ba ni sngags kyi bdag nyid can gyi dam tshig ste /
analyzed: de las byung ba ni sngags kyi bdag nyid can gyi dam tshig ste /
translated: The pledge that arises from that is the nature of the mantra.

original: de nyid lus la sogs pa'i lha'i tshul gyis yang dag par gnas nas spro bar bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: de nyid lus la sogs pa'i lha'i tshul gyis yang dag par gnas nas spro bar bya'o zhes so //
translated: Having truly abided in the form of the deity of the body, and so on, one should emanate.

original: sems can 'dod chags rgya mtshor gzhag / ces pa ni 'dod chags rnam par dag pa'i 'od dpag med kyi ngo bo las spro zhing 'jog la sdud pa ni 'dod chags rnam par dag pa'i @63b bzlas pa'o //
analyzed: sems can 'dod chags rgya mtshor gzhag / ces pa ni 'dod chags rnam par dag pa'i 'od dpag med kyi ngo bo las spro zhing 'jog la sdud pa ni 'dod chags rnam par dag pa'i @63b bzlas pa'o //
translated: The line placing sentient beings in the ocean of desire means that one emanates and places [the mantra letters] from the nature of Amitābha, who is the purity of desire. The recitation is the purity of desire.

original: zhe sdang nyid rnam par dag pas na rdo rje ste /
analyzed: zhe sdang nyid rnam par dag pas na rdo rje ste /
translated: Since hatred itself is pure, it is a vajra.🔽

original: de las byung ba'i sems lus la sogs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par gnas pa'i tshul gyis bsgom par bya'o zhes khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: de las byung ba'i sems lus la sogs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par gnas pa'i tshul gyis bsgom par bya'o zhes khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that one should meditate on the mind that arises from that, in the manner of abiding in the body, and so forth.

original: zhe sdang gnas zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhe sdang gnas zhes pa ni /
translated: The abode of hatred is

original: zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'i mi bskyod pa las spro zhing 'jog la sdud pa ni zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'i bzlas pa'o //
analyzed: zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'i mi bskyod pa las spro zhing 'jog la sdud pa ni zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'i bzlas pa'o //
translated: the state of Akṣobhya, who is the purification of hatred. Expanding from that, one should rest in the state of Akṣobhya, and then gather back into the heart. This is the recitation of the purification of hatred.

original: rdo rje'i bzlas pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: rdo rje'i bzlas pa gsungs pa /
translated: The vajra recitation is taught:

original: dam tshig ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “The reality of the pledge” and so forth.

original: dam tshig de nyid rdo rje gsum //
analyzed: dam tshig de nyid rdo rje gsum //
translated: The reality of the three vajras

original: zhes pa ni 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang ldang ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang ldang ba'o //
translated: is the entry, abiding, and departure.

original: dbu ma zhes pa ni 'jug pa dang ldang ba las grol ba'i ngo bo yi ge a'a'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: dbu ma zhes pa ni 'jug pa dang ldang ba las grol ba'i ngo bo yi ge a'a'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The central channel is the nature of the liberation from entry and departure, the nature of the syllable A.

original: dam tshig rdo rje can zhes pa ni de la mi 'da' ba ste /
analyzed: dam tshig rdo rje can zhes pa ni de la mi 'da' ba ste /
translated: The one with the pledge vajra is the one who does not transgress that,

original: dngos po thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do //
translated: the thatness of all things.

original: de nyid sngags rnams thams cad kyi zhes te lha thams cad kyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: de nyid sngags rnams thams cad kyi zhes te lha thams cad kyi ngo bo'o //
translated: That itself is all mantras, the nature of all deities.

original: ma ning zhes pa ni 'jug pa yang ma yin ldang ba yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin pa'i ye shes chen po'o //
analyzed: ma ning zhes pa ni 'jug pa yang ma yin ldang ba yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin pa'i ye shes chen po'o //
translated: The neuter is the great intuition which is neither entering, nor rising, nor abiding.

original: de nyid la dbyer med pas na rdo rje'i bzlas pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid la dbyer med pas na rdo rje'i bzlas pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Since it is indivisible from that, it is called the vajra recitation.

original: lha mo drug gi ngo bo gsungs pa /
analyzed: lha mo drug gi ngo bo gsungs pa /
translated: The nature of the six goddesses is stated:

original: rdo rje bdag po zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bdag po zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The vajra lord, etc.

original: rdo rje'i bdag po ni gzugs la sogs pa'i lha mo ste /
analyzed: rdo rje'i bdag po ni gzugs la sogs pa'i lha mo ste /
translated: The vajra lord is the goddesses of form, etc.

original: de'i rang bzhin gyis thar pa grub par byed pa'i phyir ro//
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin gyis thar pa grub par byed pa'i phyir ro//
translated: , because they are the nature of that, they accomplish liberation.

original: de'i ngo bo bas 'dod chags yang dag pa'i don sgom par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo bas 'dod chags yang dag pa'i don sgom par byed pa'o //
translated: Since they are the nature of that, they meditate on the reality of passion.

original: de bas na des sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa'i byang chub kyang rdzogs par mdzad do zhes so //
analyzed: de bas na des sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa'i byang chub kyang rdzogs par mdzad do zhes so //
translated: Therefore, they also perfect the enlightenment which benefits all sentient beings.

original: lha mo bzhi'i ngo bo gsungs pa rig ma zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lha mo bzhi'i ngo bo gsungs pa rig ma zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The nature of the four goddesses is stated: The knowledge woman, etc.

original: ma rig pa thams cad 'joms pa'i phyir na rig ma ste spyan ma la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa thams cad 'joms pa'i phyir na rig ma ste spyan ma la sogs pa'o //
translated: The knowledge woman is Locanā, etc., because they destroy all ignorance.

original: de'i dus rtag tu 'dod pa'i don la brtson pa'i phyir na 'dod pa'i longs spyod dag ces te gzugs la sogs pa la ji ltar bsten na 'grub ces te /
analyzed: de'i dus rtag tu 'dod pa'i don la brtson pa'i phyir na 'dod pa'i longs spyod dag ces te gzugs la sogs pa la ji ltar bsten na 'grub ces te /
translated: How is one to rely on form and so forth?

original: 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsten pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsten pa'o //
translated: One relies on nondual gnosis with a mind endowed with passion, hatred, and delusion.

original: gnas la mtshan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rang gi ngo bo gsungs pa /
analyzed: gnas la mtshan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rang gi ngo bo gsungs pa /
translated: The nature of the bodhisattva who is situated in the abode is stated:

original: gti mug ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gti mug ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Delusion is the pledge,” and so forth.

original: gti mug dam tshig ni mig la sogs pa ste bems po'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gti mug dam tshig ni mig la sogs pa ste bems po'i phyir ro //
translated: Delusion is the pledge of the eyes, and so forth, because they are inert.

original: de las byung ba ni rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje can te sa'i snying po la sogs pa ni @64a * //
analyzed: de las byung ba ni rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje can te sa'i snying po la sogs pa ni @64a * //
translated: The one who arises from that is the king of knowledge, the vajra holder, because he is the essence of the earth and so forth.

original: mig la sogs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa skye bas na de skad do //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa skye bas na de skad do //
translated: He is so called because he generates the omniscience of the eyes and so forth.

original: ma ning dag gi gnas bsgrubs na //
analyzed: ma ning dag gi gnas bsgrubs na //
translated: “Having accomplished the abode of the neuters,”

original: zhes pa ni mtha' gnyis su ma lhung ba ni ma ning ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni mtha' gnyis su ma lhung ba ni ma ning ste /
translated: means that the neuters are those who do not fall into the two extremes.

original: de'i gnas bsgrubs na dngos grub ster ro zhes so //
analyzed: de'i gnas bsgrubs na dngos grub ster ro zhes so //
translated: If one accomplishes their abode, they grant spiritual powers.

original: khro bo'i ngo bo gsungs pa /
analyzed: khro bo'i ngo bo gsungs pa /
translated: The essence of the wrathful is stated:

original: khro bo zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: khro bo zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The wrathful, etc.

original: zhe sdang gnas las skyes zhes pa ni zhe sdang gi gnas ni lus te lus khro bor bstan pa'i phyir de skad bya ste /
analyzed: zhe sdang gnas las skyes zhes pa ni zhe sdang gi gnas ni lus te lus khro bor bstan pa'i phyir de skad bya ste /
translated: Arisen from the abode of hatred means that the abode of hatred is the body, and it is so called because the body is shown to be wrathful.

original: mi bskyod pa las byung zhes pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa las byung zhes pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It does not mean arisen from Akshobhya.

original: gsod la rtag tu brtson pa dag / ces pa ni des 'dul ba'i skye bo'i bsam pa'i dbang gis rang bzhin gyi gzugs la rnam par 'pho ba ste /
analyzed: gsod la rtag tu brtson pa dag / ces pa ni des 'dul ba'i skye bo'i bsam pa'i dbang gis rang bzhin gyi gzugs la rnam par 'pho ba ste /
translated: Always striving to kill means that by the power of the attitude of the beings to be subdued, the natural form transforms,

original: sman la sogs pa bzhin du'o //
analyzed: sman la sogs pa bzhin du'o //
translated: like medicine, etc.

original: sgrub mchog gi chos can la zhes pa ni /
analyzed: sgrub mchog gi chos can la zhes pa ni /
translated: The supreme practitioner is

original: de'i sbyor ba dang cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du sngags bzlas pa la sogs pas so //
analyzed: de'i sbyor ba dang cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du sngags bzlas pa la sogs pas so //
translated: by the mantra repetition, etc. in accordance with his yoga and ritual.

original: gsod pa'i don zhes pa ni phyogs kyi cha des grub pas te pha ltar gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsod pa'i don zhes pa ni phyogs kyi cha des grub pas te pha ltar gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The meaning of killing is established by that part, because it abides like a father.

original: ye shes chen po ni me long lta bu la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes chen po ni me long lta bu la sogs pa'o //
translated: Great intuition is the mirror-like intuition, etc.

original: de las byung bas na skyes bu ste rdo rje 'chang ngo //
analyzed: de las byung bas na skyes bu ste rdo rje 'chang ngo //
translated: The person is born from that, i.e. Vajradhara.

original: da ni de la dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor bas che ba'i che ba las kyi rgyal ba mchog bsgoms pas sems dbang du 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni de la dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor bas che ba'i che ba las kyi rgyal ba mchog bsgoms pas sems dbang du 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to bring the mind under control by means of the meditation on the supreme conqueror of actions, the greatness of the great, by the yogin who has completed the maṇḍala wheel,

original: thig le'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsungs pa la /
analyzed: thig le'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsungs pa la /
translated: the samādhi of the union of the bindu is taught.

original: ye shes zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “The wheel of gnosis” and so on.

original: ye shes 'khor lo can rnams zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas 'grub pa'i rgyu'i sbyor ba'i de ma thag tu ye shes sems dpa'i 'khor lo'i thugs kar zla ba la /🔽'khor lo'i snying gi'i dbus su bsgom //
analyzed: ye shes 'khor lo can rnams zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas 'grub pa'i rgyu'i sbyor ba'i de ma thag tu ye shes sems dpa'i 'khor lo'i thugs kar zla ba la / 'khor lo'i snying gi'i dbus su bsgom //
translated: “The wheel of gnosis” is the wheel of the gnosis being.

original: zhes so// de'i lte ba /🔽gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
analyzed: zhes so// de'i lte ba / gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
translated: “In the center of the wheel of the heart” is the heart of the wheel.

original: zhes te / zla ba'i steng gi dbus su'o //
analyzed: zhes te / zla ba'i steng gi dbus su'o //
translated: “In the center of the clear maṇḍala” is in the center of the moon.

original: 'khor lo'i sngags aom mo //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i sngags aom mo //
translated: The wheel mantra is oṃ.

original: de'i don ni spros pa thams cad dang bral bas na /
analyzed: de'i don ni spros pa thams cad dang bral bas na /
translated: The meaning of that is as follows: Since it is free from all elaborations,

original: thig le gnyis kyi gzugs su bsgom //
analyzed: thig le gnyis kyi gzugs su bsgom //
translated: meditate on the form of the two bindus.

original: zhes pa'o // de yang yul can gyi dbus su chud pa ni rtag pa'i 'khor lo la gnas pa'i ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar gong ma ltar de'i sbyor ba rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yul dang ldan par bsgom par bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'o // de yang yul can gyi dbus su chud pa ni rtag pa'i 'khor lo la gnas pa'i ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar gong ma ltar de'i sbyor ba rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yul dang ldan par bsgom par bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: Also, one should meditate on the object possessor in the center, in the heart of the gnosis being abiding in the wheel of permanence, as above, in order to complete the yoga.

original: de bzhin du phyi ma rnams la yang sbyar bar bstan pa'i phyir ye shes rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so//
analyzed: de bzhin du phyi ma rnams la yang sbyar bar bstan pa'i phyir ye shes rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so//
translated: In order to show that the same is applied to the subsequent [vajras], [the Bhagavān] declares the vajra of gnosis, etc.

original: @64b ji skad du /
analyzed: @64b ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa //
translated: The union of means and insight

original: dngos po thams cad bsdus nas su //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad bsdus nas su //
translated: comprehends all things,

original: gzugs kyi nang du bsgom par bya //
analyzed: gzugs kyi nang du bsgom par bya //
translated: and one should meditate on them within form.

original: yud kyis ye shes kyis rdzogs par //
analyzed: yud kyis ye shes kyis rdzogs par //
translated: In an instant, by gnosis,

original: ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba yin //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba yin //
translated: it is called “concentration.”

original: zhes so // da ni gong du gsungs pa'i bzlas brjod gnyis kyi bye brag gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhes so // da ni gong du gsungs pa'i bzlas brjod gnyis kyi bye brag gsungs pa /
translated: Now, [the Bhagavān] declares the distinction of the two recitations mentioned above:

original: dkyil 'khor zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: the mantra wheel, etc.

original: dkyil 'khor kun zhes pa ni chung ngu la gnas pa gang yang rung pa'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor kun zhes pa ni chung ngu la gnas pa gang yang rung pa'o //
translated: “All maṇḍalas” are any of the small ones.

original: de'i ngos ni phyogs bzhi po rnams su'o //
analyzed: de'i ngos ni phyogs bzhi po rnams su'o //
translated: Its sides are the four directions.

original: sangs rgyas lnga rnams zhes pa ni mtshon pa tsam ste lha thams cad ji skad du gsungs pa'i cho gas dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas lnga rnams zhes pa ni mtshon pa tsam ste lha thams cad ji skad du gsungs pa'i cho gas dgod par bya'o //
translated: The five Buddhas are merely illustrative; all the deities should be arranged according to the rite as stated.

original: des ni 'khor lo rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas bzlas brjod bya bar bstan to //
analyzed: des ni 'khor lo rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas bzlas brjod bya bar bstan to //
translated: This teaches that the repetition should be done by the yogi who has completed the wheel.

original: ji ltar bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar bya zhe na /
translated: How should it be done?

original: 'od zer lnga'i bye brag gis //
analyzed: 'od zer lnga'i bye brag gis //
translated: By the varieties of the five lights.

original: zhes te rang rang gi sa bon 'od zer lnga dang ldan pa las bde bar gshegs pa'i 'khor lo spro zhing yi ge gsum gyi bar du chud par bzlas na byang chub thob par 'gyur zhes so //
analyzed: zhes te rang rang gi sa bon 'od zer lnga dang ldan pa las bde bar gshegs pa'i 'khor lo spro zhing yi ge gsum gyi bar du chud par bzlas na byang chub thob par 'gyur zhes so //
translated: From one's own seed endowed with the five lights, the Sugata's wheel is emanated, and when the repetition is done within the three syllables, one will attain enlightenment.

original: de'i bye brag gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i bye brag gsungs pa /
translated: The varieties of that are stated:

original: sngags rnams zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sngags rnams zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The mantras, etc.

original: bye brag gnyis ni sku gsum dang rdo rje'i bye brag go //
analyzed: bye brag gnyis ni sku gsum dang rdo rje'i bye brag go //
